90a4(mdo sde): b yung ba'i dus na da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ting nge 'dzin 'di gsan nas
90a5(mdo sde): lung nos te rjes su yi rang nas mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / da ltar byang
90a6(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di la ji ltar rjes su yi rang ba de bzhin du bdag kyang da ltar gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched du mang
90a7(mdo sde): du thos pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang ngo / /zhes brjod par bya ste/ bzang skyong / 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba gsum pa'o/ /bzang skyong / gzhan
90b1(mdo sde): y ang byang chub sems dpas 'di skad du bdag gis rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams 'di thams cad sems can thams cad dang lhan cig tu thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par
90b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gyur cig / ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang thob par gyur cig /mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /ces brjod par bya ste/ bzang skyong / 'di ni/ byang chub sems
90b3(mdo sde): dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bzhi pa'o/ /bzang skyong / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni/ byang
90b4(mdo sde): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /bzang skyong / byang chub sems dpas ting nge
90b5(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba de dag gis rjes su yi rang zhing bsngos nas bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i dpe tsam zhig bstan to/ /bzang skyong / 'di lta ste/ dper na/
90b6(mdo sde): skyes bu la la zhig tshe lo brgya phrag du ma thub pa/ lo brgya phrag du mar 'tsho ba/ mgyogs pa'i mthu rlung dang 'dra ba zhig yod la de mi 'dug par lo brgya tshang bar shar phyogs su'ang song / de
90b7(mdo sde): bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su'ang song na/ bzang skyong / de ji snyam du sems/ tshe lo brgya thub cing lo brgyar 'tsho ba/ mgyogs pa'i mthu rlung dang 'dra ba'i
91a1(mdo sde): skyes bu des mi 'dug par phyogs drug tu phyogs gcig cing yang lo brgya brgya song ba'i skyes bu des dpag tshad du zhig tu song bar gyur ba bgrang ba'am/ gzhal
91a2(mdo sde): ba'am| bsam pa'am/ dpag par skyes bu la la spro'am/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
91a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par de ni/ mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das
91a4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong / bud med dam/ skyes pa gang la la zhig gis skyes bu lo brgyar gnas pa rlung gi mgyogs pa bzhin du mgyogs par 'gro ba de'i spyod yul
91a5(mdo sde): rnams gser dang / dngul gyis gang bar byas te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phul la ting nge 'dzin 'di ni/ nyan pa dang /
91a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang yang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su yi rang ba bzhi po de dag gis rjes su yi rang zhing rjes su yi rang nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
91a7(mdo sde): chub kyi ched du mang du thos pa 'dod pas bsngo bar yang byed na/ bzang skyong / bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong dang /
91b1(mdo sde): stong phrag brgya dang / bye ba phrag brgya dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// //bam po bdun pa ste tha ma
91b2(mdo sde): bzang skyong / ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji tsam du don che ba la ltos/ bzang skyong / de bas na/ rnam grangs
91b3(mdo sde): 'dis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don chen po yin par rig par bya'o/ /bzang skyong / sngon byung ba 'das
91b4(mdo sde): pa'i dus na bskal ba grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ shin tu rgyas pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
91b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng+ge'i blo gros zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
91b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /bzang skyong / de'i tshe dzam+bu'i gling 'di'ang 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams
91b7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / skye bo mang po dang / mis gang bar gyur to/ /bzang skyong / de'i tshe dzam+bu'i gling 'di na grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las grub pa/ khyim bye ba phrag dgu yod pa/
92a1(mdo sde): dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod par gyur to/ /bzang skyong / de'i tshe dzam+bu'i gling 'di'ang 'di lta ste/ dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa
92a2(mdo sde): brgyad yod de/ yangs shing rgya che bar gyur to/ /bzang skyong / de'i tshe dzam+bu'i gling 'di na gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de skye ba'i sar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ bzang po byung ba zhes bya ba'i grong
92a3(mdo sde): khyer chen po gcig cig yod de/ grong khyer chen po de na srog chags bye ba phrag drug cu gnas so/ /bzang skyong / yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
92a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas seng+ge'i blo gros de'i nyan thos 'dus pa dang po ni/ dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'dus par gyur to/ /zhag bdun 'das nas nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa ni/ nyan
92a5(mdo sde): thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'dus par gyur to/ /zhag bdun pa gnyis 'das nas nyan thos 'dus pa gsum pa ni/ bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'dus par gyur to/ /dag pa'i byang chub sems
92a6(mdo sde): dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu'ang 'dus par gyur to/ /de nas phyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos grangs kyis mi chod pa zhig byung ngo / /bzang skyong / de'i tshe de'i dus na mi de dag dge
92a7(mdo sde): ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i gsung rab la
92b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /bzang skyong / de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni/ lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par gyur to/ /bzang skyong /
92b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe grong khyer chen po de na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa bu stong du tshang ba zhig yod de/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
92b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa seng+ge'i blo gros de'i drung du song zhing bsnyen bkur byed do/ /bzang skyong / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng+ge'i blo gros
92b4(mdo sde): des rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan to/ /yang dag par bshad do/ /bzang skyong / de nas rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba des ting nge
92b5(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su yi rang ngo / /rjes su yi rang nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che spar gang gis gtor to/ /de de nas shi 'phos pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba des de bzhin
92b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa de mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang dzam+bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po'i khyim de nyid du skyes so/ /bzang skyong / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gsung rab la dge slong chos smra ba rin chen
92b7(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba zhig byung ste/ des 'khor bzhi la ting nge 'dzin 'di rgya cher ston to/ /yang dag par sgrog go /bzang skyong / de'i tshe rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba de rgyal po'i bu tshangs pas
93a1(mdo sde): byin zhes bya bar gyur to/ /des dge slong de ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang thos ma thag tu dang brnyed par gyur te/ dang ba'i sems
93a2(mdo sde): kyis gser stong phrag brgya dang / ras bcos bu zung gcig gis dge slong de la g.yogs so/ /bzang skyong / de nas rgyal po'i bu tshangs pas byin des dge slong de las ting nge 'dzin
93a3(mdo sde): 'di thos nas dge slong des legs par bshad pa'i phyir dgab pa byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /des bla na med pa yang dag par
93a4(mdo sde): r dzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ting nge 'dzin 'dod pa'i phyir chos smra ba'i dge slong de las srog chags stong du tshang ba dang lhan cig chos 'dod pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos
93a5(mdo sde): dur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas lo brgyad stong du rang gi 'khor srog chags stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu dge slong de la
93a6(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed cing rjes su 'brangs kyang nyan pa tsam zhig thob pa ma gtogs par dge slong de las ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob bo/ /de 'ang lan gnyis ma yin gyi/ lan gcig kho
93a7(mdo sde): na zhig thos nas rjes su yi rang ba bzhi po 'di dag gis rjes su yi rang ngo / /des srog chags stong du tshang ba de dag dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu rtsa
93b1(mdo sde): brgyad mnyes par byas so/ /skye ba thams cad du'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad cing gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bsgrags te/ des rim gyis sangs rgyas gzhan stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyang mnyes
93b2(mdo sde): par byas so/ /de rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
93b3(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ srog chags bye ba khrag
93b4(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag go / srog chags stong po de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su smin par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di nyid
93b5(mdo sde): k yis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
93b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag go / bzang
93b7(mdo sde): skyong / ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du don che ba la ltos/ 'di ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i tshig tu brjod pas kyang bla na med pa yang dag
94a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par byed na/ bzang skyong / byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang
94a2(mdo sde): ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par sgrog pa dang / sgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa lta ci smos te/ bzang skyong / ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su yi
94a3(mdo sde): rang bar mi byed/ lung nod par mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par sgrog par mi byed/ sgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas
94a4(mdo sde): pa lta su zhig yod/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzang skyong / 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
94a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /bzang skyong / de bas na/ khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du
94a6(mdo sde): gnyer ba rnams kyis gal te ting nge 'dzin 'di dpag tshad tsam na yod par thos na/ bzang skyong / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du gnyer
94a7(mdo sde): ba des ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa'i phyir dpag tshad tsam gyi bar der 'gro bar bya'o/ /thos nas kyang gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan dag la'ang
94b1(mdo sde): rgya cher bstan par bya/ bshad par bya/ bsgrag par bya'o/ /sgom pa la'ang mngon par dga' bar bya'o/ /bzang skyong / dpag tshad tsam lta zhog gi /dpag tshad gnyis tsam mam/ dpag tshad
94b2(mdo sde): gsum tsam mam/ dpag tshad bzhi tsam mam/ dpag tshad lda tsam nas dpag tshad bcu'i bar tsam mam/ bzang skyong / dpag tshad bcu tsam lta'ang zhog gi /gal te byang chub sems dpas dpag
94b3(mdo sde): tshad brgya na da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ljongs kyi phyogs che ge mo zhig na spyod do/ /zhes ting nge 'dzin 'di dpag tshad brgya'i bar
94b4(mdo sde): tsam na yod par thos na'ang bzang skyong / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du gnyer ba des zhum pa med pa dang / snyom las med pa dang /
94b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa dang / sgyid lug pa med pa dang / gdung ba med pa'i sems dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa mi lhod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di tha na mnyan pa nyi tshe tsam gyi phyir yang
94b6(mdo sde): dpag tshad brgya bo der 'gro bar bya na/ lung mnod pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / bsgrag par bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba'i phyir lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
94b7(mdo sde): bzang skyong / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la rag las pa'i phyir ro/ /bzang skyong / de la byang chub sems dpa'
95a1(mdo sde): l hag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du gnyer ba de dag gis dpag tshad brgya po der song nas gang las ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par gyur pa'i
95a2(mdo sde): slob dpon de la des ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu de la bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ /tha na ting
95a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa tsam gyi phyir yang lo gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ lo bcu'am/ brgya'am/ ji srid 'chi'o bar du phyi bzhin 'brang
95a4(mdo sde): bar bya na/ lung mnod pa'am/ kun chub par bya ba'am/ bri ba'am/ bcang ba'am/ bsgrag pa'am/ bsgom pa'i phyir lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bzang skyong / rigs kyi bu'am/
95a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo des rang nyams gtang bar bya ste/ btang nas kyang slob dpon de'i blo bzhin du 'jug par bya'o/ /gus pa dang bcas pa dang / zhe sa dang bcas pas slob dpon gyi
95a6(mdo sde): phyir 'brang bar bya'o/ /bka' bzhin du byed pas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ /bka' mi gcog pa dang / mdza' ba rtag pa dang / ngo mi rtag pa spangs pa dang / nyes par lta ba med
95a7(mdo sde): pas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes kyang bskyed par bya'o/ /de la ston pa'i 'du shes kyang nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /bzang skyong / byang chub
95b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'ang slob dpon de la de ltar na na tan byed na/ sngon chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa ma gtogs par tha na ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan pa tsam yang mi
95b2(mdo sde): thob pa ni/ gnas ma yin skabs ma yin te/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' des slob dpon de la khrel yod pa dang / byas ba gzo ba dang / byas pa shes par bya'o/ /
95b3(mdo sde): de ltar na/ de'i ting nge 'dzin de'i tshig dang yi ge de yun ring du gnas pa dang / rmongs pa med par 'gyur na/ bzang skyong / byang chub sems dpa' gang ting 'dzin 'di grong gzhan na yod
95b4(mdo sde): par thos sam/ grong gi zhing gzhan na yod par thos la/ thos nas kyang tha na mnyan pa tsam gyi phyir yang 'gro bar bya ba lta ci smos/ lung mnod par bya ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang /
95b5(mdo sde): bcang bar bya ba dang / bklag par bya ba dang / bri bar bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir lta'ang smos kyang ci dgos/ bzang skyong /
95b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin 'di tshol bas tha na ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa tsam yang thob pa ni/ bzang skyong / khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ byang chub
95b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' de ni/ ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid tshol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / chos don du gnyer ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / chos 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dge
96a1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya na/ bzang skyong / byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge
96a2(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di lung nod par byed/ kun chub par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed la/ lung mnod pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / bcang bar bya ba dang / bklags par byas nas
96a3(mdo sde): kyang gzhan dag la ston par byed/ sgrog par byed/ yang dag par sgrog par byed cing sgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
96a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi yi mchog /seng+ge'i blo gros zhes bya rjes dran te/ /der ni mi yi dbang po rgyal po des/ /ting 'dzin
96a5(mdo sde): 'di ni de tshe thos par gyur/ /rgyal pos ting 'dzin 'di ni thos nas kyang / /sems mgu dga' ba dpe med pas bzung ste/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas seng+ge'i blo gros la/ /sngar gang gi ni rin
96a6(mdo sde): po ches kyang gtor/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis legs gsungs ting 'dzin 'di/ /sems can thams cad la ni phan par shog /khyod la skyabs su de ring mchi'o zhes/ /de snyam
96a7(mdo sde): bsam nas tshig tu'ang brjod par gyur/ /rgyal po de ni de yi las kyis ni/ /shi nas de nyid du ni yang skyes te/ /des ni dge slong rin chen zhes bya bar/ /phyogs su grags pa mthu chen
96b1(mdo sde): mthong bar gyur/ /de las de nyid kyang ni thos gyur te/ /thos nas dga' ba shin tu rgyas pa skyed/ /bskyed nas byang chub zhugs pa dga' gyur te/ /gser dang gos kyis dge slong dgab byas
96b2(mdo sde): nas| |de ni ting 'dzin 'di yang 'dod pa'i phyir/ /srog chags stong dang lhan cig rab tu byung / /lo ni stong phrag brgya snyed tshang bar yang / /de dag kun gyi dge slong de phyir 'brangs/ /thos
96b3(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i ting 'dzin 'di/ /lan gnyis ma yin lan gcig kho na thos/ /de yi dran pa skyo ba ma skyes shing / /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni yongs su tshol/ /de dag kun gyis las 'di byas
96b4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad tshang ba yi/ /sangs rgyas mthu chen rnams ni mnyes par byas/ /de las ting 'dzin 'di ni thos par gyur/ /de nas bde par gshegs pa gzhan
96b5(mdo sde): dag kyang / /stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad tshang bar brjod/ /bde bar gshegs pa seng+ge'i blo gros la/ /bdag ni rjes su yi rang bgyid ces brjod/ /bsod nams byas pa de yis rgyal po de/ /
96b6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya'i sangs rgyas gyur/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab/ /thams cad de yis skye zhing 'chi las bkrol/ /stong du tshang ba'ang rjes su slob slob nas/ /
96b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gyur te dpa' brtan zhes bya bar/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten la ni grags par gyur/ /ting 'dzin sgras kyang byang chub reg gyur na/ /srid pa thams cad la ni mi brten par/ /gang zhig
97a1(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'di ni rgya che bar/ /ston pa de dag byang chub 'gyur bar ni/ /smos ci dgos te nam yang the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di/ /
97a2(mdo sde): dpag tshad brgya na gal te yod gyur kyang / /byang chub don du gnyer ba nyin mtshan du/ /nam yang mi 'dug song ste mnyan par bya/ /gal te song nas 'di ni ma rnyed na/ /'on kyang de yi bsod
97a3(mdo sde): nams tshad med de/ /de ni de yi byang chub bskyed yin na/ /gang gis song ste 'di thos smos mi dgos/ /de phyir gang zhig ting 'dzin 'di 'dod pas/ /dang por tshangs pas byin de dran par
97a4(mdo sde): byos| |dge slong gang la ting 'dzin 'di yod la/ /skyo ba'i sems ni med par bsten par bya/ /rjes su dran te skye ba snga ma la/ /stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug lo tshang bar/ /ngas ni chos smra ba la
97a5(mdo sde): rtag bsten kyang / /ting 'dzin 'di ni nam yang thos ma gyur/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas bden zhes bya ba byung / /de na dge slong gzhon nu thos mang zhing / /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa nub
97a6(mdo sde): 'og tu| |de tshe des ni ting 'dzin 'di nyid bzung / /nga ni de na rgyal rigs rgyal po ste/ /dge slong che ge mo zhig ting 'dzin 'di/ /'dzin gyi drung du legs par nyon cig ces/ /rmi lam du ni ting
97a7(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di thos nas/ /myur du langs te rings ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /'di 'dzin pa yi dge slong de btsal te/ /mthong nas rab tu byung ba de las ni/ /'di nyid lan 'ga' thos lta srid dam zhes/ /
97b1(mdo sde): stong phrag drug cu rtsa drug lo tshang bar/ /ngas ni dge slong de la dga' bas bkur/ /bdud kyis byin gyis brlags par gyur pa'i phyir/ /lan 'ga' tsam yang thos par ma gyur te/ /de phyir dge slong rnams
97b2(mdo sde): dang dge slong ma/ /dge bsnyen dag dang dge bsnyen ma rnams la/ /ting 'dzin thos nas myur du zungs shig ces/ /mos par byed cing khong du chud par byed/ /der ni bskal pa tshang bar 'dug nas kyang //
97b3(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'dzin pa de ni bsnyen cing bsten/ /bskal pa stong du legs par bsnyen bkur byas/ /des ni ting 'dzin 'di'ang bshad par gyur/ /ting 'dzin rdul med 'di la rab spyod pa'i/ /dge slong grong
97b4(mdo sde): du slong ba de nyid la/ /bza' ba dang ni bca' dang mal cha dang / /de bzhin gos dang bye ba byin par gyur/ /bca' dang bza' dang mal stan de bzhin gos/ /mang po bye ba thams cad lta 'ang zhog /gal te
97b5(mdo sde): rang gi sha sbyin thob na ni/ /legs spyad yin na zas skom smos ci dgos/ /rtag tu bran gyur bsnyen bkur byed cing ni/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di'ang tshol byed la/ /mkhas pas rnyed nas de'ang myur
97b6(mdo sde): byed kyang / /de la byas pa gzo ba ma yin no/ /bskal pa mang po byed par btsal kyang ni/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka'/ /'di yi skra yang brgya lam thos gyur na/ /kha ton byas nas ston pa
97b7(mdo sde): smos ci dgos/ /gang gis gang+gA'i bye snyed 'jig rten khams/ /rin po ches ni bkang ste byin pa bas/ /gang zhig 'di las tshigs bcad 'ga' lung nos/ /de yi bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o//
98a1(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /gang rtag brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa bas/ /gang zhig 'di las tshigs bcad 'ga' lung mos/ /de yi bsod nams
98a2(mdo sde): tshad gzung mi sla'o/ /bskal pa bye ba gang+ga'i bye snyed du/ /gang dag mi rten bsam gtan sgom pa bas/ /gang zhig 'di las tshigs bcad 'ga' lung nos/ /de yi bsod nams tshad
98a3(mdo sde): gzung mi sla'o/ /bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /gang rtag shes rab gnas par gyur pa bas/ /gang zhig 'di las tshigs bcad 'ga' lung mnos/ /de yi bsod nams tshad
98a4(mdo sde): gzung mi sla'o/ /bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //bzang skyong / de bas na/ dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos ting
98a5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin 'di gus par byas te mnyan par bya'o/ /thos nas kyang gzung bar bya/ kun chub bar bya/ yi ger bri bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya'o/ /bzung zhing kun chub par byas
98a6(mdo sde): nas kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o/ /legs par bris te gzhag par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzang skyong / nga 'das pa'i 'og tu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
98a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dad pa can/ dang ba/ brtag pa mang po mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir mang du thos pa tshol par 'gyur ro//
98b1(mdo sde): de dag mang du thos pa tshol bas dam pa'i phyir phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dag tu rgyu bar 'gyur te/ bzang skyong / sems can de lta bu chos don du gnyer ba/ chos la mos pa/ chos 'dod
98b2(mdo sde): pa| chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ shin tu rgyas pa 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang ched du ting nge 'dzin 'di lung nos shing bstan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin
98b3(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs te glegs pa ba chen por legs par bris nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab la gzhag par bya'o/ /bzang skyong / de la de bzhin
98b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad byed pa med pa/ bya ba med pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/ chags pa med pa/ dmigs su med pa/ stong pa nyid/
98b5(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa/ smon pa med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ brten pa med pa/ bgrang du med pa/ rnam par gzhag tu med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ dor ba med
98b6(mdo sde): pa| gnas pa med pa/ chos thams cad rtag pa med pa/ chad pa med pa/ rgyu zad pa/ sdug bsngal zad pa/ dngos po zad pa/ mi skye ba/ mi 'gag pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi 'jig pa/ lam
98b7(mdo sde): med pa| lam gyi 'bras bu med pa/ 'phags pa thams cad kyis ma dkrugs pa/ byis pa thams cad kyis spangs pa/ mi shes pa rnams kyis bor ba/ mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung
99a1(mdo sde): pa ste| bzang skyong / 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams la btab pa'i de bzhin
99a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /bzang skyong / de bas na/ byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus der ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnod
99a3(mdo sde): par 'dod pas lung mnos shing kha ton du byas nas gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o/ /bzang skyong / de la chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tha na
99a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan pa'i phyir yang brtson par 'gyur na/ lung mnod pa dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyangs
99a5(mdo sde): pa dang / sngon smon lam btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mos pa dang / ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
99a6(mdo sde): kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'di 'chang bar 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur snyam nas chos kyi tshul thams
99a7(mdo sde): cad len pa ste/ bzang skyong / chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang pa'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro/ /bzang skyong /
99b1(mdo sde): gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la tha na yi ger bri ba tsam gyi phyir yang brtson par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas yid
99b2(mdo sde): la byed pa dang / phyi phyir zhing chos rjes su dran pa la mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad dmigs pa yongs su gcod pa yid la byed pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa la
99b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa ste/ bzang skyong / chos de bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal pa la tha na bri ba tsam gyi phyir yang brtson par 'gyur ro/ /bzang skyong / de la chos bzhi
99b4(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la brtson par rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i dngos po yongs su gcod pa'i shes
99b5(mdo sde): pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku dmigs pa rnam par sgom pa la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par
99b6(mdo sde): rig par bya'o/ /dmigs pa thams cad du sangs rgyas dmigs pa yid la byed pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya'o/ /chos thams cad dngos po dang bral
99b7(mdo sde): bar mos pa la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya ste/ bzang skyong / chos de bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal
100a1(mdo sde): pa la mngon par brtson par rig par bya'o/ /bzang skyong / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos kun tu 'khrug pa'i tshe sems can thams cad
100a2(mdo sde): la phan gdags pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang la la zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la brtson par gyur cing / de 'di snyam du ting nge 'dzin 'di ji ltar na shin
100a3(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa dang / rgya che ba dang / yun ring du gnas par 'gyur snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ bsod nams kyi phung po de thams cad mkhyen
100a4(mdo sde): pa nyid du gzhol bar rig par bya ba ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' rtogs par ma nus so/ /de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po de smon lam gyi dbang gis myur du thams cad
100a5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid du gzhol bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa/ bdag med par gnas pa las nges par byung ba/ gang dag gis bskal pa tshad med/ grangs med/ gzhal
100a6(mdo sde): du med| bsam gyis mi khyab pa'am/ de bas kyang lhag par go cha chen po bgos pa rnams ni/ ma gtogs te/ de dag thams cad ni/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad yongs su
100a7(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'gyur/ de dag thams cad ni/ spyod pa'i khyad par ji lta ba dang / tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du nges par 'byung ngo / /bzang skyong / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i
100b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'dod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa thob par
100b2(mdo sde): 'dod pas phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba/ dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus der ting nge 'dzin 'di yi ger bri ba dang / lung mnod pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / gzhan
100b3(mdo sde): dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni/ bzang skyong / ting nge 'dzin
100b4(mdo sde): 'di'i nang du 'dus so/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la mkhas pa bsgrubs pas chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste/ de la gnas
100b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs pa thams cad sangs rgyas la dmigs par mos so/ /dmigs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthar 'jug par byed do/ /dmigs pa'i
100b6(mdo sde): dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis ya ma bslar shes so/ /de dag ji lta ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dmigs par byed pa dang / yid la byed pa de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba
100b7(mdo sde): rnam par dag ste/ de lta bu la gnas pa de dag ni/ phyogs gang du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba med de/ de dag ni/ phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam
101a1(mdo sde): par sbyong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag nas tshegs chung ngus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du dmigs pa byas na/ 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs
101a2(mdo sde): pa de dag mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pas de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong ba yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa rnams
101a3(mdo sde): de'i mig lam du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dmigs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni/ gzung ba med pa'i phyir dmigs pa gcig gis dmigs pa thams cad 'dzin pa'ang ma yin/ dmigs
101a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis dmigs pa gcig 'dzin pa'ang ma yin no/ /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nye bar brtags na/ shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir dngos po med pa nyid du grub pa'o/ /bzang skyong /
101a5(mdo sde): de lta bu la gnas pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ rnam par dag nas kyang rlom sems su mi byed/ spros par mi byed de/ de dag ni/ de
101a6(mdo sde): ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs pa la gnas par
101a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang dag gsungs pa ni/ /ji lta bzhin du ye shes 'jug pa yin/ /de ni
101b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gtso bo ston pa'i sras/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni yid kyang brtson/ /gang gis sangs rgyas dmigs brjes dran pa/ /dmigs pa'i don ni du ma mthong bar 'gyur/ /de la ting 'dzin zhi ba blta dka'
101b2(mdo sde): 'di| |phyi ma'i dus na mngon sum du'ang 'gyur/ /mkhas pa gang zhig chos kun mi rten cing / /sems can dag la phan phyir yid brtson pa/ /de dag phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po'i tshe/ /ting nge 'dzin
101b3(mdo sde): 'di la ni sbyor bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la phan zhing gzung ba'i phyir/ /gang zhig rtag tu blta dka' chos 'di la/ /dran pa brtan par 'jog cing brtson byed pa/ /de yi lag tu ting
101b4(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di 'gro 'gyur/ /gang zhig dran dang blo gros rtogs pa dag /sangs rgyas dmigs par rtag tu 'jog byed cing / /gzhan dring mi 'jog rnal 'byor brtson pa de/ /ting 'dzin chen
101b5(mdo sde): po 'di la gnas par 'gyur/ /rjes su gzung phyir blta dka' tshig la gnas/ /'jig rten thams cad la ni yid skyo zhing / /mkhas pa srid pa thams cad mi 'dod pa/ /de dag ting 'dzin
101b6(mdo sde): chen po 'di la brtson/ /byang chub 'dod cing phan phyir snying brtse gang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku la rtog /zhi ba'i chos la smon lam 'debs byed pa/ /de dag ting 'dzin 'di la brten
101b7(mdo sde): par brtson/ /'thab pa med cing rtsod pa med la zhi/ /bde bar gshegs pas bstod pa'i chos tshol zhing / /sangs rgyas dmigs pa la ni rtag gnas pa/ /de dag ting 'dzin 'di la brtag brtson yin//
102a1(mdo sde): gang dag phyi ma'i sdig pa'i dus de na/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni brtson byed pa/ /spyod pa'i yon tan mtha' yas la gnas pa/ /de yi yon tan 'jig rten mgon pos
102a2(mdo sde): mkhyen| |gang dag zag pa med pa'i chos shes shing / /shin tu tshul bzhin zag pa rnams kyang shes/ /rtog pa med spyod mnyam pa nyid gnas pa/ /de dag ting 'dzin 'di la brtag
102a3(mdo sde): brtson yin/ /gang dag bde gshegs chos ni tshad med la/ /shes bzhin du yang kun smon lam 'debs shing / /kun mkhyen ye shes la ni brtan gnas pa/ /de la ting 'dzin zhi
102a4(mdo sde): ba 'di ston to/ /mtshan nyid med cing mtshan nyid las kyang 'das/ /nyon mongs pa dang rnam dag gang yang med/ /rang bzhin stong pa'i chos rnams gang shes pa/ /de dag bde bar
102a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa tshad med mthong / /gang zhig dmigs pa mtha' med brtson byed kyang / /dmigs pa thams cad stong pa nyid du shes/ /blta bar dka' dag mthong nas rlom sems med/ /
102a6(mdo sde): des ni bde bar gshegs pa tshad med mthong / /gang zhig don mthong yid kyang rnam par dag /nyon mongs med cing zhi ba'i go 'phang gnas/ /rdul dang bral zhing mnyan don chos ston
102a7(mdo sde): pa| |de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad do/ /bde gshegs sras po zug rdu phyung ba gang / /bden pa ma nyams the tshom rnams dang bral/ /srog chags phan phyir byams pa sgom byed pa/ /de
102b1(mdo sde): dag la ni don mchog 'di bshad do/ /gang zhig rang bzhin gyis ni ma rig bral/ /rig pas ma rig gnas ni sel byed cing / /don mchog 'di la brtson par sbyor byed pa/ /de la ting 'dzin zhi ba
102b2(mdo sde): 'di bshad do/ /rnam dag gnas shing kun nas nyon mongs med/ /ye shes mtha' yas mngon par 'dod byed cing / /nges don 'di la mchog tu dga' thob pa/ /de la rnam thar zhi ba 'di bshad
102b3(mdo sde): do| |gang zhig kun tu sbyor ba kun las grol/ /brtan zhing srog chags kun la snying brtse zhing / /gnod sems med cing zhi lam dga' brten pa/ /de la ting 'dzin 'di ni yang dag bsgrags/ /
102b4(mdo sde): bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //bzang skyong / chos 'di bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur
102b5(mdo sde): pa'o| |bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas la gus pa dang / mi phyed pa'i dang ba yid la byed pa dang / chos la gus shing nyan 'dod pa dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i tshig sgrub pa
102b6(mdo sde): ste| bzang skyong / chos bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /bzang skyong / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin
102b7(mdo sde): 'di thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yid la phyin ci log med pas sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems pa dang / chos la the tshom med pas dmigs pa'i
103a1(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid rang bzhin gyis dge ba la rtog pa dang / dngos po la mkhas pa la rtog pas ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa/ shin tu stong pa'i chos
103a2(mdo sde): thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba dang / 'du shes rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa/ yongs su gcod pa shes pa la rtog pas dngos po ya ma brla rnam par 'jig pa ste/ bzang
103a3(mdo sde): skyong / chos de bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /bzang skyong / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par
103a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa la mkhas la dam pa'i chos srung zhing sbed
103a5(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyor zhing sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang / sems can gyi 'du shes rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa ste/
103a6(mdo sde): bzang skyong / chos de bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /bzang skyong / de bas na/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i
103a7(mdo sde): chos cher 'khrug pa'i tshe der byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog kyang yongs su btang ba la gnas te/ ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o//
103b1(mdo sde): bzang skyong / ches thams cad gzung ba la mkhas pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par yang dag par
103b2(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa'i chos rin po che'i mdzod 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'jog par 'gyur/ chos 'di lta bu 'di yang dag par bstan pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / yang dag par
103b3(mdo sde): bsgrag par bya ba'ang nus par 'gyur ro/ /bzang skyong / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brtson 'grus kyi gnas 'di dag ni/ yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtson 'grus kyi byin
103b4(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bzang skyong / gang zhig phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus der chos 'di dag
103b5(mdo sde): 'jog par byed/ yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su gzung ba
103b6(mdo sde): dang / sems can thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs
103b7(mdo sde): su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na 'dug kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
104a1(mdo sde): dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /de ni/ chos 'dod pa dang / chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos bsgrub pa'i phyir phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na ting nge 'dzin 'di'i phyir
104a2(mdo sde): brtson par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
104a3(mdo sde): nor rnams kyis yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na chos 'di lta bu 'di dag yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs
104a4(mdo sde): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom
104a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang zhig brtan pa chos sems pa/ /phyi ma'i dus su gyur pa na/ /dam chos gzung phyir gnas gyur pa/ /de dag la ni gzungs
104a6(mdo sde): 'di bshad/ /gang dag dam chos rin chen phyir/ /'jigs pa med par brtson byed cing / /snying yang brtse la snying rje can/ /de dag chos kyang 'dzin par gnas/ /brtan cing bag yod
104a7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / /thub pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ /de dag don du ting nge 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig chos rgyal skyob pa yis/ /gang dag byin gyis
104b1(mdo sde): brlabs gyur pa/ /de dag phyi dus 'jigs bcas tshe/ /chos nyid 'di ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /shin tu ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /chos rnams stong zhing spros med par/ /dran dang ldan pa gang gis shes/ /
104b2(mdo sde): de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ /thams cad chos kyi ngo bo nyid/ /de la bsam yas tshigs su bcad/ /nges pa nyid du shes gyur pa/ /de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ /zad pa shes
104b3(mdo sde): la gnas gyur cing / /mi skye ba la'ang rab gnas la/ /sems ni dul zhing ngo tsha ldan/ /de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bde ba'i lam ni bla na med/ /cang shes lam la zhugs gyur pa/ /
104b4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus byin gyis brlabs dang ldan/ /de dag chos 'dzin gnas pa yin/ /de bzhin nyid dang mi rtog don/ /gang gis chos nyid rab tu shes/ /de la spros pa ci yang med/ /de dag chos kyang
104b5(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur/ /thams cad chos ni byed med par/ /des pa gang gis shes pa de/ /ci yang med cing len med pa'i/ /chos nyid de ni sgrog par 'gyur/ /'dzin pa med cing 'dzin dang bral/ /
104b6(mdo sde): chos kun sngon nas yongs dag par/ /gang gis shes pa de dag ni/ /chos kyi spyod yul gnas pa yin/ /chos kun ngo bo med par ni/ /de ltar chos la gang gis shes/ /de dag chos nyid
104b7(mdo sde): 'di ston 'gyur/ /de ni 'jug pa yin par bshad/ /ming med ming dang bral gyur cing / /spros pa med cing mi skye bar/ /gang gis chos nyid rab shes pa/ /de dag stong pa nyid kyang sgrog /
105a1(mdo sde): gnas pa med cing 'gro ba med/ /nam mkha'i gnas bzhin dag par ni/ /gang gis chos 'di shes gyur pa/ /de la ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur/ /gang dag 'du
105a2(mdo sde): shes don rtog bral/ /ngo bo nyid du ma skyes shing / /dngos po'i 'du shes bral gyur pa/ /de dag chos nyid ston par 'gyur/ /rgyas gang ba de ni rgya med de/ /dgongs pa'i tshig tu gsungs
105a3(mdo sde): pa yin| |gang gis de ltar shes gyur pa/ /de dag chos nyid 'di 'dzin 'gyur/ /bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //bzang
105a4(mdo sde): skyong / de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bag yod pa lhur blangs te chos 'di dag yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o/ /'di'i phan yon du yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /
105a5(mdo sde): tshul bzhin dang yang ldan par bya'o/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa'ang yongs su spang bar bya ste/ de ltar na chos zab mo blta bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba gang sangs rgyas kyi chos
105a6(mdo sde): thams cad skyed par byed pa/ rang byung rnams kyi ye shes dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa 'di rnyed mi dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
105a7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / li tsa byi gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas dang /
105b1(mdo sde): khyim bdag ded dpon che bzang dang / tshong dpon gyi bu phug spas dang / bram ze 'dam bus byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos byin dang / khyim bdag chu lha dang / byang chub sems
105b2(mdo sde): dpa' lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / 'khor bzhi po las ji snyed cig 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams la bka' stsal
105b3(mdo sde): pa| rigs kyi bu rnams/ ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa'i chos rin po che 'di'i mdzod dang / 'jig rten thams cad yid ches
105b4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba zab mo/ /don zab pa/ rnam par thar pa sgo gsum gyi tshul bshad pa zab mo/ /byang ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ mkhas shing shes pas rig pa/
105b5(mdo sde): rgya che ba| gya nom pa/ don phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di'ang khyed la gtad do/ /rjes su gtad do/ /gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rten du
105b6(mdo sde): gyur pa de dag kyang khyed la nyis 'gyur du rjes su gtad gyi/ khyed kyis kyang ci nas kyang bri bar bya'o/ /mnyan par bya'o/ /gzung bar bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /bcad par bya'o/ /bklag
105b7(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /shin tu rgyas pa dang / rgya cher bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher bshad par bya'o/ /bstan par bya'o/ /yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad rjes su
106a1(mdo sde): gzung ba'i phyir sgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o/ /ji skad bstan pa bzhin du chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ste/ de ci nas kyang skyes
106a2(mdo sde): bu tha ma par ma gyur par bya'o/ /bzang skyong / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di thos la thos nas kyang lung nod par byed/ kha ton du byed/
106a3(mdo sde): kun chub par byed na/ des lhag pa'i bsam pas gus par bya ste/ mnyan par bya'o/ /lung mnod par bya'o/ /bshad par bya'o/ /gang dag gzhan dag la ston tam/ klog tu
106a4(mdo sde): 'jug na/ des kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas rgya cher bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di yun ring du gnas pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / shin tu rgya che bar gzhan dag la
106a5(mdo sde): bstan par bya/ klog tu gzhug par bya ste/ 'di ni/ khyed la rjes su bstan pa yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag ni/ bla na med
106a6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas 'dus pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis ting nge
106a7(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di nyid thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu
106b1(mdo sde): g.yos so/ /lha rnams kyis kyang bar snang las me tog gi char phab bo/ /rnga bo che dag kyang ma brdungs par sgra byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems
106b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang
106b3(mdo sde): ste| bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
106b4(mdo sde): rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he rat+na rak+Shi tas zhus te gtan la phab pa/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos lags / rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sarba pu N+ye sa muts+tsha ya sa mA d+hi nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/'phags pa bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po
106b5(mdo sde): mdo| bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa na a
106b6(mdo sde): mras bsrungs pa'i tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na dge slong khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/
107a1(mdo sde): dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa
107a2(mdo sde): byas pa| khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi
107a3(mdo sde): dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes
107a4(mdo sde): pa thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / brtan pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha
107a5(mdo sde): stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems
107a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bla ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phel ba'i
107a7(mdo sde): blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems
107b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu dang /
107b2(mdo sde): de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang / lha'i bu bzhi khri thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
107b3(mdo sde): mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa shin
107b4(mdo sde): tu snying por gyur te mu stegs byed kyi tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
107b5(mdo sde): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom
107b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di shin tu snying por gyur te mu stegs can ngan pa spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu grangs ma mchis pa dang / gcer pu pa la sogs pa thams cad zil gyis mnan te mdzes
107b7(mdo sde): par gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams legs par yongs su gzud du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
108a1(mdo sde): rnams la phan gdags su gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bskyang du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
108a2(mdo sde): po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa dang / yang dag par
108a3(mdo sde): bstan par gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung du gsol/ sems can thams
108a4(mdo sde): cad yongs su mi gtong bar gsol/ ji lta bu'i tshul gyi chos kyi phan gdags pas mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba'i lam bstan par gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya
108a5(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su nyams par
108a6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / bskyud ngas ba ma mchis pa'i chos can gyi slad du dran
108a7(mdo sde): pa dang ldan par 'gyur pa dang / chos kyi dgongs pa rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / don rtogs pa rjes su 'thob pa'i slad du rtogs pa dang ldan par
108b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / rang gi sems yongs su dag pa'i slad du ngo tsha dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad spang ba'i slad du khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / cho
108b2(mdo sde): ga dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i slad du brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba'i slad du dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor thams cad kyi nang du
108b3(mdo sde): bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i slad du sran thub par 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsod nams yongs
108b4(mdo sde): su mi nyams pa dang / chos yongs su mi nyams pa dang / shes rab yongs su mi nyams pa dang / ye shes yongs su mi nyams par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar na/ lhag pa'i
108b5(mdo sde): bsam pa brtan pas byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi nyams pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug gi bar du sems can thams cad la mdza' ba brtan pa dang / ji skad
108b6(mdo sde): smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du gnas pas sems can rnams la mi slu ba dang / gtong ba thams cad rjes su 'jug pas
108b7(mdo sde): ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa la gnas pas ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / gnod sems med pa'i yid kyis sems can thams
109a1(mdo sde): cad la sems snyoms pas ma bstan pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid kyis don thams cad yongs su bsgrub pas ma bstan pa'i
109a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin la mkhas te bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mi gnas pas ma bstan pa'i
109a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan dang ldan pa dang / lta ba thams cad dang bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pas ma bstan pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dang / sems can rnams
109a4(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu ba la shin tu brtson pas bsdu ba shin tu bsdus pa dang / lha dang mi'i skye ba thams cad la mi rtag par yid la bgyid pa la brtson pas re ba ma
109a5(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la legs par gnas shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa dang bral bas sgo'i them pa'i rten lta bu dang / chos kyi dbang
109a6(mdo sde): du bgyid kyi 'dod pa'i dbang du mi bgyid pa dang / chos kyi rgyal srid don du gnyer bar bgyid kyi/ lha dang mi'i rgyal srid don du mi gnyer ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig dang
109a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i chos smra bar 'gyur ba dang / chos kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur gyi zang zing gis mi 'tsho ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /
109b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i sems dang ldan pas zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad la gti mug gi mun pa dang bral bas gti mug dang bral
109b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas bdud thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / sgo thams cad nas yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas thabs la
109b3(mdo sde): mkhas par 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi bdag po sred med kyi bu la 'di skad ces
109b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /sred med kyi bu/ khyod legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni/ sred med kyi bu/
109b5(mdo sde): khyod legs so/ /sred med kyi bu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang thob par
109b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ngas bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes gsol to/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom
109b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sred med kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba
110a1(mdo sde): yod de| de la brten na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsod nams yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ chos yongs su nyams par
110a2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ ye shes yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen
110a3(mdo sde): bkur byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa nas sgo thams cad nas yongs su
110a4(mdo sde): bsngo ba la mkhas pas thabs mkhas par 'gyur ba'i bar de dag dang / yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod
110a5(mdo sde): nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming tsam bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba tshan po che chen po stobs
110a6(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa zhig yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na gnas so/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni/ tshan po che chen po stobs po che'i shugs dang ldan pa ste/ dzam+bu'i
110a7(mdo sde): gling 'di'i sems can la 'di lta ste/ stobs sam spro ba bdag dang mnyam pa'ang med na/ lhag pa lta ga la yod snyam mo/ /des dge sbyong gau ta ma stobs po che'i shugs dang
110b1(mdo sde): ldan te| stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan zhing sred med kyi bu'i lus thob bo/ /zhes grag go snyam mo/ /de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du song la bcom ldan
110b2(mdo sde): 'das de ci 'dra ba dang / bdag ci 'dra ba sad par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas a mras bsrungs
110b3(mdo sde): p a'i tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor 'bum phrag du
110b4(mdo sde): mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen pos chos ston cing / ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'phags pa dang 'dra la kun nas mdzes
110b5(mdo sde): shing blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob bo/ /de dga' ba dang / dang ba dang /
110b6(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la
110b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing mgo bor thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi lhag pa'i bsam
111a1(mdo sde): pa thugs su chud nas nga rgyal dang / /rgyags pa dang / dregs pa gdul ba'i phyir gnas brtan maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud+gal gyi bu/ khyod song
111a2(mdo sde): la nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma'i phyir mda' 'phangs pa gang yin pa de 'dir longs shig / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan

111b1(mdo sde): kyi ltar mnyan te 'khor thams cad kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur nas dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang pa las bskum pa bzhin du skad
111b2(mdo sde): cig thad gcig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khor yug chen po de nas mda' de blangs te bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

116b5(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed de 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba de
116b6(mdo sde): lta bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig/ ces smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom
116b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gang gi ming bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
117a1(mdo sde): c i nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i
117a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu/ byang chub sems
117a3(mdo sde): d pa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su ma
117a4(mdo sde): bzung ba de ni/ gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad ni/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de'i khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa'i
117a5(mdo sde): phyir ro| |sred med kyi bu/ dper na /chu mig thams cad dang / mtsho phran thams cad dang / mtshe'u thams cad dang / chu klung thams cad dang / chu bran thams cad dang / mtsho
117a6(mdo sde): thams cad dang / lteng ka thams cad ni/ rgya mtsho chen po'i khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de bzhin du sred med kyi bu/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ci'ang rung ba sbyin
117a7(mdo sde): pa las byung ba rnams dang / tshul khrims las byung ba rnams dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'jig
117b1(mdo sde): rten pa rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ji snyed pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad
117b2(mdo sde): ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa dag go/ sred med kyi bu/ de'i phyir bsod nams thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs
117b3(mdo sde): kyi bu mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /sred med kyi bu/ dper na/ rin po che'i ri chen po gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ lhun po dang /
117b4(mdo sde): lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / gzhan yang ri nag po rnams dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang /
117b5(mdo sde): nags tshal thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / dzam+bu'i gling dang / shar gyi lus 'phags dang / nub
117b6(mdo sde): kyi ba lang spyod dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum
117b7(mdo sde): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar ji snyed yod pa nas
118a1(mdo sde): gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya'i bar 'di dag thams cad ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs su
118a2(mdo sde): 'dus shing rjes su zhugs par blta bar bya ba de bzhin du sred med kyi bu/ so so skye ba'i bsod nams rnams dang / slob pa'i bsod nams rnams dang / mi slob pa'i bsod nams
118a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams rnams ci'ang rung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
118a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa'i khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs te/ sred med kyi bu/ rnam grangs des kyang gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
118a5(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag gis bsod nams thams cad yongs su bzung ba de ltar rig bar bya'o/ /sred med kyi bu/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
118a6(mdo sde): can las theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs pa ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na 'khor los bsgyur ba ni/ bsod nams dang shes rab kyis mchog tu brjod do/ /
118a7(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu/ gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur te/ sems
118b1(mdo sde): can re re'ang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur na/ sred med kyi bu/ 'di snyam du sems/ ci bsod nams kyi phung po de
118b2(mdo sde): mang ngam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor los bsgyur ba gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po'ang mang lags na/ sems can grangs ma
118b3(mdo sde): mchis pa de dag gi lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji
118b4(mdo sde): snyed yod pa sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa de dag re re nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'am/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
118b5(mdo sde): kyi sems can rnams 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa lta zhog gi / sred med kyi bu/ gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can
118b6(mdo sde): gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur na/ sred med kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems /ci sems can de dag gi bsod
118b7(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po mang ngam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gcig 'khor los bsgyur ba dang mnyam par gyur pa'i bsod nams
119a1(mdo sde): kyi phung po'ang dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis na/ sems can grangs ma mchis pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur ba de dag gi bsod nams kyi
119a2(mdo sde): phung po lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu/ khyod mos par bya/ khyod du chud par bya ste/ de bas na/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang
119a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su bzung ba ches mang la ches dpag tu med de/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung pos ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po
119a4(mdo sde): de'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi char yang mi phod/ grangs dang /
119a5(mdo sde): cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod de/ sred med kyi bu/ 'di ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang po'o/ /sred med kyi bu/
119a6(mdo sde): gzhan yang stong gi bdag po tshangs pa ni/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed do/ /sred med kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te mi la la zhig gis
119a7(mdo sde): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de dang / tshangs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i
119b1(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyis gang mang / byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid ches mang gi/ sbyin pa
119b2(mdo sde): las byung ba ni/ de lta ma lags so/ /sred med kyi bu/ stong gi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi/ sred med kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ stong gnyis kyi bdag
119b3(mdo sde): po tshangs pas stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed la/ sred med kyi bu/ gal te mi la la zhig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun
119b4(mdo sde): gyis yongs su gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/ sred med kyi bu/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang / byams pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyis gang mang / byang chub sems dpa'
119b5(mdo sde): sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa de nyid ches mang gi /sbyin pa las
119b6(mdo sde): byung ba ni/ de lta ma lags so/ /sred med kyi bu/ stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi /sred med kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi bdag po
119b7(mdo sde): tshangs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed la/ sred med kyi bu/ mi la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin
120a1(mdo sde): po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/ sred med kye bu/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi
120a2(mdo sde): phung po de gnyis gang mang / byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/ tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa
120a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu/ stong gsum gyi
120a4(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi / sred med kyi bu/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
120a5(mdo sde): r ten gyi khams kyi sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa sgom pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur pa'i
120a6(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa sems can thams cad
120a7(mdo sde): yongs su dgrol ba la brtson pa/ g.yo med cing sgyu med pa'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa'i byang chub sems
120b1(mdo sde): dpa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid de bas ches mang ste/ tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa
120b2(mdo sde): nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do/ /sred med kyi bu/ de ltar na/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung bo ni/ dpag tu med
120b3(mdo sde): pa yin te/ sred med kyi bu/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bskyed
120b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de dag gis bsod nams thams cad yongs su bsdus pa de ltar rig par bya ste/ sred med kyi bu/ 'di ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug
120b5(mdo sde): pa gnyis pa'o/ /sred med kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig yod/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcur
120b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dpag tu ma mchis so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ dpag tu ma
120b7(mdo sde): mchis so/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni/ brjod pa'am/ brda sprad par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu/ gal
121a1(mdo sde): te dper blang ba bstan pas bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du bstan du zin kyang phyogs bcu na 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa ni/ bstan par sla ba ma yin no/ /sred
121a2(mdo sde): med kyi bu/ 'on kyang don 'di nyid brda sprod pa dang / bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can bsod nams 'dod pa rnams
121a3(mdo sde): phyir zhing 'bogs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i thegs pa pa'i sems can rnams kyi brtson 'grus chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la dpes bstan to/ /
121a4(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu/ dper na/ mi la la thig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chu'i phung po yan chad srid pa'i rtse mo man chad yungs 'brus yongs su gang
121a5(mdo sde): bar byas la/ sred med kyi bu/ de las shar phyogs su yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas yungs 'bru gcig por te/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis
121a6(mdo sde): yungs 'bru de dag thams cad yongs su zad par byas kyang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang /
121a7(mdo sde): steng dang / phyogs bcu kun tu'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /sred med kyi bu/ gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yungs 'brus yongs su gang bar gyur pa de las
121b1(mdo sde): mi la la zhig gis yungs 'bru re re 'ang yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi char gses na/ sred med kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ yungs 'bru'i cha gses pa de dag bgrang
121b2(mdo sde): ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus sam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yungs 'bru gcig gi cha gses pa'i phyogs gang lags pa
121b3(mdo sde): de'ang gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar gyur pas kyang bskal par yang rtogs par rdo mi thogs lags na/ yungs 'bru'i cha gses pa thams cad lta smos
121b4(mdo sde): kyang ci 'tshal/ sred med kyi bu/ gal te mi la la zhig gis shar phyogs su yungs 'bru'i cha gses pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas yungs 'bru'i cha
121b5(mdo sde): gses pa re re bor te/ sred med kyi bu/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis yungs 'bru'i cha gses pa thams cad zad par byas kyang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi mtha' rtogs
121b6(mdo sde): par mi nus so/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun tu'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /sred med kyi bu/ de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam
121b7(mdo sde): mkhas yongs su khyab pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mi la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/ sred med kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi
122a1(mdo sde): de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dpag tu ma mchis so/ /bde bar gshegs
122a2(mdo sde): pa| dpag tu ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu/ de lta bu'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni/ sems
122a3(mdo sde): dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa g.yo med pa/ sgyu med pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba las
122a4(mdo sde): brtson pa'i snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po sgom pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do/ /sred med
122a5(mdo sde): kyi bu| dper na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa nam mkha'i khams kyis ma khyab pa ci'ang med pa de bzhin du/ sred med kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i byams
122a6(mdo sde): pa des ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa de dag ma khyab pa gang yang med de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
122a7(mdo sde): na sems can 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas yongs su khyab bo/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag sems can du bsdu bar
122b1(mdo sde): bsdus pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur tam/ de bzhin dub rgya byin gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur tam/ de bzhin
122b2(mdo sde): du tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ g.yo med pa/ sgyu med pa/ sems can yongs su dgrol pa la
122b3(mdo sde): brtson pa/ snying rje chen po la zhugs pa/ byams pa chen po la gnas pa'i gom pa bdun la bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bas ches mang ste/ sems can
122b4(mdo sde): thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /sred med kyi bu/ 'di ni/ bsod
122b5(mdo sde): nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa gsum pa'o/ /sred med kyi bu/ gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems
122b6(mdo sde): c an ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char
122b7(mdo sde): yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do/ /sred med kyi bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad brgya byin dang mnyam
123a1(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni/ tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i
123a2(mdo sde): bar du'ang mi bzod do/ /sred med kyi bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po dang mnyam pa'i bsod
123a3(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni/ dge bsnyen nag po'i mchog gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod
123a4(mdo sde): do| |sred med kyi bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge bsnyen nag po'i mchog dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi
123a5(mdo sde): phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni/ shA ri'i bu'i shes rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod
123a6(mdo sde): do| |sred med kyi bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad shA ri'i bu dang mnyam pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes dang /
123a7(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni/ rang sangs rgyas gcig gi shes rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod
123b1(mdo sde): pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do/ /sred med kyi bu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang /
123b2(mdo sde): ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges par byung nas bskal pa lnga brgya lon pa'i shes
123b3(mdo sde): rab dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do/ /thams cad la'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/ sred med kyi bu/ 'di ni/ bsod
123b4(mdo sde): nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ mi sum khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
123b5(mdo sde): bskyed do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /lha dang mi'i sil snyan dag kyang grag go /lha dang mi'i me tog gi sprin dag kyang bab
123b6(mdo sde): ste| me tog gi sprin de dag gis sa chen po 'di pus mo nub tsam du bkram mo/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
123b7(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
124a1(mdo sde): bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / skyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba gang dag lags pa de dag gis ni/
124a2(mdo sde): bdag cag zil gyis gnon to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ sems can de dag gi don bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag
124a3(mdo sde): gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ sems can gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma zhugs pa de dag ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin
124a4(mdo sde): las mngon par byung ba'ang ma lags/ de dag thams cad ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la yang dag par gzhol ba'ang ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan
124a5(mdo sde): 'das| gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mngon
124a6(mdo sde): par byung ba'ang lags/ de dag thams cad ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la yang dag par gzhol ba'ang lags so/ /le'u dang po'o// //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus
124b1(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par bgyid pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshan po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad ces
124b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
124b3(mdo sde): sems mi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos gcig pu 'di ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bsod nams
124b4(mdo sde): thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mnyan pa'i chos yongs su tshol bas chog mi shes pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i
124b5(mdo sde): chos la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos 'di gnyis ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang
124b6(mdo sde): bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos
124b7(mdo sde): rnams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos gsum po de dag ni/ bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed
125a1(mdo sde): pa'o| |rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par byed pa'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul
125a2(mdo sde): khrims yongs su dag pa dang / lta ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab yongs su dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi po de dag ni/ bsod nams
