274b7(mdo sde): pas theg pa chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang dag par mdud pa gcod pa/ skye ba med pa'i tshor ba bsod pa bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu'i chos kyi ming ci zhes
275a1(mdo sde): bgyi| chos kyi gzhung de nos te gzungs su bzung na/ bsod nams ji tsam zhig thob/ sangs rgyas kyi byams pa'i thugs rjes bdag la bkrol bshad par
275a2(mdo sde): smon to| |sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ pho dge ba/ chos kyi yi ge 'di'i ming ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'or bar dgongs pas yang
275a3(mdo sde): dag par gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mtshor chud par gsungs so/ /sems can la la zhig gis chos kyi yi ge 'di gzungs su 'dzin pa gcig yod na/ chos kyi yi ge thams cad
275a4(mdo sde): la ci'ang re zhing btsal ba med/ chos kyi yi ge 'dis ni/ chos kun gyi mdo btus te/ chos so cog gi gces pa bsdus so/ /chos kyi yi ge rnams kyi phyi mo'i bsam pa ste/
275a5(mdo sde): chos kyi yi ge 'di'i ming ni/ theg pa chen po bsdus so/ /yang ming rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin ces kyang bya'o/ /yang ming dpag tu med pa'i gzhung gi phyi mo zhes kyang bya ste/ mi la la
275a6(mdo sde): zhig gis chos kyi yi ge 'di nos te gzungs su 'dzin pa zhig yod na/ de brgya stong gis sangs rgyas gzungs su 'dzin pa ste/ de lta bu'i legs pa'i don ni/ dper nam mkha'
275a7(mdo sde): dang mtshungs mu mtha' med de/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi yi ge 'di gtams bcol to/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ ji lta bu'i sems spyod pa dang / ji lta bu'i mis chos
275b1(mdo sde): kyi yi ge nos shing gzungs su 'dzin/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ pho dge ba/ chos kyi yi ge 'di nos shing gzungs su 'dzin pa'i mi de ni/ sems thob pa dang / stor ba med la
275b2(mdo sde): rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ 'gran tor brjod pa la'ang rtag par mi g.yo ba'i sems la dad de/ grong khyim du zhugs pa'ang sems rtag par thub pa la 'dug go /khyim du 'dug
275b3(mdo sde): na'ang yod pa gsum la ma chags pa de lta bu'i da ltar gyi tshe'i dus la dpal yon rnam pa lnga yod de/ gcig ni/ phal gyis btsun zhing gus pa'o/ /gnyis ni/ lus ye 'drog tu mi
275b4(mdo sde): 'chi ba'o/ /gsum ni/ yon po chad pa yid myur du lan lon pa'o/ /bzhi ni/ sems can bsgral ba la sred pa'o/ /lnga ni/ 'phrul gyi lam du 'jug nus pa ste/ de lta bu'i mis ni/
275b5(mdo sde): chos kyi yi ge 'di nos shing gzungs su 'dzin to/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ de lta bu'i mis ni/ sems can rnams bsal la yon blang du rung ngam mi rung / sangs rgyas kyis
275b6(mdo sde): gsungs pa/ de lta bu'i mis ni/ sems can rnams kyi phyir dpal zhing chen po byas nas rtag par shes rab chen po spyad de/ dpal gyi rang bzhin bden pa gnyis ka gnas/ dge
275b7(mdo sde): 'dun gyi gzhi rten pa yin te/ yon rnams la mgo dang / mig dang / rkang pa dang / klad pa de kun kyang blang du rung na/ gos dang kha zas blang du rung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ pho dge
276a1(mdo sde): ba| de lta bu'i mi ni/ khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin/ khyod kyi zam pa yin na/ mi tha mal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos na yon mi 'bul/ dga' bos gsol pa/
276a2(mdo sde): mi de la chos kyi yi ge nos te gzungs su bzung ba yon phul na/ mi des dpal yon ji tsam thob/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ yang mi la la zhig gis mkhar gang ba'i gser
276a3(mdo sde): dngul khyer te sbyar bar byas pas mi des chos kyi yi ge bshad zin nas de'i tshe dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / phal sde bzhin kun shin tu dga' ste/ sems kyis yang
276a4(mdo sde): dag pa'i mir gyur pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te dga' nas gus par spyod do/ /rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos kyi yi ge rdzogs so// //
276a5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sa mA d+hi a gra ut+ta ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin mchog dam pa/ bam po gcig go /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
276a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun sum khri dang / byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po lnga stong tsam dang / lha dang / klu la sogs pa sde brgyad dang /
276a7(mdo sde): lha dang / mi la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de ma yin pa gzhan yang phyogs bzhi'i mgon po bzhi dang / srin po dang / yi dwags la sogs pa sde
276b1(mdo sde): bzhi'ang 'khor der 'dus par gyur to/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas cang ma gsung zhing bzhugs pa las 'khor mang po rnams the tshom du
276b2(mdo sde): g yur to| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu chos kyi rgyal bu 'dug pa las langs te sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
276b3(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do/ /shin tu legs so chos kyi rje/ /ting nge 'dzin la zhi bar bzhugs/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po rnams/ /thams cad the tshom skyes par gyur/ /shin
276b4(mdo sde): tu legs so nyi zla'i 'od/ /cang mi gsung bar snang mi mdzad/ /shin tu legs so rin chen gter/ /dbul phongs rnams la sbyin mi mdzad/ /shin tu legs so mi yi rgyal/ /ting
276b5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin las bzhengs su gsol/ /shin tu legs so klu yi rgyal/ /bdud rtsi'i char pa dbab tu gsol/ /shin tu legs so lha yi mchog /myur du chos rnams bstan du gsol/ /
276b6(mdo sde): shin tu legs so sems can la/ /theg pa gcig don bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces
276b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /nga la rin po che bla na med pa'i ye shes mang du yod pa khyod la phan pa dang bde bar mdzad cing dbul phongs pa dang bral bar bya ba yod kyi/ the tshom ma byed par ci
277a1(mdo sde): dang ci 'dod pa dris shig / de nas dga' bo stan las langs te sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ mang du thos pas
277a2(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du 'thob snyam na/ mdo sde dag las bshad pa thos pa ltar na mang du thos shing shes rab rno ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa ni/ byang chub thob pa shin tu
277a3(mdo sde): dka' ste/ bgegs brgyad du skye'o/ /zhes 'byung na/ bdag gis ji ltar bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga'
277a4(mdo sde): bo| mang du thos pa la sems rnam pa gnyis te/ gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dang / 'khrul pa'i sems so/ /sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas na ni/ mang du thos pas kyang
277a5(mdo sde): gnod pa med do/ /sems 'khrul pa la gnas na ni/ mang du thos pas kyang phan pa med de/ gang gis ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang shin tu ldan na/ myur du bla na med
277a6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du mdo kun las ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab ni/ mchog dam pa'o/ /zhes bstod/
277a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab tu ldan pa ni/ dper na/ ri dwags kyi nang na seng+ge mchog tu gyur pa dang / snang ba
277b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nang na nyi ma mchog tu gyur pa dang / ri'i nang na ri rab lhun po mchog tu gyur pa lta bu'o/ /de'ang ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab tu ldan pa'i shugs ni/
277b2(mdo sde): mchog dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ gal te mi zhig gis shing tsan+dan las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
277b3(mdo sde): khams gang ba'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa dang / mi gzhan zhig gis rin po che sna bdun las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas
277b4(mdo sde): na| mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams mnyam pa yin nam/ dga' bos gsol pa/ mi de gnyis kyi nang na rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i bsod nams mchog go /sangs rgyas kyis dga'
277b5(mdo sde): bo la bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang mi zhig gis gser tha mal pa las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas pa dang / mi gzhan zhig gis
277b6(mdo sde): gser btso ma las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na/ de gnyis kyi bsod nams mnyam pa yin nam/ dga' bos gsol pa/
277b7(mdo sde): gser btso ma las byas pa'i bsod nams rab tu che'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi zhig gis shing tsan+dan dang / spos kyi shing gzhan dag las stong
278a1(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i sku gzugs byas te mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / mi gzhan zhig gis gser btso ma dang /
278a2(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i sku gzugs byas te mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal na/ mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams la
278a3(mdo sde): khyad par yod dam/ dga' bos gsol pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang / gser btso ma las sku gzugs bgyis pa'i bsod nams che'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal
278a4(mdo sde): pa| gal te mi zhig gis sbyin pa chen po'i sems bskyed de rin po che sna bdun gyi bang mdzod dang / chung ma dang / bu sbyin pa byin pa dang / mi gzhan zhig gis yan lag gi dam
278a5(mdo sde): pa mgo dang / mig dang / lus dang / rnyed dka' ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi bang mdzod kyi sbyin pa byin na/ mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams la khyad par ci yod/ dga' bos gsol
278a6(mdo sde): pa| rin po che sna bdun dang / lus dang / chung ma dang / bur bcas pa'i sbyin pa'i bsod nams che ba lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi zhig
278a7(mdo sde): gis mdo sde bcu gnyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i mi rnams la 'jig rten du spel te klog cing kha ton byed du 'jug pa dang / de la mi zhig
278b1(mdo sde): gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i mi rnams yi ge bzhin du 'don cing yi ge dang don stong cing khong du chud na/ mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang che/
278b2(mdo sde): dga' bos gsol pa/ yi ge bzhin du 'don cing khong du chud pa'i bsod nams che'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang
278b3(mdo sde): thogs pa med par kha ton du shes la don zab mo mi shes par mdo sde glegs bam yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam 'chang ba dang / de la mi
278b4(mdo sde): zhig mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang byang bar kha ton shes la don zab mo'ang rtogs te/ mdo sde'i glegs bam yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam 'chang
278b5(mdo sde): na| mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang mchog tu gyur pa yin/ dga' bos gsol pa/ kha ton bgyis la don yang rtogs te/ gzhan la'ang ston cing 'chad pa'i bsod nams
278b6(mdo sde): mchog tu gyur pa lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis 'grel cing 'chad la/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang /
278b7(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms mi spyod pa dang / gal te mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad la/ sbyin pa dang /
279a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyang rgya cher spyod/ sems can rnams la bu gcig pa dang
279a2(mdo sde): 'dra bar sems snyoms na/ mi de gnyis bsod nams gang che ba yin/ dga' bos gsol pa/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / tshul khrims
279a3(mdo sde): dang / bzod pa spyod cing sems can la sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams che zhing mang ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi zhig gis
279a4(mdo sde): mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang 'grel cing 'chad shes la bstan bcos 'u ta bco lnga yang byang bar 'chad shes te 'jig rten du spel ba dang / de la mi zhig gis mdo sde bcu gnyis
279a5(mdo sde): kyang 'grel cing 'chad shes la/ bkri ba'i bstan bcos dang / nges pa'i bstan bcos dang / phung po lnga'i bstan bcos dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi
279a6(mdo sde): bstan bcos dang / khams bco brgyad kyi bstan bcos dang / stong pa chen po'i bstan bcos dang / nyi zla'i bstan bcos dang / zla ba sbrin gyi bstan bcos dang / mdo sde
279a7(mdo sde): rgyan gyi bstan bcos dang / don dam pa nyid kyi bstan bcos dang / rdo rje snying po'i bstan bcos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bstan bcos dang / rnam par thar pa'i
279b1(mdo sde): sgo gsum gyi bstan bcos la sogs pa bstan bcos 'u ta bco lnga'ang shes la/ sbyin ba dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
279b2(mdo sde): snyoms kyang spyod de/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / sems gnyis su med cing nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang / sems can gyi skyon thams cad mi mthong zhing
279b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar snyoms te dgra sdang ba la'ang nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang / de la mi zhig gis phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la skur pa
279b4(mdo sde): mi 'de bas na/ mi de gnyis kyi bsod nams gang che ba yin/ dga' bos gsol ba/ phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la skur ba ma btab na/ mi de'i bsod nams tshad ma
279b5(mdo sde): mchis grangs ma mchis te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang mi zhig gi gong du smras pa'i bsod nams thams
279b6(mdo sde): cad kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang bar byed nus la mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / bstan bcos 'u ta bco lnga snyed kyang kha ton dang 'grel cing 'chad nus te/
279b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa'ang spyod/ sbyin pa'ang byed de/ mang du thos pa'i mchog tu'ang gyur la chos thams cad stong zhing zhi ba'i don yang ston te/ nyan
280a1(mdo sde): pa'i mngon bar shes pa lnga thob par byed de/ de ltar phan pa dang de ba'i don byas kyang des ni/ mi zhig nyin gcig gam/ mtshan gcig ting nge 'dzin du
280a2(mdo sde): zhugs pa tsam du mi phod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mang du thos pa'i gang zag ni/ ri'am rgya mtsho ltar nga rgyal gyi sems che'o/ /de ltar nga rgyal che ba ni/ ngan song du bskal pa
280a3(mdo sde): grangs med kyi bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba de las thar na'ang 'dab chags kyi byar skye bar 'gyur na/ mang du thos pa la phan pa ci yod/ gang la bsam
280a4(mdo sde): gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yod pa ni/ skye shi 'khor ba'i sdig kha na ma tho ba'i las lci ba byang bar nus so/ /mang du thos pa ni/ rtswa dang 'dra'o/ /ting nge 'dzin ni/ me dang 'dra'o/ /mang
280a5(mdo sde): du thos pa ni/ lcags dang 'dra'o/ /bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ gser dang 'dra'o/ /mang du thos pa ni/ rtsi bdug pa dang 'dra'o/ /bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ rtsi'i
280a6(mdo sde): sdong po dang 'dra'o/ /mang du thos pa ni/ gtsang po dang 'dra'o/ /bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ rgya mtsho dang 'dra ste/ ngas bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bsod nams dang /
280a7(mdo sde): yon tan bshad na/ zad pa'i mtha' med de/ bskal par yang mi rdzogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal gangs mngon sum du dran pa sngon 'das
280b1(mdo sde): pa'i dus na mang du thos pa'i skye bor gyur pa'i tshe 'jam dpal dang nga gnyis yod med gnyis la rtsod par gyur te/ 'jam dpal ni/ yod ces smra/ ngas ni/ med do/ /zhes smras te/
280b2(mdo sde): yod med gnyis kyi bden pa la rtsod par gyur te gcig tu ma chad do/ /tha ma tshe 'phos nas ngan song du skyes par gyur te/ bskal pa grangs med kyi bar du lcags kyi thu lum za
280b3(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /dmyal ba de las thar te sangs rgyas 'od srung dang phrad nas yod pa dang / med pa'i bden pa gnyis 'od srung gis 'di skad du bshad do/ /chos thams cad kyi rang
280b4(mdo sde): bzhin ni/ gcig tu nges shing chad pa med de/ khyed yod pa dang / med par smra ba ni/ don de lta bu ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba ste/ bden
280b5(mdo sde): pa 'di gnyis ni/ yod pa'ang ma yin la/ med pa'ang ma yin te/ khyed shes pa ni/ yi ge'i don shes par zad kyi/ don zab mo mi shes pas don 'di lta bu ni/ khyed dmus long
280b6(mdo sde): dam 'on pa lta bu yin na/ don zab mo 'di lta bu ji ltar shes shing rtogs par gyur ces bshad pa thos nas ri dben par song ste/ bdag nyid yid la byas nas bsam gtan gyi
280b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /zhag bdun lon pa dang bsam gtan zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum dang / ye shes rnam gsum dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
281a1(mdo sde): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di dag rtogs shing khong du chud par gyur te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis zhi ba ci'ang med par rtogs
281a2(mdo sde): so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na/ bsam gtan sgom pa ni/ mchog dam par rig par bya ste/ gang zhig nyin gcig gam/
281a3(mdo sde): mtshan gcig gam/ nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na/ bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad kyi kha na ma tho ba'i sdig lci ba'ang khad kyis zhi zhing
281a4(mdo sde): byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang kha na ma tho ba'i sdig lci ba'ang 'byang bar 'gyur te/ de'ang gang zhe na/ pha ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug

281a7(mdo sde): che ba dang / rang bzhin gyis sdig lci ba yang yin te/ de'ang bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na rang zhi zhing 'byang bar 'gyur/ de'ang bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
281b1(mdo sde): mthus 'byang gi / gzhan gyis 'byang ba ma yin no/ /nyin zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang de ltar yon tan dang / bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob na/ tshe gcig tu dben par ri dang

281b6(mdo sde): dang / brag ca dang / bar snang gi bya'i rjes lta bur rtogs so/ /'jig rten na srid pa ri dang / tshal dang / gtsang po dang / 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / rgya mtsho la sogs
281b7(mdo sde): pa chu thams cad kyang me'i bskal pa chen po byung ba'i tshe thams cad tshig cing zad par 'gyur yang bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi ma gtogs ta/

282a4(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du'ang phyin cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rlung dang / me dang / sa dang / chu dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma dang / gza' dang / ri dang / tshal
282a5(mdo sde): dang / chu dang / shing dang / lha'i pho brang dang / klu'i pho brang yang rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul nus te/ de bas na bsam gtan gyi mthu ni/ shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya/
282a6(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang sprul nus so/ /dga' bo/ /maud+gal gyi bu chen po ting nge
282a7(mdo sde): 'dzin du zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su sprul cing ting nge 'dzin gyis sa chen po 'di'ang mgal me bskor ba bzhin du bskyod nus te/ mang du thos pas ni/
282b1(mdo sde): de ltar mi nus par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la khyod sa chen po sgul cig cas bka' stsal pa dang / dga' bos gsol pa/ bdag la bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin
282b2(mdo sde): ma mchis pas sgul rngo mi thogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi ma thob kyang mang du thos
282b3(mdo sde): pa las khri phrag brgya stong gis 'phags so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na 'od ma'i tshal na gnas pa'i dge slong lnga brgya tsam zhig thams cad mang du thos bar rlom pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
282b4(mdo sde): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ maud+gal gyi bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin mchog go /zhes gsungs pa thos nas sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
282b5(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag mang du thos pa bslab ste mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang khod du chud pas
282b6(mdo sde): rgyal khams chen po bcu drug snyed kyang bdag cag la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar gus shing bkur sti bgyi na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa ni/ nam yang bla
282b7(mdo sde): na med pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la dge slong lnga brgya po mthun par dus gcig tu bdag cag ni/ mang du
283a1(mdo sde): thos pa spang zhing bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la slob bo zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong /khyed mang
283a2(mdo sde): du thos pa spangs te bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug go/ zhes ma smra zhig/ ngas bltas na/ khyed kyi shes rab ni/ sbrang bu'i 'dab mas nyi zla sgrib par 'dod pa dang /
283a3(mdo sde): dmus long gis ri rab lhun po la 'dzeg par 'dod pa dang / gru gzings med par rgya mtsho la rgal bar 'dod pa dang / bya 'dab ma chag pa nam mkha' la 'phur 'dod pa
283a4(mdo sde): bzhin khyed kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams shi ba tsam du 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
283a5(mdo sde): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod ma 'jigs ma skrag par sems ting nge 'dzin la zhog cig /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bdag cag la bsam gtan gyi
283a6(mdo sde): mthu'ang ma mchis na/ ting nge 'dzin du ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga la sman dam pa yod de/ khyed ting nge 'dzin thob par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal
283a7(mdo sde): pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ bdag cag gis de bzhin du spyod par 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
283b1(mdo sde): stsal pa| sman dam pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rtog pa dang / bsal ba dang / 'jug pa dang / spong ba'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsal pa/ rtog pa dang / bsal ba dang / 'jug pa
283b2(mdo sde): dang / spong ba ci lags bdag cag gis ma 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dang po'i sems ni/ rtog pa
283b3(mdo sde): zhes bya| sems gnyis byung ba ni/ bsal ba zhes bya/ sems gsum byung ba ni/ 'jug pa zhes bya/ sems bzhi byung ba ni/ spong ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ bsam
283b4(mdo sde): gtan dang po la rtog pa zhes bya/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la bsal ba zhes bya/ bsam gtan gsum pa la 'jug pa zhes bya/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la spong ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan
283b5(mdo sde): yang 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar
283b6(mdo sde): gzhag pa yin te/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa bzhi dang / chos thams cad ni/ 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / bden pa bzhi
283b7(mdo sde): dang / ting nge 'dzin bzhi dang / mtshan ma med pa bzhi dang / byang chub bzhi yin na/ dge slong khyed bsam gtan dang po'ang gsal bar ma rtogs na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang /
284a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad lta ci smos/ dge slong dag thabs sna tshogs kyis bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o/ /gal te mi gtsang ba la rtog na/ lus
284a2(mdo sde): kyi chen po bzhi bags pa dang / rus pa dang / tshigs pa dang / rang khrag zags pa dang / snod pu ga dgu yod pa'i nang du chu blugs na zag pa bzhin du mi gtsang ba'i dngos po
284a3(mdo sde): bshad gci che chung dang / btsog pha shin tu skyor rung ba zag pa mthong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin de las kyang dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs mthong ba ni/ 'di ltar g.yo ba dang / gnas pa
284a4(mdo sde): dang / rnam par sdos pa dang / rnam par ser ba dang / rnam par dkar ba dang / rnam par nag pa tha dad pa sna tshogs mthong bas sems ma 'khrul bar gyur na/ dngos po de dag
284a5(mdo sde): mthong ba'i tshe phyir bzlog par bya'o/ /rus pa dkar po dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bgrang ba'i rtog pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi nyams pa dang /
284a6(mdo sde): dge slong mas rtsa ba brgyad nyams pa dang / dge ba snyen mas khrims kyi rtsa ba lnga nyams pa dang / dge tshul gyis khrims bcu nyams pa dang / dge slong mas lci ba drug nyams
284a7(mdo sde): ba dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi spyi'i dkor brkus pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / pha ma dang / dge 'dun gyi dkor brkus pa dang /
284b1(mdo sde): phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde la skur ba'i gang zag de lta bu ni/ bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i tshe bdag gi lus dang / ngag rlung nag po lta bu dang / khrag ni/ me rab tu
284b2(mdo sde): 'bar ba 'dra ba dang / rus pa ni/ ri dang brag lta bu dang / rtswa ni/ shing lta bu dang / nang grol lnga ni/ sprul lam rtsangs pa lta bur mthong ba dang / lag na me chen po thogs te rlung chen
284b3(mdo sde): po la rgyug pa dang / mgo la ri chen po khyer zhing langs kyang rdab 'chos pa dang / kha nas seng+ge 'byung ba dang / mig nas 'bar ba mo 'byung ba dang / sna nas sbrul chen po 'byung ba
284b4(mdo sde): dang / rna ba nas 'phar spyad 'byung ba dang / bshang gci che chung chu lta bur 'bab cing rgya mtsho lta bur mthong ba dang / gal te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad cho 'phrul rnam pa
284b5(mdo sde): mang po ston pa mthong na/ mtshan ma de lta bu mthong ba'i tshe bsam gtan las langs te tshal lam ri dgon bar song ste phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'don cing 'gyod tshangs bya'o/ /
284b6(mdo sde): de ltar sngon gyi kha na ma tho ba'i sdig 'gyod tshangs bya ba'ang zhag bdun nam/ bdun gnyis sam/ bdun gsum mam/ bdun lnga'am/ bdun drug gam/ bdun
284b7(mdo sde): bdun gyi bar du mthol tshangs bya'o/ /de ltar sdig sbyangs nas bsam gtan bsgom par bya ste/ de la sdig chung ba ni/ bags kyis bdag gi lus bai DUR+ya'i ri lta bur mthong bar
285a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /gang rtsa ba bzhi ma nyams pa nas rang bzhin gyi khrims lci ba lnga'i bar du ma nyams pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin du 'jug pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
285a2(mdo sde): dus gcig tu chos ston pa dang / de yang na bden pa bzhi'am/ yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bzod pa'am/ spyi bo
285a3(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten mchog gi chos ston pa dang / yang na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / skyes bu ya brgyad kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid bzhi dang / ting nge
285a4(mdo sde): 'dzin gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad ston par mthong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin las mun nag mthong ba dang / snang ba mthong na/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs te shin tu dga'
285a5(mdo sde): ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag phyir gnas pa'i tshal du dong ste bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin nyin zhag bdun bsgoms pas thams cad
285a6(mdo sde): kyis dgra bcom pa thob par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags te sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ sangs rgyas kyis
285a7(mdo sde): bstan pa bzhin 'khor ba las thar te bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar thob na cho 'phrul bstan pa'i dus la bab bo/ /zhes
285b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong lnga brgya rnams steng gi bar snang la 'phags te nyal ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'gro ba dang / sdod pa dang / lus la me dang / chu la sogs pa 'byung ba'i cho
285b2(mdo sde): 'phrul rnam pa bco brgyad mngon par bstan te/ de'i tshe mang du thos pa'i dge slong rnams bsam gtan bsgoms pas maud+gal gyi bu chen po dang 'dra bar rdzu 'phrul tha mi dad par gyur to/ /
285b3(mdo sde): de nas dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos 'di de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas ji srid du gnas shing dus
285b4(mdo sde): ngan pa'i tshe sems can ji snyed cig chos 'di bsgoms pas/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ da da phyin chad dpyid
285b5(mdo sde): zla 'bring po la rtswa mchog gi grong khyer du mya ngan las 'da'o/ /nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgyad cu'i bar du chos la spyod pa'i sems can mang du 'byung ste/ dur khrod dang shing drung
285b6(mdo sde): na gnas shing 'di yid la byed de/ rtog pa dang / bsal ba dang / 'jug pa dang / spong ba'i chos spyod pa stong phrag bcu la stong phrag dgus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur
285b7(mdo sde): ro| |lo sum brgya'i bar du ni/ sems can stong phrag brgya la stong phrag bcus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lo sum brgya phan chad/ lo lnga brgya tshun chad ni/
286a1(mdo sde): nga'i nye gnas rnams bags kyis mi dge ba'i chos spyod do/ /phrag dog gi sems kyis log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag lnga brgya la stong phrag
286a2(mdo sde): bcus dge sbyong gi 'bras bu thob bo/ /lo lnga brgya phan chad/ brgyad brgya tshun chad nga'i nye gnas rnams khyim pa'i gos gyon nas ba lang dang / lug dang / byi la dang / bong bu
286a3(mdo sde): dang / rta gso zhing 'bru mang po gsog ste/ rang gi lag dar zhing rang za ba dang / bran pho dang / bran mo'ang gso bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe stong phrag stong la stong phrag gcig gis
286a4(mdo sde): dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/ /lo brgyad brgya phan chad nas lo stong tshun chad ni/ nga'i nye gnas rnams sdig pa'i chos bslab ste/ rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang /
286a5(mdo sde): blon po chen po dang / khyim bdag la grogs por bsten cing phan tshun tha na 'phrin gyis 'drul zhing / zhing rmo brko byed de/ 'bru gzan mang po dang / gser dang / dngul dang /
286a6(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gsog cing sha za zhing chang 'thung ste chen po bzhi gso zhing rtas par byed pa dang / smad tshong ma ltar gos spu gu gyon zhing 'drid pa dang / slu ba'i las byed
286a7(mdo sde): de| de la 'bum phrag khri la brgya tsam zhig gis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob bo/ /lo stong phan chad/ sum brgya tshun chad ni/ che thang du 'khrugs te/ nga'i nye gnas rnams
286b1(mdo sde): lus chos gos gyon yang shing gi kha la 'phan rnying btags pa 'dra ste/ gzi byin yang med/ khyim pas mthong na'ang bkur sti mi byed pas sha na pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i dus
286b2(mdo sde): na yul khams kyang 'khrugs te/ gcig la gcig dgra byed cing gsod pas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pha ma dang / bu dang / bu mo'ang gcig la gcig dgra byed de/ byams
286b3(mdo sde): pa dang / snying brtse ba'i sems kyang med pas bza' ba dang / btung bas nyon mongs te/ khyim thab med pa dang / chung ma med pa dang / bu pho med pa dang / bu mo med pa dang / long
286b4(mdo sde): ba dang / 'on pa dang / lkugs pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / bran pho dang / bran mo las bros pa/ yul khams phung bar byed pa/ 'tsho bas rang mi sos pa dag nga'i chos la zhugs
286b5(mdo sde): nas khyim pa rnams kyis kyang rngon pa dang 'dra bar lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i glang dang / rta rgod dam/ bal glang myos pa ltar gdul dka' ba/ rang dgar yang 'gro ba/ slob dpon
286b6(mdo sde): dang / slob ma'ang mi rgod ma rungs pa dang 'dra ste/ 'dod chags la bag med par spyod cing / bla ma dang / 'og ma'i rim pa'ang med pa dang / bzang ngan gyi rim pa'ang med de/ dud
286b7(mdo sde): 'gro phyugs dang 'dra ba/ kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa mang po byed cing ngan song gsum gyis mi 'jigs par gar song bar gnas kyang chang tshong ba dang / shan pa dang / rngon pa dang /
287a1(mdo sde): smad tshong ma dang sten cing 'grogs pa/ kha nas kyang ngag sdig pa smra zhing sems la'ang sdig pa sems pa dang / yang na blon po dang sten cing dge ba'i mi dag la
287a2(mdo sde): thabs sna tshogs kyis bsdigs shing nor 'phrog ste bu smad gso'o/ /yang na rngon pa'i yo byad nya rgya la sogs pa 'chang zhing nya la sogs pa bcus nas rang gi lag bdar te
287a3(mdo sde): gsod pa dang / sreg pa dang / zla ba nya ba dang / shi ba'i tshe gso sbyong mi byed de rang nyams su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi las byed pa rnams phan tshun rtsod cing / bla ma dang /
287a4(mdo sde): 'og ma dang / grogs po la zhe sdang ba dang / gdug pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / slob dpon dang / slob ma'ang gcig la gcig skyon 'dru zhing 'phya ba dang / sgrog pa'i gtam
287a5(mdo sde): smra ste| dper na/ rtsangs pa mang po kun gcig tu 'dus pa dang 'dra ba dang / phan tshun dpung dang sde tshan gcig la gcig tshig ngan gyis sma 'bebs pa dang / bla 'og gi
287a6(mdo sde): rim pa'ang med pa dang / mi rgod ma rungs pa ltar dge ba byed pa las 'phrog rlom byed pa dang / khe dang grags pa la chags te chos mi shes par gyur pa de'i tshe mdo sde bcu
287a7(mdo sde): gnyis kyang nub par gyur te klog pa dang / 'don pa'ang med pa dang / de'i slob ma rnams kyang dgra chos dang / gtsug lag dang / yi ge dang / rtse ba dang / bzhon pa dang / bon
287b1(mdo sde): chos dang / mig mang dang / glu gar dang / 'du ba dang / sbyugs pa dang / 'phong rtsal dang / rta rgyug pa la sogs pa'i chos ma yin pa slob cing spyod de/ de ltar ma legs pa'i chos
287b2(mdo sde): spyod pas tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song du lhung ste/ bskal pa grangs med par ngan song gi sdug bsngal myong nas de las thar nas yang byol song du skye ste/ ltogs pa dang /
287b3(mdo sde): skom pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / khal lci ba 'gal zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi zhig na sbyangs pa'i yon tan slob pa'ang chos ma yin pa mang du byed de/ ri dang /
287b4(mdo sde): tshal dang / dur khrod dang / shing drung na mi gnas shing rtag tu grong du rgyug ste/ sems la rtog pa mang zhing khe dang grags pa tshol te/ nor rdzas dang / longs spyod la chags
287b5(mdo sde): shing chog mi shes pa dang / chos ston pa'i bshad mkhan zhig yin na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa'ang khri tsam la gcig tsam yang thog tu mi phebs te/ 'khor mang po dang
287b6(mdo sde): 'grogs nas grong rgyu zhing khyim pa'i khyim du zhugs nas khyim pa la chos ston pa'ang khe dang grags pa'i phyir te/ longs spyod mang du gsog cing shan pa dang 'dra'o/ /sha dang
287b7(mdo sde): chang la mi spyod pa dag gis dge slong dag/ khyed ni/ btsun pa khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba yin na/ snying rje'i sems kyang med de/ 'di ltar chos ma yin pa mang du
288a1(mdo sde): spyod pas khyed ni/ shan pa dang 'dra'o/ /zhes spyod zhing brgyad par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong de dag de skad gshe ba thos nas kun log ste/ de la rdeg pa dang /
288a2(mdo sde): gshe ba dang / brgyad bkag ste gcig la gcig 'di skad du smra'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i tshe na ni/ nged sha dang chang 'thung ba ma gnang ste/ da nged de bzhin
288a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas da ni/ ci'ang gnang ba deng sha dang chang 'thung ba yin no/ /khyim pa dang bral ba'i 'og tu de dag gcig la gcig bdag cag gis shes
288a4(mdo sde): pa ni| sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas gsungs pa dang 'dra'o/ /zhes smra zhing / la la ni/ tshig kyal pa dang / don med pa'i tshig dang / 'gran dor gyi tshig dang / 'khrul pa'i tshig tu gtam
288a5(mdo sde): smra zhing dper na/ dmus long zhig mdzub mo gnyis nyi ma la btsugs te/ nyi ma ya gi ni/ byin chung ngo / /yangs so/ /dog go / zhes smra ba'am/ mi 'on pa zhig bdag gis gnam
288a6(mdo sde): gyi steng na chos 'chad pa'i sgra thos so/ /zhes zer ba dang 'dra bar dmus long mang po tshogs te 'jig rten na 'jam dpal dang / 'od srung chen po la sogs pa sprul te/ de'i nang
288a7(mdo sde): na bzhugs kyang kun gyis rdeg cing gshe ste/ de nas skrod cing 'dug tu mi ster ro/ /gzhan yang dper na/ seng+ge ni/ spos kyi ri la gnas te/ ri dwags dang / gcan gzan gang
288b1(mdo sde): yang gnas der nye mi bzod do/ /seng+ge ri de las byung ste song ba'i 'og tu ni/ gcan gzan gdug pa khro ba la sogs pa gcig gis gcig bos te spos kyi ri la lhags nas 'bras bu
288b2(mdo sde): zhim po za zhing chu mig la 'thung ngo / /de ltar za zhing 'thung ba las thams cad bskams shing med par gyur te/ spos kyi ri la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang skyo ba par mi 'gyur bas rtswa
288b3(mdo sde): gdug pa skyes te zos ma thag tu tshe'i dus byas par 'gyur ro/ /nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong thams cad kyis ngas bstan pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis 'don cing klog pa'ang
288b4(mdo sde): gong ma ni/ bar du bcug/ bar ma ni/ 'og tu bcug/ 'og ma ni/ gong du bcug/ bar ma ni/ 'og dang / tha mar bcug ste/ don ma yin pa la don zhes zer/ don la ni/ don ma
288b5(mdo sde): yin zhes zer te/ ji ltar mu stegs can dag so so nas nga'i gzhung ni/ bden pa yin no/ /zhes zer ba dang 'dra'o/ /de'i dus na mdo sde bcu gnyis 'jig rten na spyod kyang gzi
288b6(mdo sde): brjid dang / mthu med do/ /la la zhig 'don tam klog kyang mi gcig 'ga' yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob pa med do/ /de ltar nga'i slob ma rnams kyang rgyal po srid stor
288b7(mdo sde): pa'am/ bya 'dab ma med pa dang 'dra ste/ gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten yang stongs shing zhig ral gso ba'ang med do/ /de ltar sku gzugs dang / ba dan dang / rin po che'i
289a1(mdo sde): gdugs yod pa'ang dgra cha zhig pa dang 'dra ste/ phug ron dang / bye'u dang / phag dang / khyi dang / lug la sogs pa'i tshang dang / gnas su 'gyur ro/ /dge
289a2(mdo sde): slong so so na 'dug pa'i gnas ni/ byi dor bzang du byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 'di'ang khyed la mdo tsam zhig bshad pa yin no/ /dga'
289a3(mdo sde): bos sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas mchi ma blags te ngus so/ /de ltar dga' bos yid gdung zhing du ba ma btang ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka'
289a4(mdo sde): stsal pa| khyod de ltar ma du bar mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung la 'jig rten du rgyas par spel cig/ de nas dga' bos gdong mchi ma phyis nas bcom ldan 'das la bdag
289a5(mdo sde): gis gzungs su gzung ngo / /zhes gsol to/ /brgya byin dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyis kyang dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag gis yongs su bzung ste/
289a6(mdo sde): gang zhig mdo sde 'di ri'am/ tshal lam/ shing drung ngam/ pas mtha' ma/ dur khrod na gnas te 'don tam/ klog na/ bdag cag gis lha dang mi'i 'khor dang / mi ma yin
289a7(mdo sde): ba dang bcas te gnas der 'gro zhing chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig gcig tsam yang mi brjed mi nyams par gzung ngo / /zhes gsol to/ /mdo sde 'di
289b1(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i tshe dge slong stong snyed kyis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par gyur to/ /dge slong ma stong lnga brgyas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /dge bsnyen lnga brgya
289b2(mdo sde): yongs su dag par gyur te/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pas phyag byas nas phyir dong ngo / /'phags pa ting nge 'dzin mchog dam pa rdzogs so// //
289b3(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ma hA san ni pA ta rat+na ke tu d+hA ra NI nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
289b4(mdo sde): mdo| bam po dang po/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa chen po dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la phyag btsas te bdud kyi 'khor
289b5(mdo sde): gyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba'i zungs 'di sbyor bar bgyi'i/ bdag gis rig sngags 'di grub par gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ a bA me a bA me/ aM ba re/ aM ba re/ pa ru kun dza

290a2(mdo sde): po| |bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par

296b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kyi shes rab kyis ni las dang nyon mongs sred pa'i myu gu rab tu bsal/ /de yi sman chad thub pa ji snyed sems
296b4(mdo sde): can don 'dir 'di ltar sdug bsngal spro/ /gtso bo 'gro ba 'di na khyod kyi snod 'gyur skye bo gang na'ang ma mchis te/ /dus 'di lags na skyon dang bral khyod ci yi slad du mya ngan myur mi
296b5(mdo sde): 'da'| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'dul gang 'khod sems can mtshungs med gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /ngas mthong de dag nga yi snying rjes thar par bya ba yin/ /'gro ba
296b6(mdo sde): rab 'bring ngan par gyur pa thar te mthar thug na/ /de nas mya ngan 'da' yi blo gros ngan pa g.yos ci bskul/ /de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la
296b7(mdo sde): bcags te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug pa dang / de'i mod la bdud kyi gnas na 'khod pa'i sems can kun phan
297a1(mdo sde): tshun 'di skad du ci'i rgyus bdag cag gi rgyal po chen po 'di mya ngan gyi khang bar zhugs te 'dug pa su'ang mi shes so/ /zhes 'dri'o/ /de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga
297a2(mdo sde): brgya tsam rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / breng ba dang / byug pa thogs te rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang / lha ba lhub dag gis bdag cag
297a3(mdo sde): brgyan nas rab tu yid du 'ong zhing mos par byed pa'i lha'i sil snyan byas te/ rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs gyis glu len/ gar pa byed cing yan lag la dang ldan pa'i lha'i sil
297a4(mdo sde): snyan dag byas nas dga' ba'i rtsed mo dang ldan par bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang / bdud sdig can des lag pa gnyis bsgrengs nas pos te sgra ma byed/ sgra ma
297a5(mdo sde): byed ces smras pa dang / yud tsam zhig lha'i bu mo dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /yang glu rab tu blangs shing sil snyan byas pa dang / bdud sdig can gyis lag pa gnyis g.yabs
297a6(mdo sde): te bos so/ /lha'i bu mo de dag gis dga' ba dang ldan pa'i glu dang / gang dang / sil snyan lan bdun gyi bar du byas pa dang / yang de bzhin du bdud sdig can de lag pa bsgrengs
297a7(mdo sde): nas 'bod cing sgra ma byed/ sgra ma byed ces zer ro/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de nas lha'i bu mo dbyangs snyan glog ces bya bas
297b1(mdo sde): bdud sdig can ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /gtso bo khyod kyis deng 'dir 'chi 'pho'i ltas shig gzigs sam ci/ /'on tam ci zhig de ring
297b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba zhugs kyis 'khrugs gyur tam/ /'on te 'di ni khyod dgra stobs chen 'ga' zhig mchis lags sam/ /ci yi slad du khyed ni dgyes par mi bzhugs thugs ngan mdzad/ /bdud
297b3(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ nga la dgra yod pa ni stobs ldan sems thul pa/ /sa steng shAkya'i bu pho sgyu ma bslabs pa'i blo/ /de ni ci nas gal te brlags par ma gyur na/ /de yis nga yi 'dod khams
297b4(mdo sde): 'di ni stong par byed/ /lha'i bu mos smras pa/ gtso bo srid gsum bcings sred rgya mtsho mtha' ring la/ /zad bgyid nus pa'i stobs dang ldan pa su zhig mchis/ /bdag po thabs stobs
297b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rtsal rnams gang gis kyang / /de la de ring ma lus bgyid par nus ma mchis/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ sbyin dang brtul zhugs bsam pa smon lam snying rje'i zhags pa
297b6(mdo sde): can| |stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang gzhu thogs te/ /'khor ba las byung rab tu zhi ba'i lam dang mthun gyur nas/ /srid pa ma lus zlog pa nye bar bstan par byed
297b7(mdo sde): pa po| |de yi slob ma bsam gtan la ni mngon par brtson yid kyis/ /dpen par rgyu zhing nyes pa zad par bya phyir khor zug tu/ /cho ga bzhin du zhugs nas grong dang grong khyer stong
298a1(mdo sde): pa dang / /nags kyi nang dag dang ni ri yi sman ljongs rnams na gnas/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ni stobs dang nying rje'i grogs dang ldan pa yi/ /dam pa nye rgyal bang
298a2(mdo sde): nas skyes gnyis thub pas btul par 'gyur/ /rab du la chos can 'jig rten gsum kun cho ga bzhin du btul/ /des ni nga yi 'dod khams 'di dag stong bar byed par 'gyur/ /
298a3(mdo sde): de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis bdud sdig can las bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
298a4(mdo sde): rnam pa dang bral ba'i glog ces bya ba thob bo/ /de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i sil snyan dang / lha'i me tog dang /
298a5(mdo sde): bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lhab lhub dang / spud pa dang / rgyan de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor ba dang / lha'i me tog dang / sil
298a6(mdo sde): snyan nas rgyan gyi bar du de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal du bab par gyur te/ /bdud kyi bu mo de dag kyang g.yog dang bcas pas so so nas bcom
298a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das mthong ngo / /de dag gis mthong nas kyang rab tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa skyes par gyur to/ /gang gi phyir 'od ma'i tshal du 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu ba bces
298b1(mdo sde): dge slong de dag theg tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shA ri'i bu dang / maud+gal gyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa 'di gnyis la ngo mtshar dang / rmad du
298b2(mdo sde): byung ba chen po sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog gi char chen po rab tu bab pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di'i rgyu ci lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
298b3(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyi mthu ma yin te/ bdud sdig can gyi g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam gyis bdud kyi khang pa de nas nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char
298b4(mdo sde): chen po nas rgyan gyi bar gyi char phab bo/ /de dag ring por mi thogs par 'dir 'ongs te/ nga las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo/ /de nas
298b5(mdo sde): bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag so so nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung dang / brjod pa'i dbyangs thos nas bcom ldan 'das la de bas kyang rab tu dga' ba skyes te/ de dag
298b6(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / rangs pa des byang chub kyi sems brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /de nas yang bdud kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi khang pa der gos phrag pa gcig tu
298b7(mdo sde): bgos te bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i phyogs der bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sred chu
299a1(mdo sde): ma lus skyem pa 'gro ba'i mig gcig pu/ /mig ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten kun la gzigs nas ni/ /khyod deng lha dang mir bcas pa yi 'gro ba sgrol/ /thub pa bdag
299a2(mdo sde): cag ji ltar myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lha dang mis mchod don dam gsung ba bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag cag mthun par bud med smad pa nyid spangs nas/ /blo mchog khyod kyi
299a3(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi drung du myur bar ni/ /mchis nas 'di bzhin thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung mnyan to/ /bdag med gsung ba don dam gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das/ /byang chub yan lag
299a4(mdo sde): rin chen dri med nor gsung sgron/ /mtshungs med bdud kyi stobs btul khyod kyis bdag cag la/ /da ltar myur du lhan cig byang chub lung bstan gsol/ /de nas bdud kyi bu
299a5(mdo sde): mo de dag stan las langs nas mgrin gcig tu bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /nyes byas blo gros can khyod snying po med g.yo ba'i/ /dpal rnyed ci phyir bcom ldan
299a6(mdo sde): 'das la sdang bar sems/ /dregs pas gos nas skye ba la sogs sdug bsngal gyis/ /lus kun gtses te mi bzad gnas su nye bar song / /de ltar khro ba sdangs te rgyal la dad
299a7(mdo sde): par gyis/ /'khor ba'i nyes pa dregs pa'i 'dam las thar pa'i bdag/ 'di ni nyid kyis 'gro ba kun gyi ngo bo mkhyen/ /thugs rje can gyi skyabs su 'dong gi myur du bzhud/ /
299b1(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can shin tu gdug pa'i yid dang ldan pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas la/ gang g.yog mo
299b2(mdo sde): lnga brgya tsam 'di dag bdag nyid bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong bar byas te 'di nas bzlog la 'gro mi nus par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / bdud des de dag bcing bar ma nus
299b3(mdo sde): so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam de dag bdud
299b4(mdo sde): sdig can gyi drung nas dong pa dang / de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te de 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag gis yang 'di 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par
299b5(mdo sde): b yas te| ci nas bdag gis g.yog mo de dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad 'khrul nas dge sbyong gau ta ma mi mthong zhing slar yang bdag gi gnas su 'ong bar nam
299b6(mdo sde): mkha' 'di dag thams cad du rnam par 'thor rlung dang / rlung nag po chen pos kun tu khyab par bya'o/ /snyam na'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis rlung cung zad
299b7(mdo sde): kyang langs par byed ma nus so/ /tha na skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang bskyod ma nus na/ mang du lta ci smos/ de nas yang bdud sdig can rab tu khros shing sdug bsngal te yid
300a1(mdo sde): mi bde zhing yid la gcags nas du zhing skad chen pos rang gi bu dang / tshogs kyi 'khor la bos te bdud kyi gnas thams cad sgras gang bar
300a2(mdo sde): byas so/ /sdug ba'i bu dang tshogs kyi 'khor rnams tshur shog cig / nga ni bdag yul rang gi rdzu 'phrul stobs las nyams/ /shAkya'i bu 'di sgyu ldan g.yo can ngag
300a3(mdo sde): 'jam la/ /khong nas rang bzhin dug sdong 'dra ba 'dir skyes so/ /de nas sgra des bdud kyi g.yog mo dang / bdud kyi bu mo de dag thams cad dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs
300a4(mdo sde): kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad rings pa'i gzugs kyis myur du lhags nas bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang / 'khor de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu rgyal ba'i
300a5(mdo sde): blo gros zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci slad thugs khros rab tu 'khrugs shing thugs mi dgyes/ /sreg bskal deng 'dir ma byung 'di nas
300a6(mdo sde): khyod ma 'phos/ /'di na khyod lhag dgra ni su yang ma mchis na/ /khyod ci rmongs par gyur tam ci slad gzhan du dgongs/ /bdud kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i bu pho dmangs
300a7(mdo sde): phal shing gi grib ma 'dug pa ma mthong ngam/ /ci phyir 'di na khyod kyi mdun na stobs dang ldan pa'i dgra med smras/ /stobs gcig ldan pa g.yo can de yis thams
300b1(mdo sde): cad rnams ba du mar bslus/ /bdag cag bu dang sder bcas me lce 'bar dang bcas pa'i me yis bsregs/ /'jig rten 'di na skyes bu gtso bo dpal dang brjod pa rnam grags
300b2(mdo sde): pa| |mkhas pa bstan bcos snyan dang gas mang po byed brtson mthun par myur bar yang / /chos kyi kyo ba btang gis drangs te shAkya'i bu 'di'i skyabs deng song / /lus mdzes
300b3(mdo sde): g.yo can blo gros ldan 'di nga yi dgrar ni rab tu gnad/ /rab tu sdug pa'i g.yog mo de dag snying rje med pas nga bor te/ /nga la dpang btsugs nas ni de ring dge sbyong de yi
300b4(mdo sde): skyabs su dong / /gal te bdag cag myur bsgrims stobs chen 'di deng thal bar ma byas na/ /g.yo dang sgyu srid pa gsum po de dag ma lus stong par byed/ /de nas
300b5(mdo sde): bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ltar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs kyi yul
300b6(mdo sde): gyi mthu dang / rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad bstan te shAkya'i bu 'di gal te thal bar bgyid nus pa de lta na ni/ legs/ de ltar ma nus na ni/ de la skyabs su mchi'o//
300b7(mdo sde): yab nyid kyi mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/ gang bdag cag sde chen pos yongs su bskor ba lags te/ sngar shAkya'i bu gcig pu gnyis su med pa 'dis rdzu 'phrul gyi
301a1(mdo sde): stobs kyis rab tu pham par bgyis na/ da g.yog mang por gyur pa lta ci smos/ bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag /dengs la gal
301a2(mdo sde): te dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di gsod nus na/ slar shog cig/ ci ste ma nus na'ang bdag cag gi gnas kyang bsrung gi /slar shog cig/ de nas bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag
301a3(mdo sde): bcu gnyis pho de dag de nas 'phags te/ 'di nas steng du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bkang nas de 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul drag po
301a4(mdo sde): bsten te/ gang gling bzhi pa'i nam mkha' thams cad sprin nag po chen po dang / rlung nag po chen po dang / skar mdas bkang nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab la'ang lag gis
301a5(mdo sde): brdabs te gling bzhi ba thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas nas shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams kyang 'byin te/ /de dag gis klu dang / klu chen po dang / gnod sbyin
301a6(mdo sde): dang | gnod sbyin chen po dag gis sa chen po brag dang rir bcas pa thams cad dang ldan pa dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang g.yos par rig /mtsho dang / mtsho chen po
301a7(mdo sde): dang | 'bab chu dang / chu bran dang / 'bab chu chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyang 'khrugs par rig nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do/ /bdud kyi 'khor de
301b1(mdo sde): dag ni| ri rab kyi zom la 'khod nas dpag tshad tsam gyi rdo'i char mngon par sprul te nam mkha' las kun tu 'bebs so/ /ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / rdo ba dang / mtshon
301b2(mdo sde): rtse gnyis dang / ste'u ka ma dang / lcags mda' dang / sprul gri dang / spu gri lta bu dang / dgra sta dang / ste'u so lta bu dang / ste'u so dang / kha rad rdo can dang / shin tu rad rod can
301b3(mdo sde): dang | sra ba/ drag pa/ rtsub pa/ rno ba'i char rab tu sprul te kun tu phab bo/ /zhes de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
301b4(mdo sde): par zhugs te/ gang rdo dang / mtshon cha de dag thams cad ni/ lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po'i me
301b5(mdo sde): tog gi char chen por byin gyis brlabs/ yul ang+ga ma ga d+har skar mda' ltung ba ni/ spos kyi char chen por byin gyis brlabs/ sgra de ni/ rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs su byin gyis
301b6(mdo sde): brlabs te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra
301b7(mdo sde): dang | dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang / bdud bzhi pham par bya ba'i sgra dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i sgra dang / len pa dang bcas pa dang / len pa med pa'i bar gyi sgrar
302a1(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs so/ /rdul dang / mun nag dang / rlung thams cad kyang rab tu zhi'o/ /gang gling bzhi pa 'di na rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman
302a2(mdo sde): dang | nags tshal dang / sa dang / brag dang / ri ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni/ rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor bltar
302a3(mdo sde): mi mthong ba dang ldan pa ni/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du skus dbang mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan re re las kyang 'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des
302a4(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / klu dang /
302a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi dang / mi
302a6(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong ba nas lha dang /
302a7(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / nam mkha' la
302b1(mdo sde): 'khod pa brgya stong mang pos ni/ me tog gtor cing bstod nas bskor ba byas so/ /sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa mi
302b2(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po ni/ dran pa rnyed de/ dge ba'i rtsa bsngon bskyed pa dran nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes byas te ngan song de dag nas shi
302b3(mdo sde): 'phos nas lhar skyes so/ /bdud kyi sde de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu nyi khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas bcom ldan
302b4(mdo sde): 'das la rab tu dga' bar gyur te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
302b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rnam dag sku mnga' mchog tu gzugs bzang pa/ /ye shes rgya mtsho gser gyi lhun po 'dra/ /grags
302b6(mdo sde): pa 'jig rten bkram nas lha ma me ba/ /mngon po khyod nyid la ni skyabs su mchi/ /rab tu lam stor rnam par mig zum la/ /khyod ni 'jig rten sgron ma nyi ma 'dra/ /
302b7(mdo sde): gzhan gyis mi thub srog chags rtsa lag gcig /ded dpon khyod la skyabs su rab tu mchi/ /shin tu tshogs bsags ye shes 'byor ba'i mdzod/ /nam mkha'i rang
303a1(mdo sde): bzhin gzod nas rnam grol thugs/ /thugs rje bsam pa yid 'ong 'jam pa'i gsung / /don kun grub pa khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /'khor ba'i
303a2(mdo sde): dgon pa las ni khyod thar mdzad/ /tshogs pa las kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu ston/ /byams la gnas shing mchog gi cho ga mkhyen/ /thugs rje gnas pa'i skyabs su rab
303a3(mdo sde): tu mchi| |sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba yi/ /sred pa la ni yul gyi gnas kyis chags/ /mi shes nad sel 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon/ /sman pa'i rgyal po khyod la
303a4(mdo sde): skyabs su mchi/ /chu bo bzhi dbus zam par gyur pa khyod/ /nor bdun 'phags pa'i tshul gyis rab sgrol ba/ /yang dag lam ston 'jig rten rtsa lag po/ /thugs rje
303a5(mdo sde): ldan pa khyod la 'dir mchod do/ /blo mchog khyod la bdag cag bzod par gsol/ /khyod la bdag cag yid kyis gnod bsam pa/ /mgon po dpa' bos nongs
303a6(mdo sde): pa bzod par gsol/ /khyod ni 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu gtso/ /bdag cag bdud kyi phyogs rnams rab spangs te/ /byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par
303a7(mdo sde): bgyi| |sems can ma lus thams cad mgron du gnyer/ /bdag cag gis ni byang chub mchog thob bgyi/ /ci nas bdag cag pha rol phyin spyod par/ /bdag cag
303b1(mdo sde): rnams la spyod pa rgya cher ston/ /gzhan ma yin gsung chos ni du rnams dag/ ldan na byang chub rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /me tog gang gis khyod la mngon gtor ba/ /phyogs
303b2(mdo sde): kun du yang de dag gdugs gyur te/ /dus kun bde ba'i 'byung gnas zhing du ni/ /rkang gnyis mchog gi spyi bor 'dug gyur cig /de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang / bdud
303b3(mdo sde): kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma gtor ba dang / me tog sil ma de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul
303b4(mdo sde): gyi mthus gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma las 'das pa'i me tog gi gdugs kun tu 'dug par gyur te/ me tog gi gdugs de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i
303b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug go/ bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang / bdud
303b6(mdo sde): k yi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis kyang so so nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
303b7(mdo sde): bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te chos kyang 'chad pa 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te lham me/ lha na ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar
304a1(mdo sde): snang la me tog gi gdugs de dag 'dug par gyur pa mthong zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang kha dog mtshungs pa/ rtags
304a2(mdo sde): mtshungs pa/ gzugs 'dra ba mtshungs par snang ba sha stag la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag seng+ge'i khri tha dad cing 'khor tha dad la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
304a3(mdo sde): gi yon tan bkod pa'i nyi tshe tha dad par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung brjod pa ni/ ma thos so/ /
304a4(mdo sde): bdud kyi 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba dang / mos pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
304a5(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag btsal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag las dkrigs phrag bcu
304a6(mdo sde): phyir log nas bdud kyi gnas su de lta bu'i ngo mtshar bdud sdig can la rgya cher bzlas te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig kyang bdag cag
304a7(mdo sde): gis gzhig par ma nus na/ gsad par lta ci smos/ de'i steng du bdud nyi khri de'i skyabs su dong ste chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'khod do/ /de nas
304b1(mdo sde): bdud sdig can rab tu khros te sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te des 'di skad ces smras so/ /shAkya'i bu ni ji srid brlags par ma byas pa/ /de srid bar
304b2(mdo sde): du nga yi dpal song slar mi 'ong / /shAkya'i bu 'di ji ltar de ring gsad snyam ste/ /bdag cag gzhan la yid mi rtog cing mi smra 'dug /de nas bdud sdig can yid
304b3(mdo sde): mi bde zhing mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'dug go / 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ bdud spa bkong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //bam po gnyis
304b4(mdo sde): pa| de nas bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
304b5(mdo sde): ni| 'di lta bu'i theg pa dang / ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / snying rje dang / thabs dang / spobs pa 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thabs dang /
304b6(mdo sde): ye shes kyi bar du ldan pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos du dang ldan na/ skyes bu gang zag sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi mchi zhing myur du bla na med
304b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'di
305a1(mdo sde): l as skyes bu gang zag la la sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
305a2(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bzhin bzang dag/ 'di la rigs kyi bu chos thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin cing / chos gang yang mi 'dzin/ mi gtong / khas mi len /mi
305a3(mdo sde): gnas| nye bar mi le na/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go /'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang mi gtong mi 'dzin/ khas mi len/ nye bar mi

305a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de sems can du smra ba ma yin/ srog tu smra ba ma yin/ gso bar smra ba ma yin/ gang zag tu smra ba ma yin zhing / sems can dang / sems can gyi khams la

305b1(mdo sde): dus gsum dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi rgyu dang / rkyen dang / dmigs pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'byung ba dang / gnas pa dang / skye ba thams

310b1(mdo sde): chos zab mo'i tshul 'di rtogs pa de'i tshe chos gang ston pa dang / gang la ston pa dang / don dang / tshig dang / yi ge gang dag gis ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa'i chos gang

310b4(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa de khyod kyis legs par smras so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad la chags pa med pa'i dngos po yin pas chos thams cad ni/ sgro
310b5(mdo sde): btags pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / mi 'jig pa'i mtha' can dang / ma rig pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mi skye ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' can dang / nam mkha' dang /

310b7(mdo sde): dang | chos thams cad ni/ rdzas med pa'i mtha' can dang / dus gsum dang / khams gsum dang / phung po thams cad ni/ ci'ang med pa'i mtha' can dang / 'du byed gsum

311a2(mdo sde): can du yongs su brjod do/ /stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / brjod du med pa'i don dang / chos thams cad kyi don gyi chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang
311a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug go/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe
311a4(mdo sde): bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor nyi khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste lus rags pa spangs nas yid kyi lus rnyed do/ /gzhan nyi khri brgyad stong gis
311a5(mdo sde): ni| mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /lha dang mi dkrigs phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs
311a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs thob par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa nyi khri po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lha'i
311a7(mdo sde): me tog gis gtor/ rab tu gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar mi dge ba'i
311b1(mdo sde): grogs po dang 'grogs pa'i dbang gis sems can rnams bsod nams thams cad gsog pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yid la mi bgyid pa la gzigs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
311b2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ las kyi rkyen yin par blta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo mtshar du 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams the tshom gcad pa'i phyir sngon byung ba
311b3(mdo sde): 'di gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po dpag tu med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du
311b4(mdo sde): snang ba 'chang ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa chen po la skye rgu'i tshe lo drug khri brgyad stong thub ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal zhes bya ba rig
311b5(mdo sde): pa dang zhabs su lan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan

311b7(mdo sde): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong zhes bya ba byung ste/ de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog dang / dpung gi tshogs dang
312a1(mdo sde): bcas te de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom
312a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor cing sil snyan sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas lan gsum bskor te bcom ldan

312a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal des rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
312a7(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros zhi ba yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / ma lta bur sems can thams cad kyi
312b1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson pa dang / chos thams cad la srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / tha dad du dbyer med cing mnyam par yongs su

318a5(mdo sde): bar gyur te pho mtshan skyes pa de'i tshe de bzhin du lha'i bu mo nas mi'i bu mo'i bar du grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bud med kyi dbang po mi

318b1(mdo sde): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang / skyes bu chen po lha mdzes dang bcas/ lha mdzes kyang skyes bu chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang

319a1(mdo sde): de dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis rab tu slu ba yin gyi/ bdag cag 'di nas dong ste de'i gzugs dang / rtags 'dzin pa'ang mi mthong ba dang / de'i tshig kyang
319a2(mdo sde): cung zad kyang mi thos par 'dod do/ /de nas de nyid na shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya ba zhig yod pa des tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /kho bo'i chung ma dang / g.yog mo dang / bu

319b6(mdo sde): thos ma mthong ba yin par kho bos rtogs so/ /zhes des srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzin du bcug go /de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge

321b3(mdo sde): snyam du the tshom mam/ yid gnyis sam/ som nya zi bar gyur na/ de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo

324b7(mdo sde): par brtul/ /srid par ma chags nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /de la bgegs byed nus par ga la 'gyur/ /sdig can gyis smras pa/ mi yi 'jig rten 'di na de dbang yod/ /bza' btung
325a1(mdo sde): zhim po sman dang gos rnyed cing / /tshong ba gsum yang de yi sems la yod/ /ci phyir de la brlag par bya mi nus/ /bdud sred spod zhes bya ba des 'di skad
325a2(mdo sde): ces smras so/ /sdig can lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ni/ /rdzu 'phrul bdag cag yul ni ci yod pa/ /don grub 'brul la cha shes mi reg na/ /de la ji ltar brlag par bya bar nus/ /
325a3(mdo sde): sdig can gyis smras pa/ ngas ni de la zan bcad byas/ /de la rdo ba dag kyang 'phangs/ /de bzhin mi snyan tshig smras nas/ /gnas dag nas kyang rab tu bskyod/ /bdud shes
325a4(mdo sde): mig ces bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kyis gang tshe de la bgegs byas tshe/ /de ni khros bas cung zad 'tshig pa'am/ /khyod la khro gnyer bzhin yang bstan byas sam/ /de
325a5(mdo sde): las khyod kyis tshig ngan mngon thos sam/ /sdig can gyis smras pa/ de ni so sor brtags pas rtag tu bzod/ /'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang gti mug bral/ /de ni sems
325a6(mdo sde): can kun la byams sems ldan/ /'dre bar spyod pa la yang de rtog go /bdud thub dka' zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ /kun sbyor gsum gyi gzhags pas gang bcings pa/ /
325a7(mdo sde): de la bdag cag nan tan bgegs bya mod/ /des ni skyon dang gti mug zhags pa spangs/ /de la ji ltar brlag par bya bar nus/ /sdig can gyis smras pa/ stobs thob khyed cag nga
325b1(mdo sde): yi grogs yin te/ /khyed rnams bag yod byos la de'u re chos/ /thams cad phyogs su yi phreng ba dang / /sa 'di ma lus byin gyis chur brlab bo/ /mkha' las mi bzad stug pa'i brag char dang //
325b2(mdo sde): lcags kyi phye ma'i phung po rab tu dbab/ /lcags mda' mdud thung spu gri mda' bo che/ /de lus phye mar brlag phyir dbab par bya/ /kun nas rab tu rno ba'i rdo rje dang / /mdud thung ral gri tho ba
325b3(mdo sde): rnams phab la/ /'bar ba mngon 'phangs sbyor ba de dag gis/ /shAkya'i bu de thal bar brlag par bya/ /de bzhin du bdud bye ba'i bar du thams cad kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras so/ /de nas
325b4(mdo sde): bdud de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin du 'dod bar bgyi'o/ /rang rang gi gnas nas go bgos la sde dang / g.yog tu bcas te 'dod do/ /bdag
325b5(mdo sde): cag gi rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs kyi yul de dag thams cad bstan par ni/ bya na/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de rtsal ci 'dra ba de'i mod la rab tu ston te/ khyod rang gis rig par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
325b6(mdo sde): bdud bye ba rang rang gi gnas nas go bgos te bdud bye ba re re zhing yang g.yog stong stong ya lad rnam pa mang po gyon pa/ lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa/ go cha rnam pa sna tshogs bgos
325b7(mdo sde): pa dag dang chas te/ de'i nub mo 'das nas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir phyin te yul ang+ga ma ga d+ha'i drang thad kyi nam mkha' la 'khod nas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu
326a1(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dwangs dang / sha za dang / grul bu ma gang dag
326a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sems ma dad cing gus par bya ba yid la byed pa med par gyur la/ chos dang / dge 'dun la'ang sems ma dad pa yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can
326a3(mdo sde): gyis bcom ldan 'das bgrongs su bcug nas de dag kyang lag cha dang / go cha sna tshogs dang chas te de nyid na 'khod do/ /bdud sdig can ni/ dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bsgyur
326a4(mdo sde): nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba dbang phyug chen po la dad pa/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi pha rol tu son pa/ g.yog lnga brgya yod
326a5(mdo sde): pa| gangs kyi ri'i ngos la gnas pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /gau ta ma yi rigs las skyes pa'i drang srong mchog /mkhas shing mngon par shes pa dag la gnas//
326a6(mdo sde): ang+ga ma ga d+ha na der 'dug de ring ni/ /rgyal po'i khab tu nges par bsod snyoms spyod/ /brtan por sna tshogs gsal ba'i gtam rnams kyis/ /de dang khyod du lhan cig smra bar byos/ /
326a7(mdo sde): der khyod mngon shes dbang po lnga po yang / /gdon mi za bar rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas
326b1(mdo sde): su song ste rang gi 'khor gyi bdud rnams la bsgo ba/ /ngas deng mi mtshungs blos bsam ci 'dra nga las khyod nyon cig /bdag yul bdud kyi dregs chen 'joms pa'i sgyu de mi ston par/ /rdzu 'phrul
326b2(mdo sde): mthu dang ldan de shAkya'i bu la rang dgar smra/ /de rtag tshig 'jam slob ma dag la bu la ma byams bzhin/ /de yi slob ma rgyags spangs gdon mi za bar snga dro ni/ /grong khyer dag tu g.yeng
326b3(mdo sde): ba med par mthar gyis rgyu pa na/ /de dag glu gar snyan mchog tshul gyis rang dgar myur du gzungs/ /de thos shAkya khyu mchog ci nas yid spro med par bya/ /bdud gzhan zhig gis
326b4(mdo sde): smras pa| glang chen rnga mo seng+ge ma he stag gtum sgra drag dbyar dus kyi/ /'brug sgra 'byin pa lta bu du ma grong de'i phyi rol myur sprul te/ /bdag cag lag cha mtshon thogs 'dug pa ngo
326b5(mdo sde): mtshar mngon sum de mthong na/ /bslad cing mi dran rdzu 'phrul stor te de nas tha dad phyogs su 'gro/ /bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ lam srang bzhi mdo rta babs dag na mi sdug
326b6(mdo sde): gdod mang 'khod/ /sna tshogs mtshon rnon mda' chen mda' zhags brla dgas ral gri thogs/ /nam mkha' las kyang mtshon cha'i sgra grag sprin las lce yang 'bebs/ /de nas sa
326b7(mdo sde): g.yos 'jigs pas dbang med myur du ma rungs 'gyur/ /bdud de dag gis bdud kyi yul gyi stobs dang / rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thams cad rgya cher byas so/ /bcom ldan
327a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas bdud kyi sgra'ang mi 'byin/ phyogs bzhin me dang ri'ang med/
327a2(mdo sde): sprin nag po'ang med/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung yang med de/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis klu gang yang tha na char pa thigs pa
327a3(mdo sde): gcig tsam yang mi 'bebs so/ /yang de'i tshe nyan thos chen po bzhi snga dro chos gos dang shams thabs bgos/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms
327a4(mdo sde): kyi phyir zhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod nams kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud
327a5(mdo sde): gzhon nu shin tu dar la bab pa/ byad bzhin bzang ba/ btsun pa'i cha byad dang 'dra ba lnga bcu glu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ste/ de dag gis lag pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
327a6(mdo sde): bzung nas srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge sbyong / glu longs shig /dge sbyong / gar byos shig /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ grogs po dag /

327b1(mdo sde): ces smras so/ /skye mchod dag gis shin tu chog /skye mched dag gis bdag cag bslus/ /skye mched dag ni gsod pa ste/ /skye mched bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo / /phung po byas

327b3(mdo sde): ha/ sat+ya ba ha/ A ma ba ha swAhA/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud

327b5(mdo sde): phung po khyod kyis ji ltar 'jigs bcas bshed/ /bdag cag de ltar rtag tu de mngon sum/ /bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i
327b6(mdo sde): rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go / de nas maud+gal gyi bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi
327b7(mdo sde): phyir zhugs pa dang / de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas glu'i dbyangs kyi bar du ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /khams nyid dag gis shin tu chog /khams nyid dag gis bdag cag
328a1(mdo sde): bslus/ /khams nyid dag ni gsod pa ste/ /khams nyid bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo / /tshor ba dag gis shin tu chog /tshor ba bdag gis bdag cag bslus/ /

328a4(mdo sde): dbyung / /'khor ba dag gis shin tu chog /'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus/ /'khor ba dag ni gsod pa ste/ /'khor ba bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo / /'di lta ste/ A ma ba/

328a6(mdo sde): dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phrul ldan spas
328a7(mdo sde): pa 'phags lam thub dbang sras/ /'khor ba'i nyes la mnyam blta chos kyi sgron/ /sdig spangs bdag cag ri mo gus pa skyes/ /sangs rgyas chos mchog dge 'dun deng skyabs song / /bdud
328b1(mdo sde): gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go /de nas tshe dang
328b2(mdo sde): ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas glu'i
328b3(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi bar du ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /reg pa byas pas shin tu chog /reg pa byas pas bdag cag bslus/ /reg pa byas pa gsod pa ste/ /reg pa bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo / /

328b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba bdag gis bdag cag bslus/ /'khor ba dag ni gsod pa ste/ /'khor ba bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo / /srid ba kun gyis shin tu chog /srid pa kun gyis bdag cag bslus/ /

329a6(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis bdud kyi bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste yid
329a7(mdo sde): rab tu dga' nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /khams rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang / /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rtog pas bskyod pa dang / /zhi ba'i lam yang khyod kyis nye bar bstan/ /

330b1(mdo sde): pos sdig las ci bgyis pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras la bdag cag mngon sum deng bshags nas/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas nyid du smon dge 'debs/ /bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams
330b2(mdo sde): cad kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go / yang de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi mthus srang gi dbus
