330b6(mdo sde): spos pas lhag pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa zhig byung ste/ pad+mo de las snang ba byung ngo / /snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar
330b7(mdo sde): gyur te/ srang de na pad+ma de 'phang du mi gsum gyi khrun tsam du snang ngo / /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bar du ni/ pad+ma de'i 'phang du lha'i dpag tshad lnga bcu par snang ngo / /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
331a1(mdo sde): lha'i nang du ni/ pad+ma de'i 'phang du ni/ dpag tshad brgya bar snang ngo / /'og min gyi lha'i bar du ni/ pad+ma de'i 'phang dpag tshad phyed par snang ngo / /pad+ma de'i
331a2(mdo sde): 'dab ma dag las tshig dang / don dang / tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ sems can gang dag sa 'di la ngas pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos so/ /sangs rgyas
331a3(mdo sde): zhing 'dir gang zag sdig pa med pa gcig skyes pa/ /gcig pus bdud kyi sde ni dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa bcom/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
331a4(mdo sde): bskor| |nyag cig 'gro ba dag la phan phyir byon pa the tshom med/ /mkhas pa bstan bcos tshul mang rig pa chos don mthar 'dod pa/ /tshul shes pang nas skyes dang nye rgyal mchog
331a5(mdo sde): 'dir ston pas btul/ /'gro ba kun la phan don rig mkhas dam chos gsung ba che/ /thub pa smra mchog 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pa de ring gshegs/ /dus gsum gshegs pa
331a6(mdo sde): ston pa dge sbyong rgyal po bslab gsum 'chang / /tshad med chos don rig pa mi dang lhar bcas 'gro ba skyob/ /'jig rten don dang phan spyod mkhas pa ye shes chen po'i sgron/ /dam chos
331a7(mdo sde): gsung ba dri ma gsum spangs de ring 'dir kun ston/ /sdug bsngal phongs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rnam grol zhing / /'jig rten don slad mi bsnyel blo gros mnga' bas sbyang / /ma rig
331b1(mdo sde): pa yis bsgribs pa'i mig can dag la yang / /dam pa'i chos kyi mig ni ji bzhin rab tu sbyin/ /thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di 'dir ni tshogs 'gyur gyi/ /don gyi dam pa gzigs
331b2(mdo sde): pa gzugs bzang mchog mnga' la/ /stobs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog ma yin mkhyen pa/ /smra ba'i seng+ge ring po mi thogs 'dir gshegs so/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal rgya
331b3(mdo sde): mtshor gnas pa gzigs nas ni/ /dbang po drug gi sdom pa'i mchog la rab gnas shing / /mngon par shes pa drug mkhyen drug gi rjes 'brang ba/ /de ni chos kyi rnga chen brdung du
331b4(mdo sde): yang dag gshegs/ /dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams rab 'joms pa/ /don mchog dran pa drug gi kha lo sgyur dbang po/ /pha rol chos drug mchog rnams rab tu bshad pa'i phyir/ /
331b5(mdo sde): drug gi sa bon smra ba'i seng+ge 'dir gshegs so/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi bar du pad+ma de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /khyed cag tshogs te de ring dga' ba spyod//
331b6(mdo sde): bag med sems pa sred dang rgyags pas bsgribs/ /rtag tu rmongs shing dga' ba'i skom gyis myos/ /bag med gyur pas bde gshegs mchod mi byed/ /'dod pas mi rtag chu yi zla ba
331b7(mdo sde): bzhin| |skye rgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa shin tu sra/ /dga' ba dag la bag med ma thar pa/ /nam yang mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bag med zhi ba'i phyir mi 'jug /dge dang
332a1(mdo sde): mi dge sngon byas ma mthong ngam/ /rga dang na 'chi'i 'jigs pas kun zin cing / /khyed cag ngan song sa la rab tu zhugs/ /sbyin dang dul dang kun sdom bag
332a2(mdo sde): yod la| |sten cig sngon gyi legs byas rnams kyang srungs/ /'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' med kun spongs la/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su nye bar dong / /song ste de yi bka'
332a3(mdo sde): la rab tu nyon/ /legs bshad de ni khyod kyi don chen te/ /shes rab rnam grol rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu/ /dam pa'i chos ldan mnyan pa don chen ni/ /lha'i ris bcu drug gi bar du pad+ma de'i
332a4(mdo sde): 'dab ma las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo / /mnyam gzhag bsam gtan dga' ba nyon mongs med/ /rab tu bsgrims te chos la rnam par bsgoms/ /ma 'khrul
332a5(mdo sde): sems dang rnam par thar 'dod pas/ /zhe sdang rab tu spangs pa'i blo gyis shig /rnam pa bcu gsum mtshan ma bstan pa yi/ /bzod pa mchog la rnam par sgom par gyis/ /des
332a6(mdo sde): ni na dang rga las thar pa yi/ /shin tu rnam thar myur du thos par 'gyur/ /gang rnams gzugs kyi rnam rtog srog la chags/ /ther zug rtag pa bdag brtan dngos por lta/ /de dag gi
332a7(mdo sde): ni skye ba'i rgyun mi 'chad/ /de rnams ngan song sa la shin tu bab/ /rtag tu khams gsum bdag med rdzas med cing / /byed med rang dbang med par rnam bltas nas/ /rjes su
332b1(mdo sde): mthun pa'i bzod pa gang sgom pa/ /de dag 'gro ba kun las thar par 'gyur/ /skye dang 'jig grol chos 'di thams cad la/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar gang rnams sgom byed pa/ /de dag 'chi med rga
332b2(mdo sde): med na ba'ang med/ /ngan 'gro med cing mi sdug phrad pa'ang med/ /gang rnams dbang po dag la yid mi chags/ /lam de mchog ste shin tu dag pa yin/ /da ltar shAkya seng+ge 'di bzhin du/ /
332b3(mdo sde): bdud rnams bzhi po rnam par 'joms par 'gyur/ /gang dag g.yo ba btul nas gnyis spang phyir/ /ci yang med cing mtshan ma kun spangs pa/ /tshul gcig rnam par sgom par byed pa
332b4(mdo sde): rnams| |de dag la ni lam mchog 'di bshad do/ /bdag po med cing byed pa med gyur par/ /chos 'di thams cad stong par bsgoms nas su/ /smon pa spangs ni bla na med pa yi/ /byang chub
332b5(mdo sde): nam mkha'i rang bzhin reg par 'gyur/ /de lta bu'i don gyi tshig gis chos kyi sgra de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag tshogs te srang gi dbus na pad+ma de 'khor
332b6(mdo sde): bar 'dug go / 'og min gyi lha grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bar du 'og min nas babs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir pad+ma de'i khor khor yug tu 'khod do/ /bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su
332b7(mdo sde): b cad pa de dag thos nas kun tu bltas te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang ga dbus na pad+ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad ba dag byung ste chos mnyan pa'i phyir mi bye ba khrag
333a1(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med ba dag gis pad+ma de 'khor bar 'khor par mthong ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can gyis steng du bltas na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha
333a2(mdo sde): drug gi gnas thams cad na'ang chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad+ma de 'khor bar 'khod pa mthong ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can rab
333a3(mdo sde): tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te spu bring zhes byed par gyur cing / lus rdul te lus 'dar nas nam mkha' la rgyug cing skad chen pos bos te bdud gzhan la 'di
333a4(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ /mi 'gyur yid kyis nga yi tshig nyon la/ /nga la stobs med bdag yul 'dir dbang med/ /mthu stobs yon tan shin tu dri med de/ /skye bo brtan phyir 'jig rten
333a5(mdo sde): 'dir 'dug go / lha mi dga' ba'i dam pa 'dir byung ste/ /'gro mchog ma lus nges par nye bar dong / /bde gshags tshig la skom zhing rab tu dga'/ /yon tan rab mchog zhi ba'i
333a6(mdo sde): lam du 'gro / 'di ni 'jig rten gsum po slu ba dge sbyong sgyu yin te/ /lha mi mang po thams cad yid gcig pad+ma 'khor bar 'dug /da ni 'jigs pa'i skad phyung myur du ri yi char phab
333a7(mdo sde): ste| |ci nas bdud kyi sde btsan mtshon gyis deng bcom 'dir brlag gi/ /de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gi phan byed tshig 'di nyon cig
333b1(mdo sde): khyod kyi chos rig na/ /bdag sde brlag pa mthong yang zhi bar ci yi phyir mi 'gro /bde gshegs gzi brjid sku dang dpal 'chang gzugs mthong bdag cag myos/ /sangs rgyas 'dren pa ma gtogs
333b2(mdo sde): 'di na skyabs rab mchog gzhan med/ /de nas bdud gzhan zhig rab tu du zhing gdong mchog tu khro bas non pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lam
333b3(mdo sde): dman pa/ /bdag gi stobs mthu med pa'ang mi shes sam/ /'dren pa la yang gang phyir khyod bsngo ba/ /ngo mi tsha'am 'dzem par mi bya 'am/ /bdag cag ste bas ni shin tu brlag par 'gyur/ /

333b5(mdo sde): stobs dang brtson 'grus stor/ /ji tsam skad cig brlag par ma gyur pa/ /de yi bar du thub dbang skyabs su 'dong / /de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /

334b5(mdo sde): la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do/ /la la ni/ sngo zhing kha dog sngo la 'phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan dkar pos brgyan par bdag nyid mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i

335a6(mdo sde): bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byin to/ /la la ni/ kha dog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la bstod do/ /bdud
335a7(mdo sde): dang / bdud kyi 'khor la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
335b1(mdo sde): thogs so/ /la la ni/ srang dang / khang pa dang / khyim dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / bsil khang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / sgo
335b2(mdo sde): dang / shing dang / gzhal med khang rnams na 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang gi tshe bdud de dag
335b3(mdo sde): thams cad g.yog dang bcas te dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe rab tu 'khrugs te skrag cing myos nas rab tu du zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag la phyin chad

335b6(mdo sde): der phyin nas pad+ma de'i sdong po yan chad dbyung bar 'dod na/ reg par yang ma nus/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma gcang par 'dod na/ de dag kyang ma mthong / pad+ma'i snying po lag pas brdab par
335b7(mdo sde): 'dod na/ de'ang ma dmigs te/ dper na/ grog snang yang mi dmigs pa bzhin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ grib ma snang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du pad+mo de'ang snang mod kyi mi dmigs
336a1(mdo sde): s o| |gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis pad+ma de mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par mi rung ba de'i tshe 'khor thams cad rab tu dngangs par bya ba'i phyir skad
336a2(mdo sde): drag cing che la 'jigs pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod na/ de'ang ma nus so/ /yang stobs chen po'i drag shul gyis lag pa gnyis sa chen po la brdabs te rab tu bskyod par 'dod na/
336a3(mdo sde): reg par yang ma nus te mi dmigs so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ la la zhig nam mkha' la rdob par 'dod na mi dmigs pa de bzhin du bdud sdig can gyis mthong yang reg par mi rung
336a4(mdo sde): zhing mi dmigs nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci nas sems can 'dud pa rnams brtags te sems rnam par 'khrug par bya'o/ /snyam na/ sems can de dag mthong yang mi dmigs
336a5(mdo sde): shing reg par yang ma nus so/ /de nas bdud sdig can rab tu du zhing sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lus shing ljon pa bzhin du 'dar te gdong mchi ma can gyi sa phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'di skad

336b1(mdo sde): cing dus nas 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di'i dbang du song du 'ong / dgra 'di'i mdun du bdag gi srog zad par 'gyur du 'ong gi /

336b4(mdo sde): rab tu khros shing skrag ste skad chen por du zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /kyi hud bu dang gnyen bshes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis mi mthong ngo / /zhes zer ro/ /de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa

337a6(mdo sde): shes te/ gang gi tshe gang du'ang 'gro bar ma nus pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang / skyabs su sems bskyed nas yang bdag nyid grol bar shes so/ /lan bdun gyi bar

337b7(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der lhags te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /da ltar bstan pa 'di yi gnas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzigs te/ /bstan pa'i

338a5(mdo sde): khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du bdud bya ba khrag khrig rab tu pham par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi phung po bye ba
338a6(mdo sde): khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skam pa dang / lta ba'i rgya mo dral ba dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la gzud par spyod mod kyi/
338a7(mdo sde): 'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das deng gi dus la gshegs pa'i mi rigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag
338b1(mdo sde): thams cad bdud du gyur la/ de dag re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs kyang sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te/ de dag thams cad nga la gsad par shom
338b2(mdo sde): yang spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la'ang gnod par mi nus so/ /ngas ni/ 'di na 'dug bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rnams rab tu pa ma par bya ba dang / gdul bar nus te/ bdud g.yog
338b3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa 'di ni/ ma gtogs so/ /yang nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di dag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad bdud kyi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam
338b4(mdo sde): par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bkod pas brgyan pas/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste/ yongs su spyod do/ /de nas bdud de dag rab tu dga' zhing dad pa skyes nas bla na med
338b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam na gdan las bzhengs par bzhed pa dang / de nas 'od ma'i tshal srung ba'i lha mo mthu
338b6(mdo sde): mdzes zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdong mchi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan de ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags/ /grong khyer 'di
338b7(mdo sde): dag kun nas bdud kyis gtams/ /re re la yang shin tu ma rungs pa/ /bye bas smra ba'i seng+ge bskor cing mchis/ /zhe sdang rab 'bar rno ba'i mtshon thogs te/ /khyod dkrongs slad du 'khrugs
339a1(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis gnas/ /mgon po rnam pa kun tu deng ma gshegs/ /'jig rten rtsa lag brlags par ma bzhud cig /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das
339a2(mdo sde): gdan las bzhengs pa de'i tshe gtsug lag khang gi lha mo snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sdig can
339a3(mdo sde): dag ni lnga stong po/ /mtshon char bcas pa mchis pa ni/ /bsam med de dag khyod la bsngo/ /thub chen de ring ma gshegs shig /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang nas
339a4(mdo sde): byung ba de'i che sman gyi lha mo grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'jig rten sgron ma brlags gyur na/ /
339a5(mdo sde): kyi hud chos kyi lam stor cing / /chos kyi tshul ni rab tu 'jig / chos kyi gru yang 'jig par 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun na rgya chen chos kyi ro ni nyams par 'gyur/ /'gro ba 'dir ni nyon
339a6(mdo sde): mongs g.yo can gdug pas shin tu gtams/ /sa 'di bde gshegs thub pa'i mchog ni ma rungs 'gyur ba las/ /ji ltar shin tu 'byung ba'i mthu ni bdag la ci ma mchis/ /khyod
339a7(mdo sde): brlag bgyi slad 'di na rab tu mi bzad mang po dag / sdig pa'i chos can ral gri sta re mtshon rnon thogs shing mchis/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten bsrung slad bdag gi tshig
339b1(mdo sde): gsan te/ /stobs bcu grub par bzhud de de ring grong khyer ma gshegs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi dang ra nas bzhud pa dang / de na shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang zhes
339b2(mdo sde): bya ba de snying rje snying brtse bar du zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thams cad don grub thub pa yid bzhin rdzogs khyod ma rungs gyur na
339b3(mdo sde): ni| |mgon po khams gsum 'di dag de'u re mig ni stor bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' 'di la sbrul gyi rked chings rno ba'i mda' dang mtshon thogs shing / /khyod dkrongs slad du kha nas me
339b4(mdo sde): 'bar rgyu yid ni der ma gshegs/ /de nas sgo khang gi lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha zhes bya ba de sgra cher du zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
339b5(mdo sde): grong khyer bzang po 'di na bram zer ming btags stong phrag nyi shu po/ /mda' dang spu gri mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs te snying rje med par blta/ /gcig pas gcig mi bzad pa snying rje med pa stong
339b6(mdo sde): phrag nyi shu rnams/ /khyod dkrongs slad du 'di na mchis kyi gtsang ma'i zhal ni ma gshegs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du byon pa dang / der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer srung ba'i
339b7(mdo sde): lha mo ta ma la'i snying po zhes bya ba de nam mkha' las sgra cher du zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rings par song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te 'di
340a1(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan shul 'di seng+ge rnga mo glang chen smyon pas bsgor/ /dge slong rnams la gtse slad bdud kyis rnam mang gnod pa bgyid/ /sa 'dir
340a2(mdo sde): ston pa khyod dkrongs slad du mu stegs gzhan yang brtson/ /sprin dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtse'i slad du ma gshegs shig /bcom ldan bdud btul khyod kyis bstan pa rnam zhig
340a3(mdo sde): dang / /sgyu ma bgyis pa mi mthun gdong can bdud mthong nas/ /lha mi klu dang mi 'am ci yi dbang po rnams/ /kun 'dus mi dga' skrag nas shin tu rnam par 'khrugs/ /dam chos cher zhig
340a4(mdo sde): pa dang 'jig rten 'khrugs gyur dang / /nam mkha' skar ma'i 'od stong nyi zla gyur mthong nas/ /'gro mchog kye ma mi bzad klad pa deng drag rdob/ /bde gshegs ma rungs 'gyur bar kun
340a5(mdo sde): dogs kyi hud mchi/ /mthong ba'i nyi ma 'di nyams shing / /chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grongs pas brlag /chos kyi chu yang skam par 'gyur/ /dam chos
340a6(mdo sde): spyod pa 'jig rten du/ /ma rungs 'gyur ba nyer gnas tshe/ /mi dge ba yi bdud rnams kyang / /'di dag tu ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas lha mo des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog par ma
340a7(mdo sde): mthong nas gdong mchi ma can gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzigs su gsol/ /smra mchog de ring brlag par ma bzhud cig /bdag gi grong du ma
340b1(mdo sde): rungs khyod gyur na| / 'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi/ /'dren pa bdag gi tshig gson sems can mchog /bdag gi grong du brlag par deng ma bzhud/ /sems can thugs
340b2(mdo sde): brtse'i slad du 'dir gzhes te/ /sems can skye bas gtses pa 'jigs thar mdzod/ /dam pa brnyes nas sgrol bar rab 'gyur bar/ /sngon gyi dam bcas de bzhin gshegs pas
340b3(mdo sde): dgongs/ /sems can mang po sdug bsngal du mas gdungs/ /srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung zhig /sku mchog bskal pa bye ba mang por bzhugs/ /kye ma 'dod la chags pa'i
340b4(mdo sde): byis pa'i sde/ /de rnams zhi bgyid slad du chos lam shod/ /skye mchod dbang po don ni rang bzhin stong / /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du gshegs pa dang / de nas sa'i lha mo gzi
340b5(mdo sde): brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig skra bshig cing gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rab tu
340b6(mdo sde): sbyin la dgongs shing khyod kyis ni/ /rgya mtsho bzhin gtams pa yi khrag stsal cing / /dbu dang rus pa khor yug ri rab tsam/ /spyan yang gang+gA'i bye ma rnyed stsal to/ /sngon ni rin chen rnam pa
340b7(mdo sde): sna tshogs dang / /sras dang btsun mo glang chen de bzhin rta/ /gnas dang gos dang mal cha zas skom dang / /de bzhin nad pa dag la 'dod sman stsal/ /rang byung mchog rab la ni mchod pa
341a1(mdo sde): mdzad| |khyod kyis bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs/ /bzod pa dang ni thos pa rtag tu bsnyen/ /phar 'dzin mar 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no/ /bya ba
341a2(mdo sde): dka' pa dag kyang mtha' yas spyad/ /sems can du ma nyon mongs thar bar mdzad/ /gang sngon khyod kyis smon lam btab pa ni/ /lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig /chu
341a3(mdo sde): po chen po las ni 'gro ba bsgral/ /'jig rten la yang shin tu chos bstan te/ /sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bsal par bya/ /sems can mang po 'jig med grong khyer gzud/ /
341a4(mdo sde): sems can de dag dgos pa yongs rdzogs shing / /byang chub dam pa la ni shin tu khod/ /'di na lam bor sdig pa spyod pa rnams/ /tshul khrims thos bshig mgon pos bzod
341a5(mdo sde): par mdzod/ /'di dag sgrol tshig dam bcas dgongs su gsol/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por chos bstan te/ /mgon po chu bo dag las 'jig rten sgrol/ /'di dag yan lag brgyad kyi
341a6(mdo sde): chu yis khrus/ /mgon po mchog rab khyod dang 'dra ba ni/ /'jig rten gsum po 'di na 'ga' ma mchis/ /bdag grol 'jig rten 'di dag grol bar mdzad/ /srid gsum rgya mtsho
341a7(mdo sde): las kyang 'gro ba sgrol/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig /rtag tu bzhugs shing chos ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang nas gshegs pa dang /
341b1(mdo sde): skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po nam mkha' la rgyu zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag rnams
341b2(mdo sde): kyis bde gshegs sngon mthong ba/ /zhi ba'i dus la shin tu slob ma dul/ /chos rnams rgya cher ston pa mdzad pa na/ /de la de lta bu yi bgegs ma byung / /ston pa 'di ni shin tu dus
341b3(mdo sde): ngan la| |rgya chen blo yis rang byung nyid brnyes te/ /thub dbang 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad slad du/ /'jig rten nyon mongs bsgribs la chos ston cing / smra ba'i seng+ge 'di na bzhugs
341b4(mdo sde): bzhin du/ /sdig can dag ni bye ba stong mang po/ /de ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jig par bgyid/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo grong du deng ma gshegs/ /de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis
341b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan brtson pa/ /de dag yul gcig 'khor lo bskor gyur pa/ /'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor/ /de ring ma rungs
341b6(mdo sde): bar ni gyur ta re/ /de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ded dpon 'dir ni thugs rje'i slad/ /shin tu sems can don mdzad spyad/ /de ni de ring grong
341b7(mdo sde): khyer 'dir/ /brlag par 'gyur snyam bdag rtog go /yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
342a1(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong gdong la mchi ma zag cing ngom zung nag pa dag nam mkha'i ngos kyi lam las babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas
342a2(mdo sde): bdag nyid la rnam pa mang po byed de/ la la ni/ skra 'bal/ la la ni/ rgyan 'gro la/ la la ni/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan snyol/ la la ni/ bdag nyid kyi lus sa la rdob/
342a3(mdo sde): la la ni| bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dzin/ /la la ni/ shin tu nyon mongs par du/ la la ni/ lag pas brang rdung / la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug cing so
342a4(mdo sde): bya bzhin du 'gro ldog / la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te bstod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed/ la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
342a5(mdo sde): spos dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang / 'phyang 'phrul dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / ras bcos bu dag mngon par 'thor ro/ /de nas lha gzhan bye ba mang
342a6(mdo sde): pos mgrin gcig tu skad mthon por 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'jig rten don slad 'di bas mang ba yi/ /bya bar dka' ba khyod kyis rab tu spyad/ /zad pa'i dus deng 'dir ni khyod
342a7(mdo sde): skyes kyi| |btang snyoms mdzod la mi gshegs bzhugs su gsol/ /sdig med khyod kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyung du mdzad/ /lha dang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin tu nyung / /shin
342b1(mdo sde): tu yun ring chos rnams ston cing khyod bzhugs pa/ /srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho 'di las 'gro ba sgrol/ /dge ba'i las rnams bgyid cing sa bon yongs smin te/ /bdud rtsi'i snod du gyur
342b2(mdo sde): ba'i sems can du ma la/ /khyod kyi thugs rje bskyed de so sor rab ston la/ /chu bo las ni 'jig rten nyam thag bsgral bar mdzod/ /'gro ba dgon pa'i dbus song 'khyams gyur cing / /'khor
342b3(mdo sde): ba'i dgon par shin tu lam stor ba/ /de dag la ni lam mchog so sor ston/ /'phags pa'i chos mchog tshig gis thar bar mdzod/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa gang bskor ba/ /de ni khyod kyi
342b4(mdo sde): thugs rje ngo mtshar rmad/ /rlabs chen thugs mnga' ring du bzhugs su gsol/ /'gro ba rnams ni mgon med ma gyur cig /de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rnam
342b5(mdo sde): 'dren brgya lam rungs gyur na ni/ /'jig rten 'di ltar ma lus ldongs par 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad lam rnam thar gsum gyi rgyu/ /'dir ni yong ye thams cad ma mchis 'gyur/ /bdag
342b6(mdo sde): lus sems las skyes dge sa bon dag / bdag cag bag yod gyur pas 'dir btab ste/ /de slad bdag cag bde ba kun dang ldan/ /bsod nams 'byung gnas 'dir brlag ma gyur cig /
342b7(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sa 'dir bye ba'i bdud rnams nyer lhags kyang / /thub
343a1(mdo sde): pa rlabs chen thugs mnga' nam yang ni/ /ma rungs mi 'gyur khyed cag ma 'jigs shig /dge ba 'di la bdag cag mngon sum gyur/ /dpag tshad sum
343a2(mdo sde): cu drug tu mgyogs shing drag shul ldan pas kun tu bskor/ /sna bgrang ral gri mtshon rnon rtsub pa'i sgra mang 'jigs pa bdud kyi sde/ /byang chub snying por lhags de de dag 'jigs
343a3(mdo sde): shing brlags gyur na/ /da ltar don brnyes grags pas khyab pa de la ga la bgegs shig byed/ /de nas lha mo gzhan zhig du zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ /sngon byung ba ni bdud kyi
343a4(mdo sde): sde gcig yin te de dag dpung mi che/ /'di ni bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi sde ste shin tu dpung che bas/ /'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa 'di ni brlag par 'gyur du rab tu dogs/ /de brlags
343a5(mdo sde): na ni 'jig rten 'di dag shin tu snang med 'khyams par 'ong / /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad
343a6(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /blo zhan bdag cag gi ni tshig gsan te/ /dge ba bzhugs shing gtso bo thugs rje can/ /lha mang bye ba mya ngan chen pos gdungs/ /de la chos kyi bcud kyis da gtor
343a7(mdo sde): cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la byams pa yangs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs nas de dag shin tu dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis
343b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /deng khyod ma 'jigs khyed ni ma skrag cig /bdud rnams thams cad bzhon bcas gcig car du/ /tshogs kyang spu gcig skrag par mi nus na/ /nga yi lus kun la
343b2(mdo sde): ni smos ci dgos/ /deng ni 'jig rten thams cad dbugs phyung ste/ /nga yis rtag tu sa 'dir chos bshad do/ /lam rnams stor ba la ni nga nyid kyis/ /dri ma med pa yang dag lam bstan
343b3(mdo sde): bya| |ngas sngon bya ba dka' ba mang po byas/ /zas dang skom yang shin tu rgya cher byin/ /gnas dang sman yang mi nyung sbyin byin pas/ /nga la deng su gnod par byed par nus/ /ngas ni rta
343b4(mdo sde): dang glang chen shing rta dang / /lhab lhub 'phyang 'phrul dag gi rgyan rnams dang / /bran pho bran mo grong rdal yul 'khor btang / /nga la su zhig gnod par byed par nus/ /chung ma bu pho bu
343b5(mdo sde): mo bran mang dang / /yid 'ong dbang phyug sa steng rgyal po'i rigs/ /sems can rnams la phan phyir ngas byin rlob/ /nga lus de ring ci phyir 'jig par 'gyur/ /mgo dang sna dang rna ba mig
343b6(mdo sde): gnyis dang / /lus dang pags pa khrag dang rkang lag bcas/ /nga yi srog kyang lus can rnams la btang / /su zhig nga la 'tshe bar byed par nus/ /ngas ni sangs rgyas bye ba rab mang la/ /
343b7(mdo sde): gus ldan bdag gi lag nas shin tu mchod/ /rtag tu tshul khrims thos dang bzod la dga'/ /nga la su zhig rlag par byed par nus/ /ngas sngon shin tu bya dka' mang po rnams/ /mnyam
344a1(mdo sde): par bzhag pas rab tu nga yis byas/ /lus kun bcad kyang nga la 'khrug med na/ /nga la rnam par 'tshe ba su zhig nus/ /nyon mongs ngas brtul nges par nga
344a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas/ /sems can thams cad la ni byams sems ldan/ /khro med kha dog tha ba nga la med/ /nga yi mdun na de ring su zhig nus/ /ngas ni bdud kyi dpung rnams tshogs
344a3(mdo sde): pa btul/ /ngas ni bdud mang bye ba pham par byas/ /khyed kun rnam par thar par nges par bya/ /grong du ci phyir mi 'gro ma 'jigs shig /sems can don phyir phyogs bcu 'di
344a4(mdo sde): dag na| |sangs rgyas la la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sems dpa' yang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams ni kun na bsags/ /zhing rnams
344a5(mdo sde): mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bya/ /bsod nams ye shes dag gis gnas par bya/ /sangs rgyas de dag tshul bcas kun gnas pas/ /sangs rgyas dag gi dgongs pa'i mdzad
344a6(mdo sde): pa bya| |yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba
344a7(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so/ /zhes bya ba gsol nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i grangs med pa'i
344b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngo mtshar chen po rmad du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal
344b2(mdo sde): lo| |bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbugs phyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi phyogs pham par mdzad do/ /sems can rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i
344b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal to/ /sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu bsnyil to/ /skye ba'i shing ljon pa bcad do/ /'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar brlags so/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa
344b4(mdo sde): bsal to/ /gzhan mu stegs can rab tu dad par bsgyur to/ /chu bo bzhi bskams so/ /chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad do/ /byang chub kyi lam ston to/ /bzod pa dang des
344b5(mdo sde): pa la btsud do/ /bsam gtan gyi bde ba la rtser stsal to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par mdzad do/ /ston pa bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' bas lha dang bcas
344b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral to/ /sems can rnams 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer du rab tu btsud do/ /de nas lha dang / mi de dag gis bdug pa dang / me tog
344b7(mdo sde): dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lam de phyag dar byas so/ /lha'i
345a1(mdo sde): gos dang / me tog dang / lha'i ras bcos bus kun tu g.yogs so/ /lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen
345a2(mdo sde): po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / ro tsa na dang / ro tsa na chen po dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+mas kun tu
345a3(mdo sde): g.yogs so/ /gang du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 'dor ba'i lam de'i ngos gnyis su lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa mngon par sprul te lha'i ras bcos bu dang /
345a4(mdo sde): mu tig gi phreng ba dang / lag rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan to/ /shing de dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzing bu grang zhing zhim pa'i chu dwangs shing rnyog pa med la yan
345a5(mdo sde): lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang pa kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa dag sprul te/ bar snang la'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
345a6(mdo sde): dang / ba dan dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba bzung zhing gser gyi phye ma dag gi char yang phab bo/ /dngul dang bai DUR+ya'i phye ma dang / a ga ru dang / rgya spos dang /
345a7(mdo sde): dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i char yang rab tu phab bo/ /go shiR+sha dang / tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char yang lam der phab bo/ /lha'i rgyan sna tshogs
345b1(mdo sde): gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad brgyan to/ /grong ngam/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol na'ang lha dang mi rnams
345b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir lam mdzes par byed do/ /grong khyer gyi nang na bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bkod pa dag
345b3(mdo sde): bkod pa byas so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs bzhin du lam du
345b4(mdo sde): gshegs so/ /yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sku'i gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lam der zhugs te/ de na sems can gang dag tshangs pa la dad cing
345b5(mdo sde): tshangs pas 'dul ba de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs su lam nas gshegs par mthong ba nas gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i bar dang / gang dag sred
345b6(mdo sde): med kyi bus 'dul ba dang / gang dag dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag 'khor los bsgyur bas 'dul ba dang / gang
345b7(mdo sde): dag khams kyi rgyal phran gyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag dge sbyong gis 'dul ba dang / gang dag gzhon nus 'dul ba dang / gang dag bud med
346a1(mdo sde): kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag seng+ges 'dul ba dang / gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba dang / gang dag lhas 'dul ba dang / gang dag klus 'dul ba dang / gang
346a2(mdo sde): dag lha ma yin gyis 'dul ba nas gang dag ri bong la dad cing ri bong gis 'dul ba'i bar de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ri bong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam
346a3(mdo sde): nas gshegs par mthong ngo / /sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam
346a4(mdo sde): nas gshegs par mthong ste/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas mngon par bstod cing phyag btsal te zhabs 'bring du 'brang zhing dong ngo / /yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ri
346a5(mdo sde): d ang nye ba na gnas pa drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bdud sdig can gyis btang nas de g.yog lnga brgya dang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo'i drung na sdod pas bcom ldan
346a6(mdo sde): 'das drang srong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / bkod pa de lta bus lam nas gshegs shing lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mchod
346a7(mdo sde): pa byed par brtson par mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems so/ /bden par 'di ni/ drang srong chen po mthu che zhing mchod par 'os pa ste/ lha dang / mis mchod par
346b1(mdo sde): snang ngo / /'di'i lus thams cad kyang bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan te/ mkhas shing slob dpon yin par shes so/ /bdag cag gnyis gang rgan/ gang mkhas pa de la ngas
346b2(mdo sde): ji ltar brtag snyam ste/ de nas yang 'di ltar bdag gis mdun bsu la/ 'di la rigs dang / rus dang / gnas dang / brtul zhugs kun dri'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /de nas drang srong
346b3(mdo sde): skar ma la dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /thos ldan yid 'thad brtul zhugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang / /ye shes chos don ldan
346b4(mdo sde): zhing thub mchog bzod 'di lam rab mkhyen/ /khyed cag thams cad 'di la gus par mchod chen yang dag sbyor/ /yon tan ldan pa 'di las 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i legs
346b5(mdo sde): bshad mnyan/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu mkhan po/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog
346b6(mdo sde): dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /khyed su zhig /bcom ldan
346b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni/ bram ze'o/ /gsol pa/ gdung rus ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga'i rus ni/ gau ta ma'o/ /gsol pa/ khyod kyi brtul zhugs ci/ bka' stsal pa/
347a1(mdo sde): nga'i brtul zhugs ni/ rnam par thar pa gsum mo/ /gsol pa/ khyod kyi spyod pa ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid la spyod do/ /
347a2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ khyod rab tu byung nas ji srid lon/ bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa byung nas ji srid lon pa nga rab tu byung nas kyang de srid lon no/ /gsol pa/ drang srong chen po/ /skar
347a3(mdo sde): ma'i bshad pa lung bstan pa'i rig pa gsung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgro btags pa med par mnyam pa nyid du'o/ /'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi shes pa ste/
347a4(mdo sde): de la snying po ci zhig yod/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ mkhas pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar ma'i gnas gang yin/ drang
347a5(mdo sde): srong gis gsol pa/ gang zla ba dang / nyi ma brten cing rjes su rgyu ba'i rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pa 'di dag go/ de la mdzub ni/ sor brgyad kyi tshad de/ mdzub de'i
347a6(mdo sde): tshad kyis lus la srid du mdzub bcu gnyis par rig par bgyi'o/ /klad pa'i spyi bo la mdzub gang dang / rkang pa'i mthil la mdzub gang ste/ mdzub bcu bzhi ni/ skar ma
347a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi gnas so/ /gang de dag na gda' ba ni/ rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ skar ma gang dang gang la bcas pa de dang / de dag na gda'o/ /yang gang zhe na/ de bshad par bgyi
347b1(mdo sde): yi thub pa chen po gson cig / smin drug la ni su btsas pa/ /de yi gdong gi sor bzhi na/ /g.yas phyogs na ni sme ba mchis/ /spu can nag la mdog kyang dmar/ /longs spyod bdog cing
347b2(mdo sde): grags dang ldan/ /mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te/ /smin drug la ni skyes pa yi/ /mtshan ma nyid ni de lags so/ /gang zhig la ni sor bzhi na/ /sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba de/ /snar
347b3(mdo sde): ma la ni skyes pa ste/ /shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'/ /mkhas la longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ /rnam pa kun tu mdzes dang ldan/ /dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun sum tshogs/ /dgra rnams
347b4(mdo sde): rtag par rab tu 'joms/ /mgul ba yi ni mdzub phyed na/ /gang la tshig pa 'dra gda' ba/ /de ni mgo la skyes pa ste/ /dpa' zhing longs spyod ldan pa'o/ /mdzub kyi phyed po gnyis pa
347b5(mdo sde): la| |g.yon pa skye ba gang mchis pa/ /lag la skyes pa khro ba ste/ /de ni blun zhing longs spyod bdog /mtshan khung g.yon na sme nag mchis/ /nabs so la ni skyes pa ste/ /nor dang 'bru
347b6(mdo sde): rnams 'byor bar 'gyur/ /de ni shes pa'i rgyu yang chung / /ji ltar khyod ni rgyal la skyes/ /mtshan mchog dag ni rab tu gda'/ /phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo ni/ /nyi ma lta bur rab tu
347b7(mdo sde): mdzes| |dbu skra dag ni thams cad kyang / /gyen du g.yas 'khyil legs par mchis/ /sku ni chu zheng gab pa ste/ /'dren pa khyed kyis nyon mongs thul/ /tshig 'dra gang gi snying ga mchis//
348a1(mdo sde): skag la skyes te 'thab mo sred/ /tshul khrims 'chal zhing 'grogs mi bde/ /de ni g.yem la dga' ba'o/ /'og gam brang ngam rgya ba cig na/ /gang la byi sran 'dra
348a2(mdo sde): ba gda'/ /mchu las skyes te nor dang ldan/ /btsun zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi/ /lte ba g.yas g.yon gnyis ka na/ /gang la rme 'dra gda' ba ni/ /de ni gre la skyes pa ste/ /ser sna che zhing
348a3(mdo sde): tshe yang thung / /lte ba man chad sor bzhin/ /gang la sme ba rab gda' ba/ /sbo la de skyes longs spyod can/ /khrims ldan shi 'phos mtho ris mchi/ /me bzhi la ni skyes pa dag /sme ba
348a4(mdo sde): dmar po chu sor gda'/ /rku zhing g.yo can sgyu ma ste/ /bsod nams chung zhing shes pa zhan/ /gang gi mtshan la sme ba ni/ /gda' bar gyur pa nges par yang / /nag pa la ni skyes pa ste/ /
348a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags glu gar dag tu dga'/ /mtshan gyi 'og gam steng na ni/ /sme ba dmar po rab tu gda'/ /sa ri la ni de skyes te/ /mi mkhas brkam zhing mang po sdang / /brla gnyis kyi ni
348a6(mdo sde): mdzub gang na/ /sme ba dmar po de bzhin te/ /sa ga la ste shor ba mchog /skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskor/ /mkhas shing dpa' la dgra yang thul/ /rtag tu bde la gnas
348a7(mdo sde): pa ste| |ngo tsha shes shing brtan dang ldan/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris skye/ /brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub do na/ /gang la byi sran 'dra ba gda'/ /lha mtshams la ste tshul khrims can/ /chos
348b1(mdo sde): dang longs spyod ldan ba'o/ /gang gi brla 'og gnyis na ni/ /sme ba gda' ba snon la skyes/ /mi sdug tshe thung tshul khrims 'chal/ /dbul zhing snying rje ma mchis so/ /pus mo gnyis ka'i gong
348b2(mdo sde): na ni| |gang la rma chung gda' ba de/ /snubs la skyes te dbang thang can/ /myur du bdag khyim zhig par bgyid/ /chu stod la ni skyes pa dag /sme ba pus mo'i lhang na/ /sbyin pa bgyid cing
348b3(mdo sde): chos lam 'tshal/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi/ /chu smad la ni su skyes pa/ /gru do la ni sme ba mchis/ /de ltar gda' ba shes dang ldan/ /longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams//
348b4(mdo sde): sme ba gnyis po gda' ba ni/ /gro bzhin la ste longs spyod rtag /de bzhin nad med sems can byams/ /shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi/ /sme ba nag po rje ngar la/ /gda' ba mon grur
348b5(mdo sde): skyes pa ste/ /de ni khro zhing 'dod chags chung / /longs spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan/ /rje ngar la ni mdzub do na/ /sme ba nag po rab tu gda'/ /mon gre la skyes blun po ste/ /de ni chu yis
348b6(mdo sde): 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rje ngar 'og gi mdzub gang na/ /rma 'dra mchis pa khrums stod la/ /blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa bgyid/ /de ni dbul zhing rkun po bgyid/ /gang la sme ba mdzub gong na/ /
348b7(mdo sde): khrums smad la ni skyes pa ste/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims dran pa dang / /shes rab 'jigs med snying rjer ldan/ /gang gi rkang pa gnyi ga la/ /sme ba phra mo gda' ba ni/ /nam grur skyes pa ma rabs te/ /
349a1(mdo sde): 'breg mkhan du yang 'gyur ba lags/ /gang gi mthe bo'i phrag na yang / /sme ba sngon po gda' ba ni/ /rtag tu stobs ldan nad ma mchis/ /tha skar la ni de
349a2(mdo sde): skyes so| |rkang mthil sme ba mchis pa ni/ /bra nye la ste snying brtse med/ /gsod pa'i gshed ma'i ngang tshul can/ /shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar mchi/ /gang gis spyod pa 'tshal ba yi//
349a3(mdo sde): skar ma'i gnas ni 'di dag lags/ /'jig rten na ni rnam shes 'dis/ /sems can rnams ni pha rol 'dren/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i spyod
349a4(mdo sde): yul can/ /byis pa gang la chags 'dug pa/ /de ni byis pa rmongs pa ste/ /sems la gnas shing rims nad bcas/ /khyi dang sbrul dang rus spal dang / /srog chags gzhan
349a5(mdo sde): yang rnam mang po/ /skar ma rgyal la gang skyes pa/ /de dag bde la brten pa yin/ /ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang / /thar pa khyod kyis rnyed pa bzhin/ /nga yang thams cad gzigs
349a6(mdo sde): pa na| |ci phyir nga la khyod mi 'dri/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad ces gsol to/ /drang srong mi
349a7(mdo sde): yi gzugs su ni/ /mtshan mchog rnams kyang shin tu gda'/ /khyod kyi gdung rus ma 'tshal na/ /lha'am 'on te khyod mi lags/ /gsung dang dbyangs dag 'byin pa ni/ /tshangs
349b1(mdo sde): pa chen po bzhin du gda'/ /spyod pa'i gnas kyang tshul gyis ni/ /sngon gyi drang srong rnams dang 'dra/ /thub pa ci 'dra phun sum tshogs/ /'di sngon ma mthong ma thos na/ /khyod kyi ston gang de ci smra//
349b2(mdo sde): khyod kyi gdung rus ci lags gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /pha rol tshu rol mi shes shing / /mtshan ma la ni gang gnas pa/ /de dag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcings//
349b3(mdo sde): de ni thar pa'i snod ma yin/ /pha rol phyin drug nga yi rus/ /bram ze mngon shes drug dang ldan/ /yang dag dga' bya drug smra zhing / /dbang po drug ni rnam par bshig /chos gsum rtogs
349b4(mdo sde): pa'i shes dang ldan/ /nga yi spyod pa rnam thar gsum/ /byang chub sems ni nam skyes pa/ /de tshe nga ni rab tu byung / /mtshan ma rnams ni ngas ma dmigs/ /mtshan ma med pa rab tu bsgoms//
349b5(mdo sde): sems can med cing srog med pa/ /bdag med stong par mngon sangs rgyas/ /tshor ba gsum dang 'du byed gsum/ /stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms/ /nga ni ye shes pha rol song / /nga yi
349b6(mdo sde): tshigs 'di gsungs pa med/ /gang dag mkha' bzhin ma chags par/ /byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed pa/ /de dag bzod stobs phun sum tshogs/ /ye shes 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur/ /
349b7(mdo sde): chos rnams la ni mi 'jug cing / /rnam par smin pa 'dod med la/ /de bzhin nyid las 'gal mi byed/ /de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /chos rnams la ni mi gnas shing / /pha rol tshu rol
350a1(mdo sde): mi brten par/ /yang dag mthar ni 'dir bsgoms na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang med/ /dmigs pa
350a2(mdo sde): de ni rnam par spangs/ /chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir 'ong la/ /rang gi sems la the tshom spongs/ /nam mkha'
350a3(mdo sde): 'dra bar shes nas su/ /nga 'dra sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byos/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs ma thag tu de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba
350a4(mdo sde): g.yog dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du zhugs par mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon sum du gyur to/ /de
350a5(mdo sde): nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin du 'dug nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad la lta zhing gzhan la rag las
350a6(mdo sde): pa med de/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob bo/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas
350a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyis na me tog thogs te bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /yon tan mtha'
350b1(mdo sde): yas 'jig rten mgon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa/ /khyed kyi ye shes spyan gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang mdzad/ /rtag tu sems can kun gyi slad du dpa' bo byams
350b2(mdo sde): pas mngon 'phags pa/ /sems can snying po chags pa zad pa 'dren pa khyod la deng phyag 'tshal/ /gser gyi kha dog gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsil gyur ba'i/ /yon
350b3(mdo sde): tan dag gis sems can thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul/ /khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs ri rnams bcom par 'gyur/ /tha ma'i spyod pa byang
350b4(mdo sde): chub shes pa'i rgyu ni de ring mthar phyin to/ /sman pa chen po sems can snying po mtshan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan pa/ /sems can snying po sangs rgyas 'gyur ba 'dren pa de ring bshad du
350b5(mdo sde): gsol| |bdag gis lta ba'i rgya mtsho bcad cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi/ /ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba mi yi dam pa lung bstan gsol/ /sdug bsngal chu bo
350b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i sems can srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi/ /phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon
350b7(mdo sde): tan rgya mtsho lta bu dag / de dag bdag gis dpang du gsol te byang chub tu ni sems gzhol bgyi/ /drag cing mi bzad rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i sems can kun/ /dus
351a1(mdo sde): gsum gyi ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des/ /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal de ring zhi bar gyur cig sems can kun/ /sangs
351a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ni bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'das par shog / sems can thams cad nang zhir gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang skam par shog /ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes dbang po'i
351a3(mdo sde): snying po ldan pa thob gyur cig / sems can gang dag bsad par chad cing sdug bsngal dag gis gtses pa rnams/ /de dag bdag gi bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis myur du thar
351a4(mdo sde): par shog / sems can re res kyang ni yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad thob gyur cig /shes rab bsod nams tshad med pa dang bde ba kun gyis tshim par shog /de dag sdig pa'i rnam
351a5(mdo sde): spangs lta ba mnyam nyid myur du bsten gyur cig / sems can thams cad skye ba dran cing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog /sems can de kun chos grus srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol rgal
351a6(mdo sde): gyur cig / thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang grub par shog /bskal pa dpag tu med par chos kyi char ba 'bebs shing 'dug gyur cig /sems can
351a7(mdo sde): thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char chus legs par 'khru bar shog / bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs ba cung zad ci bgyis pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dpang du gsol
351b1(mdo sde): te gus par bgyis nas so sor bshags/ /bdag kyang phyin chad sdig la lta ba'i las rnams spyod par ma gyur cig /rtag tu mdun na bsam gyis mi khyab gang zag mtshog bzhugs
351b2(mdo sde): mthong bar shog / bdag gi bsod nams cung zad ci mchis deng de byang chub bsngo bar bgyi/ /sems can ched du spyod pa kun dang sdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi/ /sems
351b3(mdo sde): can thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam du rab tu gzung bar bgyi/ /bskal bar zhing dang ye shes sems can rgya mtsho rnam par spyad par bgyi/ /gang du byang chub reg par
351b4(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi/ /'khor kun rnam par dag cing bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog /smra ba'i seng+ge nges par mngon par shes pa lnga rnams
351b5(mdo sde): thob par shog / 'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pa lung bstan gsol/ /'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas chos kun kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhe na/
351b6(mdo sde): me tog sil ma gtor ba nam mkha' la ni gdugs su gnas par shog /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhag pa kun kyang dbang gyis shig /sa rnams g.yo bar byed
351b7(mdo sde): cing khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal shog / de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'i steng logs su gtor ba dang / me tog
352a1(mdo sde): de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du gdugs gcig tu gyur nas 'dug ste/ drang srong skar ma la dga' bas de mthong nas
352a2(mdo sde): rab tu zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde bas tshim par byed par gyur te/ de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
352a3(mdo sde): la gtugs so/ /drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong
352a4(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang dag der lhags pa de dag thams cad
352a5(mdo sde): kyang yid skyo zhing ltad mor gyur to/ /gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ni/ bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong nas yid dga' bar
352a6(mdo sde): gyur cing drang srong chen pos me tog gtor ba de dag steng gi bar snang la gdugs su gyur te gnas pa dang / sa g.yos pa de'ang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te bcom
352a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/ /gang dag yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi cha byad
352b1(mdo sde): du mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis ting nge 'dzin
352b2(mdo sde): de las bzhengs par mthong nas zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang / mgu ba skyes te bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza'
352b3(mdo sde): dang / 'phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan ji snyed pa dag gis gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /drang srong chen po myur du longs la
352b4(mdo sde): nyon| |byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dren pa gsung / /mnyam pa med pa'i mthus ni sa g.yos shing / /nam mkha' la yang me tog gdugs gcig 'dug /khyod ni 'jig
352b5(mdo sde): rten phan phyir ston dbang po/ /rkang gnyis bdag gi gtso bo sangs rgyas su/ /bsod nams mtha' yas nam mkha' tshad mnyam pa/ /khams gsum snying po 'gro ba'i sgron
352b6(mdo sde): mar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang du bdag chos kyi 'khor lo
352b7(mdo sde): bskor bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa na byang phyogs su sangs
353a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing me tog rgyas pa'i dri zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du bkod pa de
353a2(mdo sde): lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin
353a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i
353a4(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul med spos snang skar ma'i dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni/
353a5(mdo sde): bar gyi bskal pa bcu thub par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi gnas
353a6(mdo sde): su 'gyur te/ khyod kyang de na theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston par 'gyur ro/ /'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar
353a7(mdo sde): ma la dga' ba'i lung bstan pa de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i las la mngon par brtson par gyur to/ /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang / srog chags
353b1(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
353b2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba thob bo/ /'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //bam po lnga pa/ de nas bdud bye ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag gis brgyan pa de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang
353b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo gang dang / gang nas gshegs pa de'i sgo de dang / de'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad par du 'phags pas brgyan to snyam pa dang / de
353b4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bye ba de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa mkhyen nas 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu
353b5(mdo sde): ' phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis grong khyer gyi sgo re re nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
353b6(mdo sde): por gshegs so/ /bdud bye ba de dag kyang nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul grangs med pa
354a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa bkod pa'i mchog rnams dang / bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyi grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang / sa'i phyogs de dag dang / rtsig pa de dag dang / shing de
354a2(mdo sde): dag dang / sa'i ngos de dag brgyan to/ /bdud bye ba de dag dang / bdud kyi 'khor de dag la la ni/ tshangs pa'i cha byad lta bu nas drang srong chen po'i cha byad lta bu'i bar du bsgyur te nam
354a3(mdo sde): mkha' la gnas bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi skar khung dang / rta babs dang / ba gam dang / skyed shing gi nang du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / gser
354a4(mdo sde): dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig sna tshogs kyis spras pa dang / gos dang / ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ sil
354a5(mdo sde): snyan dang / dkrol ba sna tshogs ni/ dkrol nas bstod pa dang / yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das de
354a6(mdo sde): ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog tu rgya che ba/ khyad par du 'phags pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo nas zhugs te zhabs
354a7(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i sgo'i them pa la reg par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la reg ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong
354b1(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/ /gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / 'jig
354b2(mdo sde): rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag
354b3(mdo sde): dang / sa dang / chu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor gyi lha dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang / 'og min gyi
354b4(mdo sde): b ar nas bzung ste sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad sa g.yos par snang ba des bskul ma thag tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po khor khor yug tu
354b5(mdo sde): bsgor nas sa dang nam mkha' la gnas shing me tog dang / spos dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma'i bar gyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me
354b6(mdo sde): tog dang / phye ma'i bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi cha re re na'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa

355a1(mdo sde): de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag ltos/ /byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad pa spyod/ /khyod kyi 'khor
355a2(mdo sde): ba'i gcong rong 'khyams pa yi/ /'jig rten thams cad dag ni bsgral bar byos/ /yongs su smin dang ldan pa'i dus bab kyi/ /g.yeng bar gyur pa rab tu myur thong la/ /'dir

355a4(mdo sde): stong bye ba rang gis pham mdzad de/ /de ni chos kyi 'khor lo myur du bskor/ /grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad/ /dpa' mchog dngos po yang dag ston par mdzad/ /'gro ba
355a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal dag las thar mdzad nas/ /byang chub tu ni de ring lung yang ston/ /rang byung mya ngan med pa grong khyer gshegs/ /de phyir zhing der rab tu myur gshegs la/ /de
355a6(mdo sde): ltar mdzes pa de dag rab bltas te/ /rim gyis byang chub tu yang 'gyur bar byos/ /yang de'i tshe 'od ma'i chal na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos dang /
355a7(mdo sde): nyan thos chen po gang dag nang du yang dag par 'jog la gnas pa de dag gis ston pa de la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na 'dul ba la
355b1(mdo sde): gzhes shing bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su 'khod pa
355b2(mdo sde): dang / bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de nas me tog dang / phye ma'i rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
355b3(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du gang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
355b4(mdo sde): dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos gang dag gnas pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu/ ro
355b5(mdo sde): myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ tshim par byed par 'os pa 'di lta bu/ spro bar byed pa 'di lta bu'i yon tan chen po brjod par 'os pa
355b6(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di dag dang / me tog dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag ga las 'ongs snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag
355b7(mdo sde): rang gi dge ba'i phyogs btang ste ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun
356a1(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
356a2(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bkod pa chen
356a3(mdo sde): po 'di lta bu dag snang ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag cing rdul bsags pa

356b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yul gyis lha'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan de dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag 'di snyam du

356b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems

356b6(mdo sde): thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to/ /de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs
356b7(mdo sde): med dpag tu med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang / nam mkha'i bar ma lus par
357a1(mdo sde): gang bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rnam par

357b3(mdo sde): bo| |la la dag gis ni/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod rnams rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs so/ /la la dag gis ni/ rin po che'i snod sna

358a4(mdo sde): por gshegs nas srang gi dbus na pad+ma yod pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas phyag g.yas pa'i mthil gyis pad+ma'i snying po la reg par mdzad de drangs nas bzhugs so/ /

358a6(mdo sde): cad kyang g.yos so/ /bdud kyi gnas thams cad na gzhal med khang dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / stan rnams kyang rab tu g.yos so/ /de na gang bdud kyi bu rnams

358b1(mdo sde): ni| gzhal med khang 'di dag g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi rgyal po bdud de rang gi yul nas 'phos par ma gyur grang / bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba'i

358b4(mdo sde): bzhin du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang der bzhugs pa

358b7(mdo sde): 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par mthong ngo / /de nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya
359a1(mdo sde): ba dang / da ltar bdag cag gi jo bo dang / g.yog tu bcas pa gang dor ba'ang dri ba'i phyir der 'dong gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas
359a2(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing 'di'i bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas
359a3(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rab tu rnam par dad
359a4(mdo sde): sems kyis/ /bcom ldan bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /bdag khrol 'di nas myur du thong / /chos ni yang dag spyad par bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'gro
359a5(mdo sde): ba dang ni 'ong ba yang / /ngas ni su la'ang bzlog pa med/ /gal te lam ni rab shes na/ /gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byos/ /bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rang
359a6(mdo sde): gi spyod yul gar dga' bar/ /gang tshe bdag ni mchi 'tshal te/ /bdag ni bcing pa lnga dag gis/ /bcings par mthong ngo gau ta ma/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga
359a7(mdo sde): ni rtog pa kun spangs te/ /grol nas 'gro ba grol byed pa/ /ngas ni 'tshe ba rnam spangs nas/ /sems can bcings pa thar par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi
359b1(mdo sde): s pyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba la gzigs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'
359b2(mdo sde): stsal to| |'dir lhags pa dag thams cad kyang / /the tshom thams cad rab spongs la/ /skad cig ci yang ma smra bar/ /khyod cag rnams ni da nyon cig /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig
359b3(mdo sde): rten dkon/ /chos dang dge 'dun shin tu dkon/ /dad cing mos pa 'byor pa dang / /byang chub spyod pa shin tu dkon/ /'jig rten mgon po'i mngon sum du/ /chos nyan pa yang shin
359b4(mdo sde): tu dkon/ /gang du bzod pa ston byed pa/ /de yi dus ni rnyed par dka'/ /gang du 'jig rten sdig pa yi/ /rtog pa thams cad rab spong ba/ /stong pa nyid ni sgom pa dang / /sems
359b5(mdo sde): ni dul bar byed pa dkon/ /ji ltar ngas ni sngon spyad pa'i/ /byang chub spyod pa rnyed par dka'/ /de las me tog tsham tshod 'di/ /khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya/ /gang gis byang
359b6(mdo sde): chub 'byor byed pa/ /srid pa'i bcings las rab grol zhing / /mun pa'i phung po sel ba yi/ /lam gyi mchog ni bstan par bya/ /dri ma ngan pa gsum spongs la/ /ston
359b7(mdo sde): pas gsungs pa 'dir nyon cig / chu bo rnams kyi pha rol rgol/ /rgya mtsho can gyi sred pa spongs/ /rnam thar gsum la rab gnas shing / /sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas/ /
360a1(mdo sde): khams gsum kun gyi nyon mongs gang / /de dag ma lus rnam par chom/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mchog dang / /chos kyi don du khyed cag rnams/ /
360a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum gyi/ /byin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams/ /dus gsum ma rig bsgribs pa'i sems/ /bye phrag tu ni rab tu spongs/ /khams
360a3(mdo sde): gsum pa las grol ba yi/ /zhi byed bzod pa thob par byos/ /phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi yis/ /so so'i skye bo bslad pa rnams/ /dngos po med la rtog byed
360a4(mdo sde): pa| |de dag bzod pa'i snod ma yin/ /mig ni gzugs la chags pa yis/ /lus dang ngag dang sems bsgribs nas/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba rnams/ /
360a5(mdo sde): 'khor ba shin tu bsten par 'gyur/ /'jig rten na ni gang mkhas gsal/ /bsam gtan sgom par byed pa rnams/ /de dag phyin ci log bzhi las/ /de ring
360a6(mdo sde): rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ /dbang phyug de dag sems can rnams/ /chu bo bzhi las thar par byed/ /'chi 'pho skye ba rab shes pa/ /des pa rnams ni pha rol 'gro//
360a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa dag /sems can sred pas bcings pa rnams/ /yang dag shes pas gcod par byed/ /phung po lnga rnams
360b1(mdo sde): yongs shes pas/ /zhags pa las grol zag pa med/ /yang dag yang du mi skye ste/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar byed/ /sdig pa dag
360b2(mdo sde): ni myur du shogs/ /sdig pa ma lus rab spongs la/ /'jigs pa med par pha rol song / /srid par yang dag yang skyes pas/ /sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song bas/ /
360b3(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag ni/ /'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po rab spangs te/ /sdig pa'i lta ba rnams bor nas/ /'khor ba'i
360b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal dran byas te/ /dam pa'i chos la rab sbyor cig /btung ba'i dam pa 'thung bar byos/ /stong pa nyid kyang rab sgoms shig /dam pa'i don la dngos po med/ /
360b5(mdo sde): rdzas kyang med cing mtshan nyid med/ /'di ltar dbang po drug stong ste/ /byed pa po ni 'di la med/ /de bzhin mtshan mar rtog pa yang / /dngos po tsam ste g.yo ba med/ /tshor
360b6(mdo sde): ba drug dang sred pa drug / reg pa drug las byung ba yin/ /de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug /stong pa yin par shes par byos/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med par/ /dngos
360b7(mdo sde): po nyid la brtag par byos/ /skye ba med cing 'gag med pas/ /'di na rdzas kyang med par ltos/ /gang gis chos kun tshul gcig ste/ /dus gsum du yang dngos med par//
361a1(mdo sde): shes pa de dag nad med de/ /de ni bla na med pa'i lam/ /rnam pa bcu gsum nges grol la/ /sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing / /tshu
361a2(mdo sde): rol pha rol rnam grol ba/ /de ni bzod pa sgom pa yin/ /de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang /
361a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs pa de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i
361a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i snyigs ma lnga can gang+gA'i klung dpag tu med pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnams su dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig
361a5(mdo sde): brjod pa 'di dag grags par gyur nas de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ shin tu zang
361a6(mdo sde): zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / dad pa rnyed de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /la la dag gis ni/ ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa
361a7(mdo sde): dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyis ni/ don dang / tshig dang / yi ge 'di dag
361b1(mdo sde): thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to/ /sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung ba thob par gyur to/ /de
361b2(mdo sde): n as byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas pad+ma'i khri la 'dzeg par bya ba'i phyir rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas me tog
361b3(mdo sde): gis kun tu g.yogs pa mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rga shi mya ngan gyi/ /
361b4(mdo sde): 'dam du bying ba'i 'jig rten thams cad la/ /rab tu gzigs te mi rgyu rgyur bcas te/ /'jig rten du ni chos kyi zam pa thogs/ /thal mo sbyar ba'i sems can rgya chen brgyas/ /
361b5(mdo sde): rab tu gtams pa'i zhing la gzigs nas su/ /chos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgo bar gsol/ /rang gi mthu rtsal rab tu bstan du gsol/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i pad+ma mngon
361b6(mdo sde): 'dzegs te/ /mgon po shes rab dang ni thabs rnams kyis/ /chos chu sprin gyis char pa rab phob la/ /nyon mongs gzir ba'i mi la bstan du gsol/ /phyogs bcu
361b7(mdo sde): dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan/ /khyod kyi dpang du de dag kun bzhugs kyi/ /thub pa'i dbang po bdud rnams pham par
362a1(mdo sde): mdzod| |chos rnams stong pa nam mkha' lta bu dang / /ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brlar mkhyen nas/ /sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod la/ /bla med 'khor lo dam
362a2(mdo sde): pa bskor du gsol/ /chu bo bzhi dbus 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /mi yi seng+ge de ring bsgral du gsol/ /khyod kyis chos rnams shin tu thugs su chud/ /srid gsum mtsho las 'jig
362a3(mdo sde): rten bsgral du gsol/ /shin tu rlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das/ /bde bar gshegs kyi lam ni bde ba la/ /'gro ba gzud 'dod mtshungs med chos kyang ston/ /'jig rten nyes
362a4(mdo sde): pa'i dri ma bsal du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur sprul pa'i them skad de las pad+ma'i khri la mngon par 'dzegs te pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
362a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzigs nas bdud sdig can la bka' stsal pa/ bdud sdig can/ ji ltar khyod kyi rkyen gyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
362a6(mdo sde): grangs bshad pas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mngal na gnas pa dang / rga shis gtses pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ rnam par thar par 'gyur/ chu bo
362a7(mdo sde): bzhi las yang dag par brgal bar 'gyur/ zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur te/ 'di la sdig can khyod ni/ sems
362b1(mdo sde): can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyi/ khyod dga' bar gyis shig /sdig can khyod kyis nga la chos bshad par gsol cig dang ngas deng bdud kyi
362b2(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /ci ste sdig med khyod la thab
362b3(mdo sde): zhe sdang rgyags med na/ /ci phyir deng 'dir kun tu skrag par bya phyir chos kyang ston/ /de ste khyod la tha ba rgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni/ /thub dbang khyod kyi thar pa ci 'dra ba dag la 'di shod cig/
362b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nga ni sa la mngal gyi gnas na zla ba bcur gnas pa/ /de na yang ni bdud khyod nga la gsang bar rab tu sbyar/ /de tshe nga la 'khon dang tha ba cung zad tsam
362b5(mdo sde): yang med/ /nga ni bzod dang ldan te tha ba ma lus med pa yin/ /nga ni btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sa yang g.yo bar byas/ /nga gsad phyir ni rdo ba'i char pa rab tu dbab par byas/ /de nas khyod
362b6(mdo sde): kyis nga yi ma yi nu zho myur bskams byas/ /khyod kyis nga la gnod pa rnam pa du ma ci ma byas/ /nga ni bsam gtan zhugs na khyod kyis bud med khrid de 'ongs/ /nga ni bsod snyoms rnam par
362b7(mdo sde): spyod tshe zas kyang bcad par byas/ /khyod kyis rtag tu nga la rgyal srid mngon par rab tu bstabs/ /nga ni 'byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mun pa byas par gyur/ /de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis
363a1(mdo sde): grong khyer kun tu bskor/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni song tshe rdzi char drag po rab tu phab/ /sa ni 'dom do 'phang tsam rdo ba dag gis gang bar byas/ /zhi ba'i gnas na gnas
363a2(mdo sde): pa'i tshe yang sgra ni rab tu phyung / /nga ni shin tu dka' ba spyod tshe grang ba'i rlung dang ni/ /'bab chu 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bo rab tu btang / /nga ni gsad par bya phyir khyod kyis seng+ge
363a3(mdo sde): rab tu btang / /de tshe khyod kyis nga yi zas la drang po'i dug kyang btab/ /nga ni byang chub shing drung nye bar yang dag song ba na/ /rdo rje dang ni gnam lcags spu gri mda' char khyod kyis phab/ /'gro
363a4(mdo sde): la phan phyir rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par gnas pa na/ /khyod kyis dur smrig gos kyang 'jim rdzab dag gis rab tu bskus/ /de na yang ni nga gan khyod kyis bu mo rnams bkye ste/ /nga gsad
363a5(mdo sde): phyir ni khyod nyid mthu dang bcas te 'ongs mod kyi/ /'on kyang khyod kyis nga yi yid la gnod byas cung zad med/ /ngas ni khyod btul nas su byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob/ /'on kyang ngo tsha
363a6(mdo sde): bor te 'dir 'ongs nas ni yang smra 'am/ /sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od srung mchog la sogs pa bzlog byas te/ /khyod kyis sems can bye ba dum ma rungs byas nas kyang / /snying rje bor te
363a7(mdo sde): 'dir yang nga la rgol zhing sgyu byed dam/ /nga yis zas ma zos pa de yi tshe yang khyod kyis su/ /nga gsad phyir ni glang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang / /sa steng nga la lhas byin gyis ni
363b1(mdo sde): rdo ba 'phangs pa dang / /kye ma ngas ni zla ba gsum du rta chas zos pa dang / /phyar ka gtang phyir bu mo mdzes ldan rab tu gang btang dang / /me mdag 'bar ba mi bzad pas ni 'obs rnams bkang ba
363b2(mdo sde): dang / /kha zas dag ni myur du gdug pa'i dug dang sbyar ba yi/ /de la sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtsa bar nges pa yin/ /khyod nyid dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig sder bcas 'ongs nas su/ /nga gsad
363b3(mdo sde): phyir ni mda' bo che dang ral gri mda' mang thogs/ /'on kyang 'dir ni khyod kyis nga yi spu gcig ma g.yos na/ /ci phyir khyod ni rgyags par gyur nas da dung 'dug /ji snyed bdud ni stong phrag bye ba
363b4(mdo sde): rgol du yang btsud kyang / /sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag ni 'dir yang lhags nas su/ /zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa nga yi dbang yin te/ /nga ni khyod phyir mchog tu byams pa'i yid
363b5(mdo sde): kyis gnas par bya/ /nga ni snying rje'i gnas te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin byed pa/ /khyod ni shin tu gtum po nga la rtag tu bgegs byed de/ /thub pa'i dbang po khyu mchog 'di dag nga yi dbang yin
363b6(mdo sde): da ltar tha ma'i dus la nga ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa bya/ /rnam thar sems kyis sems can rnams kyi don yang spyad par bya/ /smras par gyur kyang bzod pa yongs su btang bar mi bya'o/ /nga la phrag dog byed
363b7(mdo sde): ba rab tu khro ba'i yid med de/ /khyed ni rjes su gzung phyir nga nyid rtag tu mngon par brtson/ /nga la gsol dang khyod yid zhi phyir 'jig rten gsum dag tu/ /mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud
364a1(mdo sde): rtsi bshad par bya/ /de phyir khyod kyi sdig pa'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyi/ /'jig rten mgon po nga la yid ni myur du dad par byos/ /khyod ni rtag tu 'di na

364a5(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog tu mngon par sprul to/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
364a6(mdo sde): shing 'tsho la gzhes te chos kyang ston pa de thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gdugs su byin gyis brlabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
364a7(mdo sde): de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa/ me tog gi gdugs 'di dag ga las mchis/

365b2(mdo sde): byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa/ gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa/ pha
365b3(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa la 'dzud pa/ bla na med pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi ros sems can rnams tshim par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs

365b5(mdo sde): pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'chad par bzhed do/ /'das pa'i de bzhin
365b6(mdo sde): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
365b7(mdo sde): phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so/ /byin gyis brlabs so/ /gcig la gcig dgyes so/ /da ltar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
366a1(mdo sde): g ang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi
366a2(mdo sde): snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung ngo / /byin gyis rlob bo/ /gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad do/ /ma
366a3(mdo sde): ' ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag
366a4(mdo sde): kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus yongs su 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar
366a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
366a6(mdo sde): dag yod pa de dag so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis sngon ma thos pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i
366a7(mdo sde): chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gang 'di ltar yon tan mang po bgyid pa/ 'di ltar yon tan bsam
366b1(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snang ba bgyid pa nas zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying
366b2(mdo sde): pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa/ bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa nas phung po'i
366b3(mdo sde): lhag ma mchis pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bgyid pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs
366b4(mdo sde): brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
366b5(mdo sde): gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /nged kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
366b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo / /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho la
366b7(mdo sde): gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin
367a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang
367a2(mdo sde): lhan cig sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / ngan pa spyod pa las bzlog pa dang / bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs
367a3(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di

367a5(mdo sde): m i mjed du 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bltas te chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms

367b2(mdo sde): cad dang / lha'i yul dang / bdud kyi yul thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi brgyan bkod pa de dag la blta ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon ma mthong ma thos pa blta bar
367b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa de dag dang / da nged lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /
