368b1(mdo sde): k hams su bsdu bar bsdus pa khams dang skye mched las gnas pa'i sems can de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang ri rab tsam du gyur tu zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sems
368b2(mdo sde): can lus de lta bur gyur pa de dag thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par nus so/ /sems can re re zhing yang yul dang gnas kyi go skabs yangs te/ sems can de dag phan tshun du

369b2(mdo sde): gyi las kyi mtha'i bya ba dang / phung po dang / spyod pa dang / bsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa dang / gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mu nas bzung ste dus gsum du

372b4(mdo sde): 'dza' ba dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam mtha' dag bstan pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / nam mkha' dang / de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa dang / mun pa dang / snang ba dang / dmigs

372b6(mdo sde): pa dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba dang / mi 'gag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dngos po ma mchis shing yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyer ma mchis pa dang / sa dang / chu dang / me
372b7(mdo sde): dang / rlung dang / rnam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'dir bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi
373a1(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag la dkon mchog gsum
373a2(mdo sde): mngon sum du gyur cig / sems can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid cing phan par bgyid par gyur cig /sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa
373a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa thob par gyur cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad
373a4(mdo sde): kyis kyang chos bstan pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang nas pad+ma'i snying po de dag la bzhugs so/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams
373a5(mdo sde): cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa'i phyir dran pa dang / dad pa dang / dang ba dang / mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom
373a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang /
373a7(mdo sde): lta ba ngan pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa kun gzhi'i nyes pa dag rab tu zhi bar
373b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / sems can so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi /'di na gzhan su'ang med do/ /bdag gcig pu la de bzhin
373b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bzhed do/ /'di na gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol
373b3(mdo sde): ba ma btab bo/ /snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /yang de'i tshe gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
373b4(mdo sde): ma lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang po thams cad bsten te thal mo sbyar nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
373b5(mdo sde): kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
373b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi chos nan tan gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams la mchod pa'i phyir spos bkod pa las shin
373b7(mdo sde): tu lhag pa'i spos gong du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byin gyis brlabs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams mchod pa'i
374a1(mdo sde): phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lag pa rin po che dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang /
374a2(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
374a3(mdo sde): gang ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis
374a4(mdo sde): 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can
374a5(mdo sde): bsam pa nyams pa/ lam rab tu stor ba/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis nyon mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa/ ngan song gsum du zhugs pa/ mi dge ba dang 'grogs
374a6(mdo sde): pa| dge ba thams cad dang bral ba/ mkhas pa thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ snying
374a7(mdo sde): rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du snying brtse ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang / dro ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang /

374b4(mdo sde): ma dang / shing gi 'dab ma rtsub pa/ dri mi zhim pa/ reg na mi bde ba'i mal cha spyad par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos nas sems

375b1(mdo sde): kyis glu dang gar tshul ma yin pa byed du 'dzud do/ /thabs brgya stong du mas bdag gsad pa'i phyir brtson no/ /bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma gsad pa dang / chos kyi

376a5(mdo sde): s ar dbugs dbyung ba la 'dzud cing ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam
376a6(mdo sde): pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing byin gyis
376a7(mdo sde): b rlabs te gcig la gcig dgyes pa de 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir
376b1(mdo sde): d ri ba'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsrung ba'i slad du chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i

376b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi

377b1(mdo sde): sarba mU ha Ne/ d+hi d+hi ra ya ni/ ma kha shwa ra la ya ni/ r-i Sha ni dza ni/ d+ha ba ba tsi/ tsaN+Da la sa me/ sarba sa s+ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sid+d+h+yan+tu ma hA nAM/ ni ni pA la ra ti/ oM rdzo gre/ pi tsi ni/ bA na ha ra/ bu pu re/
377b2(mdo sde): gu ru gu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ hi li hi li/ ha la ha la/ ka ka nA da ba ha/ hi hi ta ma/ a yur ha na kaN+Da dz+wa la/ b+ha se ga da ne/ a ta ha ni/ mArga a b+hi ro ha ni/ pha la sa t+ye/ a ro Sha ba ti/ hi li hi li/

377b7(mdo sde): ma ti pa ti/ ma hA ad b+hU ta mu dri ta/ yi ge tsid/ Sha Da ya ta na ni shri tA b+hu ta/ i na mi ne/ sa tsa ne/ go Sha sa tsa ne/ mu dri tA/ AR+ya a d+hiSh+ThA na b+ha pa thA nA/ n+ya thA ma hA pu N+ye sa mu ts+tsha ya/ a ba tA ra
378a1(mdo sde): ma hA kA ru Na ya/ mu dri ta sarba saM mya ga pra ti bad tsi rA d+ha tran dz+wa la tu d+harma ne/ tri sarbe mu ni b+hi Sha b+ha/ ma hA kA ru Na/ sa mA d+hi/ dz+nyA na la b+ha ba len/ mai tri t+ya ga /a b+hi bI R+ya
378a2(mdo sde): ba le na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba b+hU ta u pa tsa yA ya swAhA/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'di skad ces sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
378a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes lan gsum smras nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /kye ma'o thub pa 'dus
378a4(mdo sde): pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /kye ma'o chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i

378b2(mdo sde): ba'i bar gyi phyir de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do/ /gzungs
378b3(mdo sde): lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa thob par gyur
378b4(mdo sde): to| |yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te kun tu rnam par bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi
378b5(mdo sde): zhing 'dir thams cad dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal ba zla ba rnams kyi 'khor/ /'di 'dra ba ni rnyed par dka'/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs che/ /mkhas pa 'di ni
378b6(mdo sde): rnyed par dka'/ /gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa yi/ /mgon pos chos tshul byin brlabs pa/ /phyag rgya 'di 'dra thos pa yang / /mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o/ /bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad
378b7(mdo sde): dang / /dgra rnams kyang ni pham byed pa/ /dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi chad pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs/ /sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/ /bzod dang des pa rab
379a1(mdo sde): 'phel ba/ /sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa/ /rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor skyong / /'di na ngan byas zlog byed pa/ /lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa/ /byang chub
379a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa/ /byang chub lam yang rab ston pa/ /pha rol phyin pa 'phel byed pa/ /bzang por spyod pa rdzogs byed pa/ /thabs dang ye shes spobs pa rnams/ /'phel
379a3(mdo sde): bar bya phyir byin gyis brlabs/ /dkar po'i phyogs ni sdud byed pa/ /gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /byang chub lam las mi g.yob/ /chos kyi dbang rnams 'bar byed pa'i/ /gzungs
379a4(mdo sde): la yid gnyis thams cad ni/ /bsal nas lhag par mos par byos/ /gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba/ /'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no/ /chos smra rnams ni bsrung ba dang / /nyan pa
379a5(mdo sde): mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa yi gzungs/ /bdag gis de yang bshad par bya/ /sgrib pa med pa 'grub pa dang / /sems can rnams kyi phan 'phel phyir/ /byang chub
379a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' grags chen po/ su dag 'di la dad pa 'bul/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyur pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di

379b1(mdo sde): bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos la me tog sna tshogs bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/

379b3(mdo sde): gzungs 'di yang dag par bshad na/ su'ang de'i sems 'khrug pa'am/ khams 'khrug pa'am/ lus 'khrug pa'am/ yid 'khrug par mi byed do/ /de'i lus la su'ang dbugs mi gtong ngo / /

379b7(mdo sde): 'du bar 'gyur ba de dag la yang su'ang khams 'khrug pa'am/ skad 'gag par byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag de na gzungs 'di nyan pa de dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyis yun ring por na ba dang /

380a3(mdo sde): dgongs su gsol/ gzungs 'di la dad pa stsal du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ kha shAn+te/ a sa mA ro pa/ mai tri sau ma ba te/ e hi/ na ba kun dza be/ na ba kun dza be/ mU la sho d+ha ne/ ba ha kha/

380a5(mdo sde): tri Ne| b+hu tA ko Ti pa ri ts+tshe de/ dz+wa la kha/ dz+wa la kha ba ye/ dz+wa la kha nA ma kha sha kha ka ka kha ha hA ha hA hu hu spa ra Sha be da na pa ri ts+tshe da na/ a ma mA n+yu ma ma khya ma ma sa mu dra/ mu drwa ba kha/ saM skA ra

380b1(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po de dag dang / sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyang legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin no/ /

385a6(mdo sde): ci'ang ma yin pa'i bar du nga la ci zhig blta/ ci 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / ci'ang ma yin zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang yod dam/ de bzhin du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
385a7(mdo sde): gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams yod do/ /zhes bya ba'i ming gi dngos po ni/ rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do/ /mtshan nyid kyi rkyen ni/ ma rig pa'o/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams nas
385b1(mdo sde): 'gog pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar ma mchis pas na/ de'i slad du ma rig pa zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te ma rig pa ma mchis
385b2(mdo sde): na| srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de dag ga las skye bar 'gyur/ ci nam mkha' las skye zhes bgyir ni/ nam mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
385b3(mdo sde): kyi bu| de de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni/ nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rdzas ma yin/ mtshan nyid ma yin/ mun pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ rtog pa ma yin/
385b4(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa ma yin/ grub pa ma yin/ brjod pa ma yin/ ci'ang ma yin pa/ cha shas med pa/ dngos po thams cad spangs pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
385b5(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su bcad pa'o/ /bri ba med pa dang / gang ba med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ pha rol dang / tshu rol
385b6(mdo sde): la reg pa med pa'o/ /cha shas med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ brjod du med pa'o/ /mi g.yo zhing rnam par bzhag pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ rdzas dang / dngos
385b7(mdo sde): po dang | mtshan nyid thams cad med pa'o/ /tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni/ sgro btags pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa/ kun tu rtog pa las srid
386a1(mdo sde): pa'i yan lag rnams skyes so/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
386a2(mdo sde): bskyed do/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' lta bur dngos po ma mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ de ci'i slad du ye shes

386a4(mdo sde): ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / ci'ang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la slob tu 'dzud/ gang gi tshe sems can 'di dag khyod kyis bslab pa la slob pa na de dag la nyon mongs pa skye ba'i spyod pa yang
386a5(mdo sde): dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /gang gi slad du khyod kyis bdag gi slad du grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

386b1(mdo sde): bar bgyis/ snying rje med pa 'dis kyang gang dag thos ma thag tu bdag klad pa'i nad mi zad pas btab ste sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing / lus kyang rul la dri nga bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i gsang
386b2(mdo sde): sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad/ yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang / bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin du sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum

386b6(mdo sde): su gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / de bzhin du bdud gzhan rnams nas mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar du gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal

387a2(mdo sde): dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa nas mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar rnams bsags kyi/ sdig can/ khyod da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig /de ltar na/

391a7(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin/ bgrod pa ma yin no/ /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu 'dis sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu chen po'i mthu
391b1(mdo sde): chen po brtsams nas ji srid cig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi pha rol tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
391b2(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa ni/ grangs med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis bskal pa gang

391b5(mdo sde): 'og tu bskal pa chen po sgrol ba zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skye rgu'i tshe lo stong phrag bzhi bcu thub pa na mtshams med pa byed pa nas mi dge
391b6(mdo sde): ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
391b7(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /des lo bzhi khrir sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro/ /yongs
392a1(mdo sde): su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir theg pa gsum po dag las sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya

398b5(mdo sde): rtswa dang | rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to/ /de na sems can gang dag gis yang dag par sbyar te 'tshal nas sems can de dag
398b6(mdo sde): sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par so sor rtog par gang 'jug pa de'ang bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
398b7(mdo sde): su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes pa'i mthu chen po bgyid pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
399a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gis bud med kyi gzugs kyis spro ba chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus
399a2(mdo sde): dang / rtul ba 'di lta bu dang / sems can nad pa yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba 'di lta bus bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
399a3(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig / ces smon lam btab bo/ /de ltar yang bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'phel bar bgyid do/ /skal pa chen
399a4(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa/ pha rol gnon pa/ brtan pa/ dge sbyong me tog 'di'i grogs su yang gyur cig /bdag cag gnyis kas kha dog gcig tu bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams
399a5(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bgyi'o/ /bud med rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yang bdag cag gnyis kyis nad pa rnams dang / rgan po rnams kyi nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi
399a6(mdo sde): ba'i slad du sa'i bcud las byin blangs la zas dang / skom dang / kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa sbyar bar bgyi ste/ bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su
399a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig / bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
399b1(mdo sde): bdag la legs so/ /zhes bgyi ba stsal du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ de nas sangs
399b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skyes bu dam pa/ khyod legs so/ /legs so/ /zhes de la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces
399b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /khyed ni 'jig rten nad pa'i sman pa gcig /de bzhin dbang po rnams la bde byed pa/ /pad+ma ldan pa zhing gtsang pad+ma der/ /rnam par snang mdzad ces bya rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin
399b4(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin ces bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi smon lam btab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de la'ang 'di skad
399b5(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ /khyod ni ri dang sa 'dzin gcig pu ste/ /khyod kyi re ba myur du rdzogs par 'gyur/ /rgyal ldan zhing mchog phun sum tshogs par ni/ /ye shes dbang phyug ces bya rgyal bar 'gyur/ /
399b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs su spyod pas smon lam btab pa dang / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang
399b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyod kyis 'dir ni thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /me tog 'bras bus sems can tshim byas nas/ /zhing mchog rnam par dag pa sgo ldan du/ /nyi ma mchog gi bde bar
400a1(mdo sde): gshegs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thal ba ston zhes bya bas lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs kyis me la yongs su spyod
400a2(mdo sde): pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'gro ba mi rtag 'du shes byas nas ni/ /
400a3(mdo sde): skye bo byang chub yongs su smin byas nas/ /skye bo rdul can zhing mchog rab bsngags par/ /me yi sgron ma bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can la
400a4(mdo sde): g.yo zhing rdul dang bral ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs kyis rlung la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas
400a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /g.yo bas sems can rnams la dga' sbyar te/ khyod ni nyon mongs rab tu zhi byed cing / /rnam dag zhing du mnyam nyid don
400a6(mdo sde): mthor ba/ /zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i sgron ma lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs kyis nam mkha' la
400a7(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bar du de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mi gnas ye shes
400b1(mdo sde): ston pa mya ngan med/ /yang dag byang chub lam mchog don smra ba/ /sgrib pa bsal cing chags pa med zhing du/ /ye shes mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
400b2(mdo sde): spos mchog smra ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa me tog la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas
400b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas lam mchog ston pa rnams la ni/ /me tog spos mchog dag gis mchod byas nas/ /me tog 'byung gnas zhing
400b4(mdo sde): mchog rnam dag tu/ /kun nas spos kyi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kha dog ngur smrig lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs dang
400b5(mdo sde): ldan pas tshon sna tshogs la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
400b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten ngur smrig gos la btsud nas su/ /dkon mchog gsum rigs dga' bar ldan byas nas/ /sngon por snang ba'i sangs rgyas zhing mchog tu/ /rin chen snang ba'i bde bar gshegs
400b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /de bzhin du sa bon dang / nags tshal dang / 'bras bu'i lha du ma nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag lung bstan pa thob par
401a1(mdo sde): 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bud med shin tu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
401a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang / de dag tshigs su bcad pa re res lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pho mtshan gyur te mo mtshan thob pa ni/ shin tu rnyed par
401a3(mdo sde): sla la| mo mtshan gyur te pho mtshan thob pa ni/ shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i tshe na lha dang klu chen po bye ba phrag brgya lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas byang chub tu smon
401a4(mdo sde): lam btab pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo/ /de bzhin du lha ma yin dkrigs phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang / lha dang mi'i bu mo
401a5(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu dang / bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu nas mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar
401a6(mdo sde): dang | bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag bla na med pa yang
401a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'dod pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo/ /mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / de bzhin du lha dang / klu
401b1(mdo sde): dang | gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za bgrang ba las 'das pa sngon bla na med pa yang dag
401b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag ni/ sems bskyed par gyur to/ /sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/ /sems
401b3(mdo sde): can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to/ /sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni/ 'bras
401b4(mdo sde): bu thob nas 'dod chags dang bral te zag pa zad par gyur to/ /sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las sems bskyed nas sangs rgyas
401b5(mdo sde): nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
401b6(mdo sde): stsal pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba nas 'chang bar bgyid pa'i bar gyi gang zag de dag
401b7(mdo sde): kyang rig pas yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
402a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag thugs brtse bas dri ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
402a2(mdo sde): 'dir gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad kyis sems can rnams shin tu tshim par bgyis te bud med kyi gzugs
402a3(mdo sde): kyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / ci nas 'di dag sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du sems
402a4(mdo sde): bskyed ma thag tu ci 'tshal ba dang / gang gi slad du 'tshal ba dang / ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams sprul pa'am/ bsham pa 'byor
402a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas skyes bu dam pa 'di dag skyes bu chen po mthu 'di lta bu bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams la longs spyod
402a6(mdo sde): dang / yongs su spyod pas rim gro bgyid nus par 'di dag la dgongs su gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs rje chen po dang / bsod nams dang /
402a7(mdo sde): ye shes dang / bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa yid la mdzad pas skyes bu dam pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyed kyi bsam pa dang / yid la re ba yongs
402b1(mdo sde): su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig
402b2(mdo sde): 'di dag byin no/ /'di lta ste/ dz+yo to ba ba/ d+h+ri ti ba ba/ mu ni ba ba/ sa t+ya ba ba/ sU n+ya/ a lang+kar ba ba/ d+h+yA na ra sa ba ba/ ma hA kA ru Na ba ba/ ma hA pra ti ba ba/ a mo ha ba ba/ ru ti ba ba/ k+Shi ti ba ba/ sa
402b3(mdo sde): li la ba ba/ kha ga ba ba/ ba yu ba ba/ brta ba ba/ a d+hiSh+ThA na ba ba/ a ma ba ba/ a ha na na ba ba/ ta thA ba ba/ b+hU ta ko Ti ba ba/ ni ra bri ti ba ba/ tri ya la na ba ba/ trai d+hA tu ka ba ba/ tri bi mo k+Sha ba ba/ tri
402b4(mdo sde): shU kla ba ba/ raSh+Ti a d+hiSh+ThA na ba ba/ ba ba ba ba ba ba/ sa ma tra ya na n+ya sa ma tA/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Ta Ta TaSh+Ta/ sid+d+hi sarba ku la sha la mu la/ a d+hiSh+ThA na ya swAhA/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyed kyis chos thams cad
402b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di dag sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / khyed kyi
402b6(mdo sde): byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zungs shig / yang de'i tshe dge sbyong me tog dang / dpal gyi lha mo dang / rtsi'i lha mo grub pa'i blo gros dang / lha mo sa 'dzin la sogs te/ byang chub
402b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' khri thams cad bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas de dag thams cad mgrin
403a1(mdo sde): gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags
403a2(mdo sde): kyi tshig 'di dag gsungs pas na/ byin gyi rlabs 'dis bdag cag sems can thams cad la rim gro bgyid nus so/ /bdag cag bla na med pa'i ye shes de sgrub par nus so/ /bdag cag
403a3(mdo sde): gis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bgyi zhing brtson pa drag pos spro bar bgyi'o/ /yang sems can thams cad la
403a4(mdo sde): snying brtse ba'i slad du da de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar rang gi dam bcas pa la gnas par bgyi'o/ /lha'am klu nas mi'i bar gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis
403a5(mdo sde): brlabs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ma mchis par bgyid dam/ zhig par bgyid dam/ rnam par ma rungs par bgyid la/ bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par
403a6(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du gal te de ma bzlog gam/ nan tan ma bgyis na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus par gyur cig /bdag
403a7(mdo sde): cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig / kye grogs po dag /lha nas mi'i bar gang la la zhig dge slong ngam/ dge slong
403b1(mdo sde): ma'am| dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la 'tshe la/ gal te bdag cag gis de dag la bzlog gam/ bdag cag gis de dag gi 'khrug ba zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan ma bgyis na/
403b2(mdo sde): bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig /bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
403b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig zhugs dang / chab dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / byad
403b4(mdo sde): dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pas 'jigs pa nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram
403b5(mdo sde): ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / nad dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'tshe ba gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis 'jigs shing skrag par
403b6(mdo sde): gyur pa las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran na/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib
403b7(mdo sde): pa ni| ma gtogs te/ bdag cag gis de dag gnod pa rnams las yongs su thar par ma bgyis na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag cag gis bslus par gyur
404a1(mdo sde): cig / bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /de'i tshe gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
404a2(mdo sde): gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de dag la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyed kyis legs par dam bcas pa legs so/ /
404a3(mdo sde): legs so/ /khyed kyis skyes bu dam pa'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdud sdig to can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /thub pa
404a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'di dag la ni dad cing dga' ba'i mchog bskyed de/ /de ring gzhan gyi don phyir dga' bar myur du byang chub sems gzhol byos/ /sdig can khyod ni rang gi yul nas rab
404a5(mdo sde): tu grogs med mthu med kyi/ /thub pa la ni khyod kyis bsdo zhing snyog par byed pa gtang bar byos/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi tshig gis byang chub dri med dad pa'i
404a6(mdo sde): sems gcig bdag mi bskyed/ /thub pa ma gsung bzhugs shig bdag la rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyang mchis/ /de dag lhan cig bdag gi yul na dpung dang bzhon par gnas par
404a7(mdo sde): bgyi| |phun sum mchog 'dzin bdag mthus ji srid 'tsho ba khyod kyi dbang mi mchi/ /'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ snying brtse ba'i le'u ste dgu ba'o// //
404b1(mdo sde): bam po brgyad pa ste tha ma/ yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+dA ra ba'i dri mos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i de bzhin
404b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas byon te nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ni/ legs par byin
404b3(mdo sde): gyis brlabs/ bdud bye ba ni/ pham par mdzad/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i spyan gyis sems can rnams la ni/ gzigs/ sdig pa'i lta ba las ni/ rab tu thar par mdzad/
404b4(mdo sde): shes rab kyi sgron ma ni/ 'bar bar mdzad/ zhi ba'i lam la ni/ bkod de/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
404b5(mdo sde): tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ bshad/ nag po'i phyogs ni/ pham par mdzad/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni/ btsugs pa de bzhin du/ da ltar phyogs
404b6(mdo sde): b cu dag na bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sems can la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs
404b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing du 'du ba chen po mdzad de/ chos kyi tshul 'di legs par byin gyis brlabs pa nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa'i bar du mdzad na/ shAkya thub pa khyod ni/ nyi ma nub nas sangs
405a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir su zhig mchog tu 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar bgyid par 'gyur/ sems can rnams
405a2(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur/ 'dus pa chen po 'dir yang bgrang bar chud par 'gyur/ bdag gis su'i lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par bgyi/ de nas bcom
405a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+dA ra ba'i dri mos la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems
405a4(mdo sde): dpa' bzod pa thob la rnams sam/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba'am/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
405a5(mdo sde): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/ gang su'ang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang / gang dag dbus kyi gling bzhi po 'di dag na gnas pa/ chos kyi
405a6(mdo sde): tshul 'di la mngon par dad pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba gnas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar de dag gi lag tu gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
405a7(mdo sde): yongs su gtad par mdzod cig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+dA ra ba'i dri mos kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa thogs pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha'
405b1(mdo sde): dag khyab par mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po dag /gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa thams cad nyon cig /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
405b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni/ shin tu dkon no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'dus pa 'di shin tu
405b3(mdo sde): dkon te/ khyod la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul byin gyis brlab pa dang / bla na med pa'i lam la dgod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas
405b4(mdo sde): 'di dag thams cad 'dus te dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin
405b5(mdo sde): p ar bya ba nas 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i bar gyi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sa'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs
405b6(mdo sde): so| |chu'i khams thams cad dang / me'i khams thams cad dang / rlung gi khams thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom
405b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
406a1(mdo sde): skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang /
406a2(mdo sde): gang dag gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i sems can rnams dang / gang dag yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa de dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces
406a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /kye grogs po dag /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul 'di byin gyis brlabs te khyod kyi lag tu shin tu gtad kyi/ ci nas 'dir
406a4(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos 'di myur du mi 'jig pa dang / nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yid la gyis shig /'bar bar gyis shig /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
406a5(mdo sde): mo dad pa gang dag 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas yi ger bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa dang / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
406a6(mdo sde): bsnyen ma'am/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag thams cad yongs su bsrung zhing bskyang ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyi/ chos smra ba dang / chos la dga'
406a7(mdo sde): ba dang / bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis bsrung par bya ba nas yongs su bskyang ba'i bar du gyis
406b1(mdo sde): shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can
406b2(mdo sde): snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang / mi nub par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag kun tu bsrung ba nas sems can
406b3(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad do/ /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcur sangs
406b4(mdo sde): r gyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig gis 'dus te sems can la phan pa'i phyir gzungs
406b5(mdo sde): kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang 'chad par gyur/ chos kyi tshul 'di'ang byin gyis brlab par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir brgya byin dang /
406b6(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ded kyis kyang da ltar kun tu bsrung ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi
406b7(mdo sde): zhing 'di na gnas pa rnams dang / gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
407a1(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi lag tu 'di shin tu gtad kyi/ ci nas myur du mi 'jig cing nub par mi 'gyur ba de
407a2(mdo sde): ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yid la gyis shig / rab tu 'bar bar gyis shig /srung bar gyis shig /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag dang / dam pa'i chos
407a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams gang 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas glegs bam la bris te
407a4(mdo sde): 'chang bar byed pa'i bar dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de dag la khyed kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ /
407a5(mdo sde): ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs
407a6(mdo sde): sam| ri brag gam/ pho brang 'khor dang / dgon pa'i gnas nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod de 'chad dam/ lung 'bog gam/ kun chub par
407a7(mdo sde): byed dam/ tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na/ chos kyi bcud des sa'i bcud dang / sems can gyi mdangs 'phel bar 'gyur te/ khyed des mdangs dang ldan zhing / gzi brjid
407b1(mdo sde): dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi g.yog 'khor dang / gzhal med khang yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang srung bar
407b2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de dag gis rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi yul 'khor thams cad kyang srung bar 'gyur ro/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi rgyal po rnams kyang mngon par chos kyi
407b3(mdo sde): bcud des tshim nas gcig la gcig phan pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa la'ang mngon par yid ches par 'gyur/ dge ba'i sems su 'gyur/
407b4(mdo sde): ser sna med pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems nas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /so so bdag gi yul la'ang
407b5(mdo sde): mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /dzam+bu'i gling 'di'ang skye bo rigs pas gang bar 'gyur/ shin tu lo legs pa dang / shin tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ mi'i skye bo mang pos gang zhing
407b6(mdo sde): sa'ang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'bras bu shin tu mdog bzang ba dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / lo ma'i sman dang / lo tog ge sman dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams shin tu 'byor pa dang /
407b7(mdo sde): nad med pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dug dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang /
408a1(mdo sde): phye ma leb dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po ma rungs pa dang / ri dwags dang / bya dang / spyang ki dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char
408a2(mdo sde): rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ skar ma dang / nyin mo dang / mtshan mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / lo dang / dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar 'gyur/ sems
408a3(mdo sde): can rnams kyang phal cher dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur/ 'di nas shin 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ de
408a4(mdo sde): dag kyang khyed kyi g.yog tu 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan mang zhing phan yon che ste/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar
408a5(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen pos byin gyis brlabs te/ grags pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bud med kyi dngos po skyes nas myong bar
408a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na tshe 'di la bud med kyi dngos po myong bar 'gyur bar 'phangs pa thams
408a7(mdo sde): cad byang bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ma gtogs par gang gzhan lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi
408b1(mdo sde): 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i gnas ngan len de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na'ang 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas
408b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus de'i las dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ri rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
408b3(mdo sde): la dmigs pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi
408b4(mdo sde): legs par spyod pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur/ lta ba ngan pa thams cad spong ba dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar gcod pa dang / zhi zhing phra ba'i las thams cad la 'jug
408b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /yul gang du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'dus pa chen po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
408b6(mdo sde): 'di'i mthus sa phyogs de shin tu snum par 'gyur/ 'bras bu mdangs dang ldan pa dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / ro dang ldan par 'gyur/ kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / rtsub pa dang / ro med pa
408b7(mdo sde): spong bar 'gyur/ me tog dang / 'bras bu shin tu 'byor pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / bang ba dang / mdzod dang / rdza phru dang / bya skyogs rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ gos
409a1(mdo sde): dang / zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams shin tu mchog tu 'gyur te/ de na sems can gang dag zas dang / skom gyis 'tsho ba de dag ni/
409a2(mdo sde): shin tu nad med pa dang / nor dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang / ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / dge ba tshol ba la mngon par brtson
409a3(mdo sde): pa dang / sdig pa'i lta ba yongs su spong bar 'gyur te/ de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyed dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag khyed g.yog 'phel nas stobs dang
409a4(mdo sde): ldan zhing thogs pa med pa'i tshogs su 'gyur gyi/ chos kyi stobs kyis rigs bzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs yongs su bskyang bar gyis shig /sems can rnams chos kyi don la tshud
409a5(mdo sde): cig / de ltar na khyod kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+dA
409a6(mdo sde): ra ba'i dri mos kyis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung ba dang / bshad pa dang / bsrung ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag
409a7(mdo sde): pas don dang / tshig brjod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di kun bkang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / brgya byin gyi dbang po
409b1(mdo sde): nas tshangs pa'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa phal cher gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan
409b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi bkas spro ba mdzad do/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa gang dag bzod pa thob pa bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun sangs rgyas
409b3(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa 'di dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa thams
409b4(mdo sde): cad la mchod pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rigs pas ston par bkur zhing gus pa chen pos gzung bar bgyi'o/ /snying rjes sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba nas bla na med
409b5(mdo sde): pa'i lam gyi bar la dgod pa'i slad du bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dang / dgon
409b6(mdo sde): pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bstan par bgyi'o/ /dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas bar bgyi ba'i slad du sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyi'o/ /yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas
409b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa dag /legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis de bzhin du
410a1(mdo sde): gyis shig / de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar thams cad dang / gang dag gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa/

410a3(mdo sde): chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba nas rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i bar du bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bstan par
410a4(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o/ /chos 'tshal ba dang / chos nyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /gang du chos kyi
410a5(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang /

410b5(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
410b6(mdo sde): dang / lha'i dbang po nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar dang / gang dag yang sems can gzi brjid che ba/ gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'dus te

411a7(mdo sde): pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ston par 'du shes pas gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dang gyis bsti stang du bgyi/ bla mar
411b1(mdo sde): bgyi| ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa'i tshe chos kyi
411b2(mdo sde): bcud kyis bdag cag mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ stobs dang ldan/ brtson 'grus dang ldan/ mthu dang ldan/ dran pa dang ldan/ ye shes dang ldan/ phyogs dang g.yog tu ldan zhing / chos

411b4(mdo sde): dmag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / char dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / rtsub pa dang / brlang

412a1(mdo sde): dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka'ang shin tu gtams par bgyi'o/ /gang du sems can rnams chu'i glang gis gnod par gyur pa'ang bdag cag gis bsal bar bgyi'o//
412a2(mdo sde): grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs de dag tu'ang sems can la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag gis 'dab ma dang / yal ga dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang /
412a3(mdo sde): sdong bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dang / lo tog rnams shin tu snum pa dang / 'dab ma dang / kha dog dang / ro che zhing mang bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /sems can rnams la nor
412a4(mdo sde): dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / gos dang / lhab lhub kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /sems can de dag kyang dge ba tshol ba'i sems dang / sdig pa yongs su spong ba dang /
412a5(mdo sde): dpal dang / bsod nams 'byung ba tshe ring por bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor gang dag tu sangs

412a7(mdo sde): stang bgyid cing 'chang ba de dag tu rgyal po rgyal rigs spyin bo nas dbang bskur ba 'byung ba de dag kyang bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ de dag la
412b1(mdo sde): gnod pa bsal bar bgyi/ phan pa bsgrub par bgyi/ ltad mo dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / byed pa ngan pa dang / byin rlabs ngan pa dang / smon lam ngan pa dang / skyabs
412b2(mdo sde): ngan pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phrag dog dang / khro ba dang / ser sna thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /yang dag pa'i lta ba'i
412b3(mdo sde): lam drang po dang / dad pa dang / dul ba dang / kun sdom pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gzud par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor
412b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / blon po dang / rtsis pa chen po dang / grong rdal pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams dang / rigs bzhi rnams dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu
412b5(mdo sde): mo rnams kyang bsrung zhing bskyang bar bgyi ba nas ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i bar la gzud par bgyi'o/ /tha na yul de dag tu rkang bzhi pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /gang na
412b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba nas glegs bam la bris te bzhag pa'i bar du bgyid na/ sems can de dag la bdag cag gis de 'dra ba'i nan tan chen po dang / rtul ba
412b7(mdo sde): chen pos yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /chos kyi tshul yang dag par bstan pa'i slad du bskal pa mtha' yas par nan tan cher bgyi'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de

413a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / yul 'khor srung dang / lus ngan po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang

413a7(mdo sde): zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bdud kyi phyogs ni/ pham par byas/ dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni/ bsgrengs/ sems can tshad med pa dag ni/ sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su thar

419a1(mdo sde): thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye

419a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can thams cad rnam par gcod pa/ yon tan bkod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i ston pa 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs
419a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing rab tu nyon mongs pa can/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di lta bur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can
419a5(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ ngan par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams
419a6(mdo sde): kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / ngan song gsum las shin tu bzla ba dang / theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs
419a7(mdo sde): dang / bzod pa la dgod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i slad du zhugs kyi/ de la khyed kyis kyang
419b1(mdo sde): ci nas ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'di'ang rnam par mi 'jig pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ma gtogs par da ltar dang /
419b2(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la sems can 'ga' yang 'tshe ba'am/ rnam par
419b3(mdo sde): 'jig pa'am/ nub par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pa dang / chos la nan tan bgyid pa dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa'i dge slong ngam/

419b5(mdo sde): la dga' ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa/ khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can thams cad
419b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par bgyid par gyur pa/ de dag la'ang bdud dam/ bdud kyi bu mo'am/ bdud kyi 'khor ram/ bdud kyi 'khor mo'am/ bdud kyi pho nyas gtse ba'i
419b7(mdo sde): bsam pas glags lta ba'am/ skabs tshol du mchi zhing g.yeng ba dang / dge ba'i bar chad kyi las bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig /da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
420a1(mdo sde): thams cad la gsol lo/ /bdag la las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang /

420b5(mdo sde): lci ba dang / rdul ba dang / lus rul ba dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / las su mi rung ba dang / ldang mi nus par 'gyur/ bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong ba nas de'i yan lag thams
420b6(mdo sde): cad 'khums pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing / slar brkyang mi nus pa dang / de'i phyogs thams cad mun par gyur nas nyi ma snang ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba dang / de'i rdzu 'phrul bri nas

422b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snyam nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas de la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye skyes bu dam pa/ don gyi dbang gang mthong

425b7(mdo sde): 'khrug pa dag zhi bar byed de/ de na mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / ri dwags dang / bya la sogs pa lus dkar po'i mtha' la mngon par brtson pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad
426a1(mdo sde): spangs pa/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa dang / dge ba dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par
426a2(mdo sde): dga' ba la mngon par dga' ba dang / lus dang / sems mi ngal bar byang chub kyi lam tshol ba la brtson par byed do/ /yang 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ rigs kyi bu/ ci ste
426a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi las kyi dngos grub 'di stsal zhing / byin gyis rlob par mdzad de/ rjes su yi rang bar mdzad nas bdag gis 'khrug
426a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad dad par bgyid pa/ mi dge ba'i phyogs thams cad zlog par bgyid pa/ dge ba'i phyogs thams cad 'phel
426a5(mdo sde): bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bgyi ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdag gi
426a6(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa'i
426a7(mdo sde): yi ge dang sgras gang par bgyis la/ de bzhin du ci nas kyang 'dir lhags pa'i 'khor rnams dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa'i don tshig dang yi ges tshim par
426b1(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ /rigs kyi bu/ nag
426b2(mdo sde): po'i phyogs ni/ skrag par bya ba dang / dkar po'i phyogs 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis khyod kyi rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bya ba'i 'byung
426b3(mdo sde): po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs 'di'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlabs kyi/ skyes bu dam pa khyod spro bar gyis la 'khrug pa thams
426b4(mdo sde): cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bya ba'i gsang sngags
426b5(mdo sde): kyi tshig de dag smros shig / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas stan las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
426b6(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis go bar byed pa/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/ /'di lta ste/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+hU ma d+hU ma/ ni li na na la/ no la
426b7(mdo sde): nI la| ku Ta ni/ ma hA ku Ta ni/ Ta Ta Ta To/ ma hA ta Ta/ a bA sa/ a b+hi/ a b+hi/ ri Ni ri Ni/ ma hA ri Ni ri Ni/ ri mi ri mi ri mi/ da ri mi/ r-i Shi ma hA ri Shi/ shu lu shu lu/ ma hA shu
427a1(mdo sde): lu shu lu| shu lu d+hu/ ma hA shu lu shu lu/ u gu ma/ ku ma gu ma na/ ri mi ri mi/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ ni
427a2(mdo sde): mi ni mi| hi ni hi ni/ mu ni mu ni/ bud+d+hi li/ pra ba ra sriSh+Ta/ lo kA tsaR+ya/ dzi ni dzi ni/ dzi na ri Sha b+he/ dzi na dzi na dzi na ri Sha b+ha swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong
427a3(mdo sde): rdal lam/ ljongs nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang gang na 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bgyi ba/ gsang sngags kyi tshig rig pa chen
427a4(mdo sde): mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas lus srul po ma rungs pa'i bar du gang dag sems ma dad pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis bslab pa'i sdom
427a5(mdo sde): pa yongs su mi len pa dang / sems can de dag la byams pa'i sems nye bar mi gzhog pa de dag gi don du bdag gis yang shin tu mi bzad pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di
427a6(mdo sde): dag bshad do/ /'di lta ste/ ad tse/ ad tse/ mu ne/ mu ne/ a ga ne/ hu hu/ mu ne mu ne/ ma hA r-i Shi b+ha/ hu hu/ a gra daN+De/ a ta a ta/ a b+hi b+hu ta/ hi ni hi ni/ hi ri hi ri/
427a7(mdo sde): ti ri hi ri/ hi ri hi ri hi ri/ dri gu ma/ gu ma gu ma gu ma hi/ hi li/ ni li ni li/ ma hA ni li/ sa mu dra/ me kha/ ha Ta ha Ta ha Ta/ d+ha ra Na me/ d+ha ra Na me/ kha k+Sha pa/ kha k+Sha ba/
427b1(mdo sde): pr-i thi bi/ a ba te dzo ba ra yu a k+Sha sha /tha tha tha/ gu ma b+he b+ha/ gu ma b+he/ a ga shi gu ma b+he/ dzi dwa gu ma b+he/ sa rba da ga gu ma b+he/ rA dzA gu ma b+he/ sa ma ta gu ma b+he swAhA/ gnod sbyin gyi sde
427b2(mdo sde): dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po thams cad 'khrugs te skrag nas
427b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa thams cad 'dar ro/ /de nas skad cig de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te lan
427b4(mdo sde): gsum du 'di skad ces sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas
427b5(mdo sde): gyis shin tu mi bzad pa 'byung po thams cad kyi snying la gnon pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smras so/ /zhes brjod do/ /'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ 'brog
427b6(mdo sde): gnas kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / //de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bzhengs pa'i brda dang / rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i brda
427b7(mdo sde): bstan to/ /de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu 'dar/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yang
428a1(mdo sde): g.yos| nam mkha' las kyang me tog gi char bab/ bar snang las kyang sil snyan bye ba'i sgra byung / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyang shin tu byung /
428a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par byas nas 'khor thams cad thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan gyi dri chen po la mi mjed kyi bdag
428a3(mdo sde): po tshangs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
428a4(mdo sde): gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / bris nas 'chad par bgyid pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam dang ldan par
428a5(mdo sde): 'gyur| sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos du zhig gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de
428a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan gyi dri chen pos mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa/ ci nas bdud kyi phyogs tshar gcad pa dang / 'thab pa'i
428a7(mdo sde): rnyog pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs
428b1(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi khams drug byin gyis brlabs so/ /de bzhin du gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag sangs
428b2(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos bcus byin gyis brlab bo/ /bcu gang zhe na/ tshangs pa/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
428b3(mdo sde): kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / grul bum de dag la khyod kyis
428b4(mdo sde): sems can de dag rtag tu srungs shig / gnod pa las zlog cig /lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las dge ba la tshud cig /zas dang / skom dang / longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa
428b5(mdo sde): mang po dang / nad med pa la mkhas pas bdag gi srog dang yang bsngos la/ sems can de dag bzung bar gyis shig /ces rig pas gtad nas de dag gi dran pa dang / blo gros
428b6(mdo sde): dang | rtogs pa dang / spobs pa la mkhas pas skyon med par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi yid kyi brnag pa 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas gnas par mi 'gyur te/ de dag stong pa
428b7(mdo sde): nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag sems dang mtshungs shing zab mo bzod pa dang ldan pa la bsdu ba'i dngos po la'ang brtson par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i chos la gnas nas sems
429a1(mdo sde): can gyi 'khor gyi lus la snying po blangs te dngos po gsum yongs su dag pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i rgyal
429a2(mdo sde): mtshan yang thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i shes pa la'ang mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'ang sems can de dag gi
429a3(mdo sde): mdun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
429a4(mdo sde): ston cing bzhugs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las don dang / tshig dang / yi ger ldan pa'i chos
429a5(mdo sde): bshad pa de lta bu'ang thos par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i bar du thob nas las kyi sgrib pa mi dge
429a6(mdo sde): ba de dag thams cad rnam par shes pa tha ma la chos dang ldan pas mgo mnyam du 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par brdzus te skye
429a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'tsho zhing gzhes la bzhugs te theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig 'chad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
429b1(mdo sde): sems can de dag theg pa chen po la gnas shing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can de dag dang 'grogs par 'gyur te/ ring po mi
429b2(mdo sde): thogs par yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par phyin chad nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
429b3(mdo sde): rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa/ da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam
429b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar byed cing / gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag thams cad sangs
429b5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bcu po de dag gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis
429b6(mdo sde): brlabs pa ste/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
429b7(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye grogs po dag /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag phyogs bcu nas 'dir
430a1(mdo sde): byon pa de dag thams cad kyis khyed la thugs brtse ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam par sbyang pa dang / sems can thams cad
430a2(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa rab tu bstan pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs pham par bya ba dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus
430a3(mdo sde): par bstan pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / ma
430a4(mdo sde): rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang / lta ba ngan pa thams cad spang ba dang / byang chub kyi lam la gzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
430a5(mdo sde): pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung ba sngon ma thos pa gzungs kyi tshig zab mo
430a6(mdo sde): rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di bshad de/ de ma chags pa med pa'i gzungs la spobs pa dang / ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la gzud pa
430a7(mdo sde): dang / tshul gcig pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul srung ba nas gling bzhi srung ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / mi dang
430b1(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa srung ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams srung ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa'i bar dag srung bar 'gyur ro/ /
430b2(mdo sde): grogs po dag /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dngos po re re'ang snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun

430b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing ma lus pa yongs su spyod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa/ bla ma'i gnas ston par kun gyis bkur ba/ phyag
430b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i gnas su gyur pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dag kyang las kyi sgrib pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de dag ma lus par yongs
430b6(mdo sde): su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa spangs nas dge ba'i chos rnams la gnas par 'gyur te/ grogs po dang / de lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
430b7(mdo sde): kyi skyes bu'i mthu chen po'o/ /grogs po dag /khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bsti stang du byas te dam pa'i chos 'di gzung bar bya/ bsrung bar bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang
431a1(mdo sde): zag khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / chos la nan tan byed pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bya'o/ /de ltar na khyed la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de
431a2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyis de'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan dang / phan yon rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces
431a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /gang gis zhing kun gser gyis rab tu bkang nas ni/ /skyob pa mgon po dag la mchod pa phul ba bas/ /gang zhig dam pa mchog gi mdo 'di 'dzin byed na/ /
431a4(mdo sde): 'jigs med des ni bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs kyi dpal gyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /brgya tshang pa yi gser rnams
431a5(mdo sde): las| |gang+gA'i rlung gi bye ma snyed/ /khyu mchog thub la phul bas ni/ /mdo 'di'i bsod nams mtshungs mi thob/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo brtsegs kyis kyang 'di skad
431a6(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ /me tog tshogs kyi gdugs mchog sprin rnams kyis ni nam mkha' khebs byas te/ /gang gis mchod phyir dga' mgu'i yid kyis sangs rgyas rnams la
431a7(mdo sde): phul ba bas/ /gang zhig phyin chad zad 'gyur 'jigs ldan dus na mdo 'di 'dzin byed na/ /de yi bsod nams tshad dag sems can kun gyis brjod par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom
431b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /thub pa'i spyan sngar mar me'i snying po dri zhim til gyis byugs pa ri rab tsam/ /mar me bus pa
431b2(mdo sde): 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gus par bskal pa bye bar bzung ba bas/ /gang gzhan la las bsod nams 'dod pa bsgribs pa srab par smon pa de dag gis/ /zad pa'i dus tshe 'khor
431b3(mdo sde): du mdo sde'i gtam byas pa ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros 'chang ba gang gis
431b4(mdo sde): bzod pa sgom zhing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom/ /rtag tu bsam gtan gzhol zhing mnyam bzhag lus kyis shes rab spel ba bas/ /zad pa'i dus ngan tshen gang zhig dam chos phyag rgya
431b5(mdo sde): 'di 'dzin pa/ /de yi bzod dang brtson 'grus 'di ni mtshungs med shes rab gzhal du med/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin rdul dang bral ba'i stobs kyis rnam par gnon
431b6(mdo sde): pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang gis mdo 'di bshad nas bzung dang mngon par bris pa dang / /gzhan dag 'dzin bcug gus par rtag tu klog pa dang / /bdug pa me
431b7(mdo sde): tog phreng ba gos mchog rnams kyis mchod/ /bsod nams gang thob de ni brjod par mi nus so/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa de dag gis mdo sde
432a1(mdo sde): 'di'i bsngags pa dang / yon tan dang / phan yon dpag tu med par brjod nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la bos te 'di
432a2(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye grogs po dag/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ phyi ma'i dus na gang thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams kyi
432a3(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad
432a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'dus pa
432a5(mdo sde): chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen
432a6(mdo sde): po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/
432a7(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya badzra maN+Da nA ma d+hA ra Ni ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
432b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gangs kyi ri dang nye ba sna tshogs kyi grong gi rtswa'i spyil po na dge slong stong du
432b2(mdo sde): tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms kyi zan phyis len pa spangs te rtswa'i spyil por skyil mo krung bcas nas
432b3(mdo sde): sku drang por bsrang ste dran pa mngon du bzhag nas bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
432b4(mdo sde): par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das da ltar ga la bzhugs pa'i sku ma mthong ngo / /de nas
432b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //
432b6(mdo sde): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs snyam du sems pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rtswa'i spyil
432b7(mdo sde): po'i nang na ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de dag gis mthong ngo / /mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cang mi smra bar skyil mo krung
433a1(mdo sde): bcas te 'khod do/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang cang mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga de nyid du skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de
433a2(mdo sde): nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad de/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ stong gsum
433a3(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas ring
433a4(mdo sde): du lon pa'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'am/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'ang rung ste/ ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang / rtswa'i spyil po ga la ba der dong
433a5(mdo sde): ste phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi gang tsam gyi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems can thams cad kyi
433a6(mdo sde): sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor de
433a7(mdo sde): dag thams cad sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems mgu ba dang / sems rangs pa dang / sems shin tu tshim pa skyes so/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas chos
433b1(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor de dag thams cad
433b2(mdo sde): kyi dbang po rnams rab tu zhi bar gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba
433b3(mdo sde): dang | rtswa'i spyil bo ga la ba der song ste phyin ma thag tu bdag nyid steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la 'dug pa snyam du shes te/ de steng gi nam mkha' de nyid la skyil krung bcas te 'dug go/
433b4(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog ting nge 'dzin de la
433b5(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas bar snang thams cad me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos kun tu khebs nas nyi ma dang / zla ba rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang
433b6(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu steng gi nam mkha' las sna tshogs
433b7(mdo sde): kyi grong khyer ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa la 'dug ma nus nas de byang chub sems
434a1(mdo sde): dpa' lhag ma de dag dang lhan cig tu steng gi bar snang nam mkha' la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go / 'dug ma thag tu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
434a2(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
434a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur
434a4(mdo sde): to| |de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/
434a5(mdo sde): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo / /de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas steng
434a6(mdo sde): g i bar snang la gos phrag pa gcig tu bogs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga bar snang de nyid la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
434a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni/ gang lags/ rkyen ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
434b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ bar snang 'dir sangs rgyas khri rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs zhes bya ba bshad de/ yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /'jam
434b2(mdo sde): dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams la rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
434b3(mdo sde): dpal| chog go / rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la byang chub kyang med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
434b4(mdo sde): bar 'dod do/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la 'khor ba'ang med/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang med na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod do/ /rdo rje'i
434b5(mdo sde): snying po'i gzungs la dge ba'ang med/ mi dge ba'ang med na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/ mi dge ba spong bar 'dod do/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la pha rol yang med/ tshu
434b6(mdo sde): rol yang med na/ 'di dag ni/ pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod do/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la zhing yang med/ zhing yongs su grub pa'ang med na/ 'di dag ni/ zhing yongs su sgrub par
