439b6(mdo sde): med| dpag tu med/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir bgrang ba las 'das pa ste/ de ni/ dri za lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ lha ma yin gyi sgo ste/
439b7(mdo sde): 'di ni| gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ med pa'i sgo ste/ ming du rig par
440a1(mdo sde): bya ba ma yin/ gzugs su rig par bya ba ma yin/ sgrar rig par bya ba ma yin/ drir rig par bya ba ma yin/ ror rig par bya ba ma yin/ reg par rig par bya ba ma
440a2(mdo sde): yin| yid du rig par bya ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas su rig par bya ba ma yin/ chos su rig par bya ba ma yin/ dge 'dun du rig par bya ba ma yin/ nyan thos su rig par bya ba ma yin/
440a3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas su rig par bya ba ma yin/ so so skye bor rig par bya ba ma yin zhing / 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ shin tu kun nas ma skyes pa'i tshul gyis rig par bya ba ma
440a4(mdo sde): yin pa ste/ de ni/ lha ma yin lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ nam mkha' lding gi sgo ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
440a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa ste/ mi rgyug pa/ rnam par mi rgyug pa/
440a6(mdo sde): mi 'bros pa/ mi 'gro ba/ mi 'ong pa/ mi 'pho ba/ mi skye ba/ mi rten pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi chags pa/ mi 'ching ba/ zhe mi sdang ba/ gti mi mug pa/ mi 'grol pa/ mi gnas pa/
440a7(mdo sde): rab tu mi gnas pa ste/ 'jam dpal/ nam mkha' la chags pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ gnas pa med pa'i sgo ste/ de ni/ nam mkha' lding lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs
440b1(mdo sde): kyi gzhi'o/ /'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ mi'am ci'i sgo ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/ bka' stsal
440b2(mdo sde): pa| 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ byed pa po las log pa ste/ mi byas pa/ mi 'gyur ba/ byed pa po kun tu bsal na mi rnyed pa ste/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ mi 'am ci lta bu'i skor
440b3(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /'jam dpal/ chos thams cad lto 'phye chen po'i sgo ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ de gzungs kyi gzhi
440b4(mdo sde): lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ dri ma dang bral zhing shin tu 'od gsal ba ste/ sems can thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can du bya ba'am/
440b5(mdo sde): rnam par byang bar byar mi nus pa de ni/ rnam par dag pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir gtan du yongs
440b6(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ de ni/ lto 'phye chen po lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ bud med kyi sgo ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /gsol pa/
440b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni/ dngos po med pa'i phyir mi dren pa/ skyes pa'i dbang po dang /
441a1(mdo sde): bud med kyi dbang po dang bral ba ste/ de ni/ bud med lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ skyes pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi
441a2(mdo sde): gzhi'o| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ de gzungs kyi gzhi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ rnam pa thams cad du skyes pa nyid ni/ mi dmigs te/ thog ma'i
441a3(mdo sde): mthar yang mi dmigs/ tha ma'i mthar yang mi dmigs/ da ltar byung bar yang mi dmigs so/ /'jam dpal/ gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de la skyes pa'ang med/ bud
441a4(mdo sde): med kyang med de/ gzhan du na ming gi brdas brjod par zad do/ /ming de'ang bden pa ste/ gzungs kyi brdas de dag btags so/ /gzungs de'ang 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa ste/
441a5(mdo sde): 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams kyi skye ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ de ni/ skyes pa lta bur
441a6(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /'jam dpal/ chos thams cad ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgo ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi gzhi'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ de
441a7(mdo sde): gzungs kyi gzhi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ sems can dmyal ba gang du yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom
441b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ sems can dmyal ba ni/ nam mkhar yang dag par 'du ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can dmyal ba rang
441b2(mdo sde): gi rtog pa las byung ngam/ 'on te ngo bo nyid las byung / 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byis pa so so skye bo rang gi rtog pas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang /
441b3(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du rig ste/ de dag ma mchis pa la sgro btags pa'i slad du ngan song gsum du gnod pa tshor zhing sdug bsngal myong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis
441b4(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba ji ltar mi mthong ba de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba pa rnams mi mthong ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
441b5(mdo sde): lta ste| dper bgyi na/ mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na bdag sems can dmyal bar ltung ba snyam du rig nas de de na lcags kyi bum pa rab tu khol ba/ shin tu 'bar
441b6(mdo sde): pa 'ong ma du ma mchis pa'i nang na bdag bcug nas de de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar rab tu 'tshal te/ de yid dngangs shing yongs su gdung bar rig nas 'jigs skrag ste
441b7(mdo sde): dngangs nas de slar sad pa dang / kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/ /kye ma sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes cho nges 'debs na/ de'i mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / phu nu rnams kyis khyod cis sdug
442a1(mdo sde): bsngal zhes dris pa dang / mi des de dag la 'di skad ces bdag ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ngo / /zhes smras nas yang de mdza' bshes
442a2(mdo sde): dang / nye du dang / phu nu rnams la gshe zhing 'tshig ste/ bdag ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong na/ khyod kyis slar phyi phyir zhing nga la cis sdug bsngal zhes drir ci
442a3(mdo sde): yod ces mchi la/ de nas mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / phu nu de dag gis mi de la 'di skad ces kye ma ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /mi khyod ni/ gnyid kyis log ste khyim
442a4(mdo sde): 'di nas gar yang ma song ngo / /zhes bgyis pa dang / mi des slar dran pa rnyed nas bdag ni/ gnyid kyis log ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa dngos po med pa de la bdag gis brtags
442a5(mdo sde): pa lta zhig ste/ dngos po ci'ang med do/ /snyam bgyid nas de ltar yang yid bde ba rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar mi de gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na ma mchis pa la sgro btags
442a6(mdo sde): nas bdag sems can dmyal bar mchis so/ /snyam du rig pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ byis pa so so skye bo thams cad mchis pa ma lags pa'i 'dod chags
442a7(mdo sde): kyis kun tu dkris pas bud med kyi mtshan mar rtog go/ de dag gis bud med kyi mtshan mar brtags nas bud med dang bdag lhan cig tu rtse dga' mgur spyod par rig ste/ de
442b1(mdo sde): dag 'di snyam du bdag ni/ skyes ba/ 'di ni/ bud med do/ /'di ni/ bdag gi bud med do snyam nas de sred pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun tu dkrigs pa'i sems gyis de longs spyod tshol
442b2(mdo sde): bar sems btang ngo / /de gzhi de las 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa skyed de/ de'i dbang po rab tu khros pas 'khon byung ngo / /de 'du shes phyin ci log pa des gu ma ma
442b3(mdo sde): thag tu bskal pa stong phrag mang por bdag sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba snyam du 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ mi de la mdza' bshes dang
442b4(mdo sde): nye du dang / phu nu rnams kyis 'di skad ces ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /mi khyod ni/ gnyid kyis log ste/ khyim 'di nas gar yang ma song ngo / /zhes mchi ba ltar/ bcom
442b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyin ci log bzhis rnam par myos pa'i sems can rnams la chos bstan te/ 'di la bud med kyang med/ skyes pa'ang med/ sems
442b6(mdo sde): can yang med/ srog kyang med/ gso ba'ang med/ gang zag kyang med/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ med pa'o/ /chos 'di
442b7(mdo sde): dag thams cad ni/ rnam par bsgrubs pa'o/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ btags pa'o/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ stong pa'o/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ skye ba med pa'o
443a1(mdo sde): chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ 'gag pa med pa'o/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ ma 'brel ba'o/ /chos
443a2(mdo sde): 'di dag thams cad ni/ rmi lam lta bu'o/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ chu zla lta bu ste/ 'di la su'ang mi chags/ mi sdang / mi
443a3(mdo sde): rmongs te/ yang dag pa ma yin pa la ma rtogs shig ces bstan pa dang / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de thos nas chos thams cad la 'dod chags ma mchis par
443a4(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /chos thams cad la zhe sdang ma mchis pa dang / gti mug ma mchis pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang / chags pa ma mchis par mthong ngo / /chos thams cad shin tu
443a5(mdo sde): grol ba dang / gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong nas de dag sems nam mkha' la gnas te 'gum pa'i dus bgyis so/ /'gum pa'i dus bgyis ma thag tu phung
443a6(mdo sde): po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' ba de'ang de dang 'dra ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sems can dmyal ba de ltar mthong
443a7(mdo sde): lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar khyod kyis sems
443b1(mdo sde): can dmyal ba mthong ba de bzhin du blta'o/ /ji ltar khyod rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du mi brtag par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ sems can dmyal ba de ltar mthong na/ mi skye ba'i chos la
443b2(mdo sde): bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba nges par bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas de dag tshig mthun
443b3(mdo sde): par 'di skad ces 'di ltar sems can dmyal ba'i chos rnams las sangs rgyas kyi chos rnyed par rung ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ngo mtshar te/ legs so/ /zhes 'dzer to/ /de
443b4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis su ma mchis pa'i sgo gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams
443b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su rtogs shing gnyis lta bur mi bgyid pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa' rnams las bstan du gsol/ de skad ces/
443b6(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ de'i phyir kun nas nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
443b7(mdo sde): sgo 'di ni/ chos kyi sgo gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par bgro bar byed pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/
444a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis su ma mchis pa'i sgo de ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de'i phyir legs
444a2(mdo sde): par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo 'di ngas khyod la bshad do/ /de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes
444a3(mdo sde): gsol te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ ma rig
444a4(mdo sde): pa ni| byang chub ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ ma rig pa byang chub lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ med pa'i phyir ma
444a5(mdo sde): rig pa zhes bya'o/ /gang med pa de la skye ba med do/ /gang ma skyes pa de la kun nas nyon mongs pa med do/ /'jam dpal/ kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni/ byang chub
444a6(mdo sde): ste| rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rtag tu ma skyes ba'o/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas ma rig pa dang / byang chub gnyis su med
444a7(mdo sde): par ston to/ /'jam dpal/ ngas ma rig pa 'di ma rnyed de/ de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bstan to/ /'jam dpal/ de ni/ ma rig pa lta bur 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo ste/
444b1(mdo sde): 'jug pa gang gis spobs pa myur bar 'gyur ba/ spobs pa rno bar 'gyur ba/ spobs pa zab mor 'gyur ba/ spobs pa ma chags par 'gyur ba/ spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur
444b2(mdo sde): ba'o| |'jam dpal/ 'du byed rnams ni/ byang chub ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ 'du byed rnams byang chub lags/ bka' stsal
444b3(mdo sde): pa| 'jam dpal/ 'du byed rnams ni/ grangs med pa/ bgrang du med pa ste/ de'i phyir de dag gi tshad mi dmigs so/ /mi dge ba dang mtshungs par ldan na/ sems can dmyal bar skye
444b4(mdo sde): ba ston mod kyi/ 'di nas kyang mi 'gro'o/ /der 'pho ba'ang med do/ /'jam dpal/ mi 'pho ba ni/ byang chub ste/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ de ni/ 'du byed lta
444b5(mdo sde): bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /'jam dpal/ rnam par shes pa ni/ byang chub ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ rnam par shes pa
444b6(mdo sde): byang chub lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ rnam par shes pa ni/ sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa las byung bar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/ /'jam dpal/
444b7(mdo sde): ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye po yang dag pa ma yin pa la gnas pa rnams kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam par shes pa brtags shing rnam par bsgrubs nas bsdus pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal/ sangs
445a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byang chub kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ byis pa so so skye bo rnams kyis brtags shing rnam bar bsgrubs nas bsdus te/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs
445a2(mdo sde): shing / bdag cag sangs rgyas su gyur cig /bdag cag sems can grol bar byed par gyur cig/ bdag cag 'jig rten gyi mchog tu gyur cig/ snyam du de dag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nam
445a3(mdo sde): mkha' dang 'dra ba la brtags nas rab tu spyod do/ /'jam dpal/ ngas ni/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas sangs rgyas sam/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ so so skye
445a4(mdo sde): bo'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ rnam par shes pa lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /'jam dpal/ ming dang gzungs ni/ byang chub ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs
445a5(mdo sde): kyi sgo'o| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ ming dang gzugs byang chub lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ ming ni/ dngos po med par sgra brjod pa'o/ /'jam
445a6(mdo sde): dpal| gzugs kyang byed pa po med pa ste/ 'jam dpal/ gang na byed pa po med pa de la bdag med do/ /'jam dpal/ bdag med pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste/ ming gis bstan
445a7(mdo sde): pa'o| |ming de ni/ phyogs bcu kun tu btsal kyang mi rnyed de/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ ming dang gzugs lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /'jam dpal/ skye mched drug ni/ byang
445b1(mdo sde): chub ste| 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na skye mched drug byang chub lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ skye mched thams cad ni/ rang
445b2(mdo sde): gi yul dben pa ste/ mig gi dbang po'ang bdag gis gzugs blta'o/ /snyam du de ltar mi sems so/ /rna ba'i dbang po'ang bdag gis sgra mnyan to snyam du de ltar mi sems so/ /
445b3(mdo sde): sga'i dbang po'ang bdag gis dri la mnam mo snyam du de ltar mi sems so/ /lce'i dbang po'ang bdag gis ro myang ngo snyam du de ltar mi sems so/ /lus kyi dbang po'ang bdag gis reg pa
445b4(mdo sde): tshor ro snyam du de ltar mi sems so/ /yid kyi dbang po'ang bdag gis chos rnam par shes so snyam du de ltar mi sems so/ /mig kyang gzugs yul du mi shes/ gzugs
445b5(mdo sde): kyang mig gi yul du mi shes/ rna ba'ang sgra yul du mi shes/ sgra'ang rna ba'i yul du mi shes/ sna'ang dri yul du mi shes/ dri'ang sna'i yul du mi shes/ lce'ang ro yul du mi shes/
445b6(mdo sde): ro'ang lce'i yul du mi shes/ lus kyang reg bya yul du mi shes/ reg bya'ang lus kyi yul du mi shes/ yid kyang chos yul du mi shes/ chos kyang yid kyi yul du mi shes
445b7(mdo sde): te| 'jam dpal/ skye mched rnams ni/ phan tshun mi mthun pa rnams g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ phan tshun sems pa med pa/ phan tshun ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o//
446a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ni/ byang chub ste/ de ni/ skye mched drug lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /'jam dpal/ reg pa ni/
446a2(mdo sde): byang chub ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ reg pa byang chub lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ reg pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs
446a3(mdo sde): su 'du shes te reg pa dang / sgra ra 'dus te reg pa dang / drir 'dus te reg pa dang / ror 'dus te reg pa dang / reg byar 'dus te reg pa dang / chos su 'dus te reg pa'o/ /'jam
446a4(mdo sde): dpal| gzugs su 'dus te reg pa nas chos su 'dus te reg pa'i bar gang yin pa de ni/ rten pa'o/ /gang rten pa de ni/ rkyen mang po las skye'o/ /'jam dpal/ rkyen mang po
446a5(mdo sde): las skye ba de ni/ tshogs kyi tshul du gnas pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ tshogs kyi tshul gang yin pa de ni/ sgyu ma'i tshul lo/ /sgyu ma'i tshul gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
446a6(mdo sde): tshul lo| |yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshul gang yin pa de ni/ med pa'o/ med pa gang yin pa de ni/ mi skye ba'o/ /mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ mi 'gag pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ gang skye
446a7(mdo sde): ba med cing 'gag pa med pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste/ de ni/ reg pa lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /'jam dpal/ tshor ba ni/ byang chub ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi
446b1(mdo sde): sgo'o| |gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na tshor ba byang chub lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ tshor ba zhes bya ba ni/ rnam pa gsum ste/ bde ba'i tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal
446b2(mdo sde): gyi tshor ba dang / bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'o/ /'jam dpal/ bde ba'i tshor ba ni/ nang na'ang mi 'dug/ phyi rol na'ang mi 'dug /gnyi ga med par mi dmigs so//
446b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'ang nang na'ang mi 'dug /phyi rol na'ang mi 'dug /gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/ /'jam dpal/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin
446b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshor ba'ang nang na'ang mi 'dug / phyi rol na'ang mi 'dug /gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ji ltar sems can rnams kyi
446b5(mdo sde): bde ba'i tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / bde ba'ang ma lags/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags pa'i tshor ba dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
446b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal| 'du shes phyin ci log gi phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i byis pa so so skye bo rnams ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rkyen sna tshogs kyis bde'o snyam du shes/ sdug bsngal lo
446b7(mdo sde): snyam mam/ bde pa'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin snyam du shes mod kyi/ 'jam dpal/ tshor ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/ ma byas pa/ ma skyes pa/ rtag tu ma
447a1(mdo sde): byung ba ste/ 'jam dpal/ rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba ni/ byang chub ste/ de ni/ tshor ba lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /'jam dpal/ sred pa ni/ byang
447a2(mdo sde): chub ste| 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ sred pa byang chub lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sred pa kun nas nyon mongs pa lags par bka'
447a3(mdo sde): ma stsal lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi bu med pa'i bu'i sred pa bu'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'on te phyi rol na 'dug
447a4(mdo sde): gam| 'on te phyogs dang mtshams rnams na 'dug / 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i bu nyid kyang ma byung na/ bu'i sred pa nyid lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan
447a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang gi tshe mi de 'du ba dang ldan te bu skyed cing sred pa skyed pa'i dus de yod/ tshigs de yod na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/
447a6(mdo sde): mi de'i bu la sred pa shar phyogs nas 'ongs sam/ 'on te lho phyogs nas sam/ 'on te nub phyogs nas sam/ 'on te byang phyogs nas sam/ 'on te 'og gi phyogs nas sam/
447a7(mdo sde): 'on te steng gi phyogs nas sam/ 'on te nang na 'dug gam/ 'on te phyi rol na'am/ gnyis ka med par gnas sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sred pa
447b1(mdo sde): shar phyogs na mi dmigs/ lho phyogs na'ang ma lags/ nub phyogs na'ang ma lags/ byang phyogs na'ang ma lags/ steng na'ang ma lags/ 'og na'ang ma lags/ nang na'ang ma lags/ slad
447b2(mdo sde): rol na'ang ma lags/ gnyis ka ma mchis par yang mi dmigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sred pa de sus kyang byas sam/
447b3(mdo sde): byed du bcug pa yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sred pa ni/ ma bgyis pa ste/ sred pa la byed pa po gang yang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byis pa so so'i
447b4(mdo sde): skye bo log pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis yang dag pa ma lags pa la btags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ yang dag pa ma yin pa de yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom
447b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ med pa de la ci kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/
447b6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos gang shar phyogs nas mi rnyed/ lho phyogs nas kyang ma yin/ nub phyogs nas kyang ma yin/
447b7(mdo sde): byang phyogs nas kyang ma yin/ nang nas kyang ma yin/ phyi rol nas kyang ma yin/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs pa de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur zhing / rnam par byang
448a1(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ sred pa lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /'jam dpal/ len pa ni/ byang chub ste/ 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /

448a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci'ang skyed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyed lags te/ gzugs dang / sgra dang /

448a7(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ chos gang zhig chos gang skyed par byed pa de yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
448b1(mdo sde): dpal| chos gang zhig chos gang zhig la 'ching ba'i bya ba byed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ltar chos thams
448b2(mdo sde): cad skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa ste/ 'di dag ni/ gcig la gcig mi skyed do/ /gcig la gcig mi dmigs so/ /mi smra'o/ /bem po yin pa'i phyir dag gis
448b3(mdo sde): las 'byin par mi byed do/ /'jam dpal/ rnam grangs des na/ len pa ni/ byang chub ste/ de ni/ len pa lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /'jam dpal/ srid pa ni/ byang chub ste/ 'di

448b5(mdo sde): kyis chos ma bstan lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ ngas srid pa bshad pa de ni/ dngos po med pa ste/ des na/ srid pa zhes bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ gang gis chos
448b6(mdo sde): thams cad dngos po med par mthong ba de ci'ang skyed par mi byed do/ /'gag par mi byed do/ /chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'ang
448b7(mdo sde): mi dmigs mi 'dor ro/ /'jam dpal/ rnam grangs des na/ srid pa byang chub ste/ de ni/ srid pa lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /'jam dpal/ skye ba ni/ byang chub ste/ 'di
449a1(mdo sde): ni| gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ skye ba byang chub lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skye ba las yang dag par bzla
449a2(mdo sde): ba'i slad du chos ma bstan lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba yongs su btsal na/ skye ba med pa/ 'pho ba med pa/ 'byung ba med par mthong
449a3(mdo sde): ngo / /'jam dpal/ rnam grangs des na/ skye ba byang chub ste/ de ni/ skye ba lta bur 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /'jam dpal/ rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs la 'jug pa'i sgo 'di ni/
449a4(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i sgo gang gis byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur du 'thob cing spobs pa rno bar 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa zab mor 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa chags pa med pa dang / spobs
449a5(mdo sde): pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams kyi sa lags/
449a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di ni/ gang dag byang chub la ma zhugs pa rnams dang / gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams dang / gang dag
449a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi dmigs pa dang / gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las bskyed par mi 'dod pa rnams dang / gang dag 'khor ba las 'da'
449b1(mdo sde): bar mi 'dod pa rnams dang / gang dag sems can dgrol bar mi 'dod pa rnams dang / gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams khong du chud par mi 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag

449b3(mdo sde): bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu ston pa de la tshe 'di la yon tan ji snyed cig
449b4(mdo sde): mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams srung bar shes par bya'o/ /de chos thams cad la the
449b5(mdo sde): tshom med par shes par bya'o/ /de chos rab tu dbye ba'i shes pa dang ldan par shes par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni/ mtha' yas te/ bskal pa brgyar yang zad
449b6(mdo sde): par byar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khris rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs 'di thob bo/ /las dang po pa'i byang chub sems
449b7(mdo sde): dpa' sum khri nyis stong gis rjes su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha dang / klu dang /
450a1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
450a2(mdo sde): bstod de/ /'phags pa rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye
450a3(mdo sde): shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a nan+ta mu kha sA d+ha ka nA ma d+hA ra NI bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa
450a4(mdo sde): sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul
450a5(mdo sde): yangs pa can tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs
450a6(mdo sde): cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe zla ba gsum po 'di dag 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen
450a7(mdo sde): bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed dag btang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud+gal gyi bu chen po/ /khyod song la stong gi
450b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams na dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang 'dir sdus shig / tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan
450b2(mdo sde): 'das| de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas skad cig de nyid la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis ri rab kyi rtse mo la 'dug ste stong gi 'jig rten gyi
450b3(mdo sde): khams skad kyis go bar byas pa/ bde gshegs slob ma sems can gang su dag /'jig rten khams 'dir gnas pa kun nyon cig /deng 'dir ston pa chos kyi char 'bebs kyi/ /gang
450b4(mdo sde): dag nyan par 'dod pa 'dir shog cig / de'i tshe tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang du dge slong bzhi khri 'dus par gyur te/ de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba
450b5(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs
450b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus skad cig de nyid la 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba gang mngon par 'du bya bas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
450b7(mdo sde): na nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/ theg pa chen po can yang rung ste/ dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i
451a1(mdo sde): khang bzang du 'du bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rdzu
451a2(mdo sde): 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu mngon par 'dus byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de mngon par 'dus byas pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

451a6(mdo sde): pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod ces bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
451a7(mdo sde): chen po ngan song thams cad spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
451b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

452a1(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub

452a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dag lhags par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu

452b5(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad las chos bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / bla na med
452b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag
452b7(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa bzhi po de dag rjes su thob par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su dag pa dang / chos yongs su dag pa dang / smon lam yongs su dag pa
453a1(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag rjes su thob bar 'gyur ba dang / gya nom pa yid du 'ong bar byed pa'i chos bzhi rjes su thob par
453a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag yid du 'ong ba dang / sems yid du 'ong ba dang / skye ba yid du 'ong ba rjes su thob par 'gyur ba dang /
453a3(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa bzhi rjes su thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgo mi zad pas bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi dbang
453a4(mdo sde): po la mkhas pa'i gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / las dang rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa 'dus ma byas kyi gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa'i gzungs kyi
453a5(mdo sde): sgor 'jug pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag gis zhu gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas tshe
453a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus zhu ba ji skad smos pa/ ji ltar yid la bzung ba/ ji ltar yid la byas pa/ ji ltar kun chub par byas pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la rgya cher gsol to/ /
453a7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces kyang gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba ji skad smos pa/ ji ltar bzung ba/ ji ltar yid la bgyis pa/ ji ltar kun chub par bgyis pa 'di dag gis byang chub
453b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi spyod pa ji ltar yongs su dag bar 'gyur ba de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
453b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu bar sems pa khyod
453b3(mdo sde): yang legs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no/ /zhes
453b4(mdo sde): gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos
453b5(mdo sde): thams cad khas mi len cing len par mi byed pa des gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM ma Ne ma hA ra Ne/ a khe/ mu khe/ mu khe/ sa man+ta mu khe/ sau me
453b6(mdo sde): sa| sau R+ya ra me/ sau ti yu ga me/ ni ru ga ti pra b+he hi le hi le/ ka la pe ke la pa/ si sa le/ sa ra ba ti/ hi le hi le/ hi le hi le/ hi li hi li/ ma hA hi le le/ tsan+Da tsa pa ne/ tsa ra tsa ra Ni/ a
453b7(mdo sde): tsa le| ma tsa le/ a naM te/ a naM ta mu khe/ a naM ta ga te a ra Ne nir ma la de/ nir ba la ne/ nir ba d+ha na te/ d+harma d+ha re/ nir ha re/ gi mi le shrI ma bi sho d+ha ni/ pra kr-i ti d+hi pa ne/ b+ha ba be b+ha
454a1(mdo sde): ba ne| a saM ge a saM ge/ /bi ha re/ da me sa me/ bi ma le/ bi ma la pra b+he/ sAM kaR+Sha Ni/ d+hi re d+hi d+hi ri ma hA d+hi d+hi re/ ye She ya Sho pa ti/ tsa le a tsa le/ ma tsa le/
454a2(mdo sde): sa ma tsa le/ Ta d+hi Tu d+ha san+d+hi s+thi ra/ a saM ge a saM ge /bi ha re/ a saM ga ni ra ha re/ ni ra ha ra/ bi ma le/ nir ha Ta sho ta ni Ta d+hi so me/ s+thi re s+thi me/ s+tha ma ba ti/ ma hA pra b+he/ sa man+ta pra
454a3(mdo sde): b+he| bi pu la pra b+he/ bi pu la rasmi saM b+ha be/ sa man+ta mu khe/ sarba tra ya bu ga te/ tshe d+ya ya na ta tshe d+ya pra ti b+ha ne/ b+ha re Ne/ Ni De na/ d+harma ni d+ha na go tra/ sa man+ta b+ha drai/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da
454a4(mdo sde): ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs 'di dag 'dzin pa ni/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la rlom sems
454a5(mdo sde): su mi byed/ dmigs par mi byed/ smon par mi byed/ btang snyoms su mi byed/ len par mi byed/ brtson par mi byed de/ de dag thob par bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba dang / bsgom
454a6(mdo sde): par bya ba dang / rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mi byed/ 'gyur bar mi byed/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong / ldan pa ma yin pa rnams
454a7(mdo sde): kyang mi mthong ngo / /chos rnams kyi skye ba'ang mi mthong / 'gag pa'ang mi mthong / 'das pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong / ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyang mi mthong / da ltar byung ba'i
454b1(mdo sde): chos rnams kyang mi mthong / chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'bri ba'ang mi mthong / chos gang yang gsog par yang mi byed/ 'grib par yang mi byed/ 'dogs par yang mi byed/ rnam par
454b2(mdo sde): rig par yang mi byed par sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'ba' zhig sgom ste/ de bsgom pa na gzugs su ma yin/ gzugs med par ma yin/ mtshan du ma yin/ mtshan ma med par ma yin/
454b3(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang por ma yin/ dpe byad bzang po med par ma yin/ rnam par shes par ma yin/ rnam par shes pa med par ma yin/ nyon mongs par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa med par ma yin/
454b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims su ma yin/ tshul khrims med par ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin du ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin med par ma yin/ shes rab tu ma yin/ shes rab med par ma yin/ rnam par grol bar
454b5(mdo sde): ma yin| rnam par grol ba med par ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba med par ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ skye ba med par
454b6(mdo sde): ma yin| rigs su ma yin/ rigs med par ma yin/ rus su ma yin/ rus med par ma yin/ 'khor du ma yin/ 'khor med par ma yin/ gnas par ma yin/ gnas med par ma
454b7(mdo sde): yin| thob par ma yin/ thob pa med par ma yin/ mngon par rtogs par ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa med par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa zad par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa ma zad par
455a1(mdo sde): ma yin| phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched du ma yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched med par ma yin/ shes par ma yin/ shes pa med
455a2(mdo sde): par ma yin/ chos ston par ma yin/ chos mi ston par ma yin/ bdag rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/ gzhan rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/ sems can rnam
455a3(mdo sde): par dag par bya bar ma yin/ sems can med pa rnam par dag par bya bar ma yin/ bdag gi don du ma yin/ gzhan gyi don du ma yin/ chos su ma yin/ 'dul bar ma yin
455a4(mdo sde): lus rnam par dag par ma yin/ ngag rnam par dag par ma yin/ yid rnam par dag par ma yin/ spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma
455a5(mdo sde): yin| phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa rnam par dag par ma yin/ bdag gi rnam par dag par ma yin/ gzhan gyi rnam par dag par ma
455a6(mdo sde): yin pa 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /don dam pa
455a7(mdo sde): sgrub par chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba la mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /gcig tu nges pa thob pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
455b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i ye shes sgrub pas chos kyi gter mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rigs zil gyis mi non par
455b2(mdo sde): gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /dam pa yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pas bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub
455b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang dag sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di'i don thob par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
455b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ chos dang yon tan gyi gter nges pa'i phyir ro/ /dmigs pa med pa'i spyod pa dang
455b5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i gzungs 'di nyid las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rab tu dbye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//
455b6(mdo sde): chos rnams stong par dogs med cing / /byang chub ched du spros med byed/ /chos dbyings 'khrug par mi byed na/ /de phyir gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur/ /mdo sde 'di ni mnyan par bya/ /'di la
455b7(mdo sde): gzungs ni zad pa med/ /ye shes 'byor 'di 'di la ste/ /de nas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /gzungs 'dir rab tu bzung byas na/ /phyogs bcu dag gi
456a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos bstan pa ni thos par 'gyur/ /don dang tshig 'bru bskyod kun gyi/ /mchog gi chos ni rnam par shes/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer ji snyed pa/ /
456a2(mdo sde): de snyed tshig rnams shes par 'gyur/ /gang dag chos kyi mchog 'gyur ba/ /rlabs chen gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/ /gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin de la/ /thams cad rtag tu mngon du
456a3(mdo sde): 'gyur| |gal te sems can thams cad kyis/ /de la bskal par dogs dris te/ /the tshom thams cad chad gyur kyang / /de yi ye shes mi zad do/ /mdo sde 'di la gang dga' ba/ /de
456a4(mdo sde): ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ /byang chub mchog la nye bar te/ /yid brtan gyur dang chos 'dzin pa'o/ /gzungs 'di 'dzin par su byed pa/ /de la sems can thams cad dga'/ /
456a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyang de la dgyes/ /grags pa 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/ /su zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/ /de ni 'chi ba'i dus byed tshe/ /sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu mthong / /
456a6(mdo sde): lag pa de la nye bar 'jog /gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa ni/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/ /sngon chad sdig pa gang byas pa/ /zla ba gcig gis byang bar 'gyur/ /byang chub
456a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i bsod nams gang / /bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs pa kun/ /gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa yis/ /zla ba gcig gis zil gnon 'gyur/ /khams gsum sems
456b1(mdo sde): can ji snyed pa/ /gal te thams cad bdud gyur kyang / /mdo sde 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/ /de la bar chad byed mi nus/ /byang chub 'tshang rgya bar du ste/ /dran dang blo gros rtogs ldan
456b2(mdo sde): 'gyur| |gzungs kyi dam pa gang yin pa/ /de yi lce yi rtse mor gnas/ /ji ltar mdo sde 'dzin de la/ /gzungs 'di so sor nges pa bzhin/ /'di las thams cad mkhyen pa bstan//
456b3(mdo sde): 'di las byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang / /mar me zhes byas pa lung bstan/ /skad cig de la sangs rgyas ni/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed mthong / /gang
456b4(mdo sde): zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /bstan pa 'dir ni rtogs 'dod cing / /mdo sde 'di la bstan pa des/ /thams cad myur du thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag dang / /
456b5(mdo sde): nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang / /'od dang mtshan kyang rnam dag pa/ /mdo sde 'dis ni byed par 'gyur/ /de bas brag ni yod gyur na/ /zhag bdun bar du 'di sems pa/ /sangs
456b6(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba brgyad cu yis/ /de yi 'og tu gzungs sbyin 'gyur/ /bsam bya bsam par mi bsam ste/ /bsam bya min pa'ang mi bsam mo/ /soms shig 'gal bar ma sems shig/ /
456b7(mdo sde): de yi 'og tu gzungs thob 'gyur/ /dper na rgya mtshor phyin pa'i mi/ /nor la som nyi med pa ltar/ /de bzhin gzungs 'di thob gyur nas/ /bde ba la yang som nyi med/ /'di las rdzogs
457a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub nye/ /de bas 'di la sbyor bar gyis/ /zhi ba'i gnas ni thob gyur nas/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
457a2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/
457a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags pa med pa yin/ sems can thams cad la phrag dog med pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing 'gyod pa med
457a4(mdo sde): par sbyin pa'i tshul can yin/ nyin mtshan du chos la dga' zhing chos 'dod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag
457a5(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ngan cing bdud kyi spyod yul ba/ /'dod
457a6(mdo sde): pa dri nga spang bar byos/ /de dag sems can dmyal ba'i rkyen/ /ngan song rnams kyi rgyu yang yin/ /shes kyi khe dang rnyed dang grags pa'i phyir/ /pha rol dag la phrag dog mi
457a7(mdo sde): bya ste| |dga' ba'i mig gis sems can blta byas na/ /mthu che ba dang gzugs kyang mdzes par gyur/ /sems can gang dag kha cig rtsod 'gyur ba/ /de yi gzhi rtsa yongs
457b1(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa ste/ /de ltar gang la sred par 'gyur ba spongs/ /sred pa spang ba byas na gzungs su 'gyur/ /gal te byang chub 'dod na gzhan ma sems/ /nyin dang mtshan du chos
457b2(mdo sde): ni btsal bar byos/ /chos tshig 'di 'dra 'di dag rten byed na/ /de la gzungs ni mngon du 'gyur bar 'ong / /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
457b3(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgon pa dang dben pa la gnas pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /
457b4(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag la lhag par chags pa med pa dang / sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta zhing tha na lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong ba
457b5(mdo sde): ste| shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
457b6(mdo sde): pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /rgyal pas bsngags pa'i dgon par gnas par gyis/ /de la gnas pa gzhan la brnyas pa med/ /zab mo'i bzod pa 'dun pa bskyed nas su/ /bag yod
457b7(mdo sde): mgo la 'bar zhing gnas par gyis/ /'di ltar tshul 'chos byed kyi gzhir gyur pa/ /shes khe rnyed pa rnams la gnas ma byed/ /bya dang 'dra bar ngan don dag gis chog byas te//
458a1(mdo sde): mir gyur pa yi 'bras bu yod par byos/ /kye ma sangs rgyas bstan pa legs par rnyed/ /sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa ba khyim yang spongs/ /lus dang
458a2(mdo sde): ngag dang yid kyang yongs dag pas/ /sangs rgyas dang ni chos la gus par gyis/ /rnyed 'dod dran pa ma yin shes rab min/ /dad dang tshul khrims ma yin chos sems min/ /
458a3(mdo sde): de ni byang chub ring ste gnam sa bzhin/ /de ltas rnyed pa yongs su spang bar bya/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/
458a4(mdo sde): gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yi ge 'bru brgyad kyi don khong du chud par bya'o/ /brgyad po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pa zhes bya ba don dam par
458a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad la bdag med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / la zhes bya ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i
458a6(mdo sde): chos kyi sku la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / ba zhes bya ba byis pa'i chos rnams dang / mkhas pa'i chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud
458a7(mdo sde): pa dang / dza zhes bya ba skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba med pa'i 'gro ba'i mi skye mi 'gag pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / ka zhes
458b1(mdo sde): bya ba las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / d+ha zhes bya ba gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
458b2(mdo sde): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / sha zhes bya ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong med par
458b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa khong du chud pa dang / k+Sha zhes bya ba chos thams cad skad cig pa ste/ gzod ma nas zhi ba'i phyir zad pa med pa dang / 'jig pa
458b4(mdo sde): med pa dang / rgyu ba med pa dang / chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa khong du chud pa ste/ de ltar yi ge 'bru brgyad po de dag gi don khong du chud par rtogs par bya
458b5(mdo sde): ba 'di ni/ don khong du chud pa dang po'o/ /gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris te gzung bar bya ba 'di ni/ don khong du chud pa gnyis pa'o/ /zla ba phyed phyed cing
458b6(mdo sde): gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu klog pa dang / rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni/ don khong du chud pa gsum pa'o/ /gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam
458b7(mdo sde): grangs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug
459a1(mdo sde): pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la gzud pa'i phyir brtson par bya ba 'di ni/ don khong du chud pa bzhi pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub
459a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
459a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /yi ge 'bru brgyad 'di dag bsam par bya/ /mdo sde 'di ni bris nas bcang bar bya/ /zla ba phyed cing rtag tu bklag par bya/ /sems can rnams kyang 'di
459a4(mdo sde): 'dzin gzhug par bya/ /shes rab rgya chen byang chub nye ba ste/ /phyogs bcu rnams na sangs rgyas gang su dag /bzhugs pa thams cad des ni mdun du mthong / /de'i phyir 'dun
459a5(mdo sde): pa bskyed de 'di la bslab/ /shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan yon yin te/ bzhi
459a6(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad de la dgongs pa dang / de la bdud kyi las mi 'byung ba dang / de'i las kyi sgrib pa myur
459a7(mdo sde): du byang ba dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa myur du thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
459b1(mdo sde): chen po'i phan yon yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis de ni yid la mdzad/ /de la bdud kyis
459b2(mdo sde): glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de yi las kyi sgrib pa myur du 'byang / /spobs pa mtha' yas rnams kyang thob par 'gyur/ /shA ri'i bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs
459b3(mdo sde): med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya cher gyur pa/ dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
459b4(mdo sde): rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med
459b5(mdo sde): pa| lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
459b6(mdo sde): p a'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po snang ba 'jin zhes bya ba mi'i dbang po rin
459b7(mdo sde): po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo / /de'i bu yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang / des sgo
460a1(mdo sde): m tha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
460a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de las thos te/ des gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /de lo bdun
460a3(mdo sde): khrir rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to/ /lan 'ga' yang rgyal srid la dga' ba'am/ nor la dga' ba'am/ bdag la dga' bar ma gyur to/ /
460a4(mdo sde): de lo bdun khrir lan 'ga' yang sa la glos ma phab ste/ gcig tu nges par nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas so/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos
460a5(mdo sde): bstan pa thos te/ thos nas kyang thams cad bzung ngo / /bzung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
460a6(mdo sde): rgyas rin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu de nyid las rab tu byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas de lo dgu khri 'das pa dang / des sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs
460a7(mdo sde): 'di bsgrubs te/ bsgrubs nas kyang sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do/ /des tshe gcig po de nyid la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad
460b1(mdo sde): cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du btsud cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod par gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'khor de na tshong dpon gyi bu
460b2(mdo sde): zla ba'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ des sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba'i dge slong de las thos so/ /thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang
460b3(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ de rjes su yi rang ba'i mod la skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang thams cad bzung ngo / /
460b4(mdo sde): thams cad du'ang gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang / tshig btsun pa rnams kyi mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa
460b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ /des bskal pa gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mnyes par byas so/ /mnyes par
460b6(mdo sde): byas nas kyang bskal pa gsum 'das pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
460b7(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za bar gyur na/ shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis de ltar
461a1(mdo sde): mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de'i tshe de'i dus
461a2(mdo sde): na tshong dpon gyi bu zla ba'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i chos smra bar gyur
461a3(mdo sde): pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyid dang / yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za bar gyur na/ shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom
461a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba yon tan rin po che bsam
461a5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu/ nga dang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de'i tshe gzungs kyi
461a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/ /thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang ste/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mod la skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des ngas bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag bzhi
461a7(mdo sde): khrir 'khor ba phyir bsnyil to/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu las chos bstan pa'ang thos te/ thams cad du'ang gzungs thob pa rnams kyi mchog dang / tshig btsun pa
461b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems
461b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ tha na gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
461b3(mdo sde): la rjes su yi rang bar yang brtson par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched
461b4(mdo sde): du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang / chos smra ba dag mgu bar byed pa'i rgyur 'gyur na/ gang yi ger 'bri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
461b5(mdo sde): byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos te/ bsod nams kyi phung po de'i tshad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma
461b6(mdo sde): gtogs par sems can thams cad kyis kyang shes pa'am/ bsam par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//
461b7(mdo sde): mdo sde thos nas rjes su yi rang dang / /yi ger bris dang bzung dang bklags pa yis/ /bsod nams chu bo ji tsam bskyed pa ni/ /sems can kun gyis shes par yong mi nus//
462a1(mdo sde): de ni tshe rabs kun tu rgyal ba mthong / /de dag las kyang dad pa bsam yas rnyed/ /mdo sde zab mo'i tshul yang shes par 'gyur/ /de ni myur du
462a2(mdo sde): byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya/ /bla med byang chub ma reg bar du yang / /de ni ting nge 'dzin dang mngon shes dang / /gzungs rnams dang ni gzugs dang longs spyod dang / /sangs
462a3(mdo sde): rgyas mthong las nyams par yong mi 'gyur/ /rjes su dran pa sngon gyi tshe rabs na/ /tshong dpon bus ni gzungs 'di thob gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye snyed mthong
462a4(mdo sde): gyur te| |des ni 'dod bzhin byang chub rnam sangs rgyas/ /mar me mdzad pa de tshe tshong dpon bu/ /sngon tshe tshe rabs 'od zer mtha' yas gyur/ /de tshe chos smra sangs rgyas
462a5(mdo sde): tshe dpag med/ /nga ni bskal pa bzang dang bcas yi rang / /byang chub myur du reg par su 'dod dang / /bdud rnams myur du gzhom par su 'dod dang / /bsod nams brgya
462a6(mdo sde): yi mtshan bzang su 'dod pa/ /'di la brtson na rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed 'jig rten khams/ /gang gis rin chen bkang ste sbyin byin kyang / /bris
462a7(mdo sde): dang bzung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa/ /de la sbyin pas dper yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltas thos na rtse gcig bag yod par/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas 'di
462b1(mdo sde): bzung ngam/ /gzungs 'di bris shing sems dpa' de dag ni/ /byang chub rnyed pa dka' ba med par bshad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka'
462b2(mdo sde): stsal pa| shA ri'i bu/ sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la gangs la gnas pa'i
462b3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin brgyad po gzi mdangs 'jug cing nyin mtshan du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang
462b4(mdo sde): brtan po dang / bdag po dang / sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang / spyod pa'i blo gros dang / thub dka' dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / gnod sbyin lag bzang zhes bya ba dag ste/
462b5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rgyal po brgyad po de dag 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir shin tu khrus bya ba dang / gos shin tu gtsang ma bgos pa dang / 'chag sar 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad
462b6(mdo sde): la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya/ gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yid la bya ste/ de ltar yid la byas na/ de la gnod sbyin brgyad po de dag myur du bzhin
462b7(mdo sde): ston par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa brgyang po 'di dag kyang de la sems par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang
463a1(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang / snang byed dang / shes rab 'od dang / nyi
463a2(mdo sde): ma'i 'od dang / yang dag skul byed dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs byed dang / skar ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
463a3(mdo sde): chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag des gzungs thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro/ /
463a4(mdo sde): gzungs 'di la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bden pa'i dam bca' bar bya'o/ /byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba can dang / chos
463a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / chos la dga' ba dang / zab mo'i chos la bzod pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs la brtson pas
463a6(mdo sde): kun 'gyed pa'i ngang tshul can du byas te/ de la ji ltar chung ba dang / ji ltar nyung ba las kyang sbyin pa byin par bya na/ mang po las lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan
463a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sum cus ni/ sgo mtha' yas
463b1(mdo sde): ba sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di thob ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye rgu sngon sems
463b2(mdo sde): ma bskyed pa dkrigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cus ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
463b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
463b4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /byang chub sems dpa'
463b5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par mngon par 'phags par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig / bdud thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /gcig tu nges par
463b6(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu thob par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge
463b7(mdo sde): slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
464a1(mdo sde): la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya Sha Ta mu kha
464a2(mdo sde): nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
464a3(mdo sde): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams gnas gtsang ma'i steng nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu rnam par phye bar spras pa na byang
464a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
464a5(mdo sde): dag / khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs zungs shig /de ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye gnas
464a6(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu bdag gis sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba de/ sems can thams cad dang mnyam nyid mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur cig /bdag gis 'jig rten pa'i
464a7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang ci myong ba de/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su shes par byed par spyod par gyur cig /bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i
464b1(mdo sde): las gang ci byas pa de/ so sor bshags pa bla na med pas so sor ma bshags par ma gyur cig /bdag gis bdud kyi las gang ci byas pa de/ yongs su byed pa bla na med
464b2(mdo sde): pas yongs su mi shes par ma gyur cig / bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang rung gang ci yod pa de thams
464b3(mdo sde): cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig / bdag gi rnam par grol ba gang ci yod pa des sems can thams cad rnam par thar par gyur cig /'khor ba dang mya ngan
464b4(mdo sde): las 'das pa la gnas par ma gyur cig / tad+ya thA/ oM k+Sha me k+Sha me/ k+ShAn+te k+ShAn+te/ da me da me/ dAn+te dAn+te/ b+ha dre b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre su b+ha dre/ tsan+d+re tsan+d+re/ su tsan+d+re su tsan+d+re/ tsan+d+ra ki
464b5(mdo sde): ra Ne| tsan+d+ra ba ti/ te dzo ba ti/ ya sho ba ti/ d+harma ba ti/ bra ma ba ti/ sarba kla sha bi sho d+ha ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba ar+tha pra sha ma ne/ pa ra mAr+tha sA d+ha ni/ kA ya bi sho d+ha
464b6(mdo sde): ni| bA ka bi sho d+ha ni/ ma naHsaM sho d+ha ni swAhA/ rigs kyi bu dag /de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la zhig gis sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di
464b7(mdo sde): nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum bklags na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang nas skye ba bdun gyi bar du de skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
465a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa'i
465a2(mdo sde): tshogs de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags
465a3(mdo sde): pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / //
